summary: In Silence Waits is a modern take on classic graphical adventures. Solve puzzles and avoid dangers as you explore the desolate wastes of a cruel world in search of a new home. In this world, not all monsters must be feared... and not all friendly faces should be trusted.

name: Interview With the Whisperer
summary: A short game about a journalist who travels into the Galician countryside to interview an old man who claims to have built a radio that allows him to speak with God.

name: Incitement 3
summary: An expansive dystopian sci-fi world awaits you! Equipment customization, a varied cast and an epic story in this sci-fi epic from Astronomic Games.

name: Invincible
summary: This mod adds Mark Grayson aka NVINCIBLE as a playable character.

name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
summary: The NES version of Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom.

name: Infinitode 2: Infinite Tower Defense
summary: Infinitode 2 - a strategy in the Tower Defense genre, in which the player will have to build towers to protect his base from endless waves of enemies. The game features huge maps, lots of towers, resource miners, upgrade tree and map editor.

name: Intelligent Qube
summary: Intelligent Qube is a puzzle game for the PlayStation. In the game, the player controls a character who must run around a platform made of cubes, clearing certain cubes as they approach. Cubes are "cleared" by marking a spot on the stage, waiting for the cube to roll on top of it, and then deactivating the marked spot.

name: Indiana Jones and The Great Circle: Premium Edition
summary:
Live the adventure with the Premium Edition, including up to 3-Day Advanced Access** and Indiana Jones and the Great Circle: The Order of Giants Story DLC†. You’ll also receive a digital artbook and the Temple of Doom Outfit, Indy’s iconic look as seen in Temple of Doom.

Premium Edition Includes:

Base Game
Up to 3-Day Advanced Access
The Order of Giants Story DLC
Digital Artbook
Temple of Doom Outfit

name: Interstellar Space: Genesis - Evolving Empires
summary: Interstellar Space: Genesis - Evolving Empires is the second expansion to the turn-based space 4X strategy game Interstellar Space: Genesis. Adds two major new features to the game, Evolutions and Minor Civilizations. These features provide tons of new content, 7 new leaders and 2 new music tracks!

name: Incarnation
summary: A mouse-only reverse roguelike platformer. After each level, you must lose one of your celestial powers until you are completely transformed into a human. Will you be able to reach mortality?

name: Ink Link
summary: Ink Link is a sleek world of action in 2.5D! Outsmart enemies, piece together platforms, and upgrade your skills to take on powerful bosses. Discover hidden paths as darkness creeps in and your ally-turned-enemy, Ink, tests your skills—and your will to survive.

name: Incision
summary: Slaughter your way through nightmarish industrial mazes, transformed cityscapes and surreal alien structures to cut down the Growth in this ultraviolent, fast-paced, and merciless retro-styled first person shooter.

name: Indygo
summary: Indygo is a narrative game with elements of point'n'click set in one room only - painting workshop. It tells the story of a painter who suffers from depression. Solve puzzles and make decisions that affect how the game ends. Indygo attempts to show how people with depression can feel.

name: Infinite Tournament Paintball
summary: Battle your friends on the field in the latest paintball game to hit the market. Infinite Tournament Paintball is an online, multiplayer, team based game that includes all the aspects of actually being on the field. Choose from a library of field layouts including speedball, hyperball, and scenario style gameplay.

name: Inferno Pathways
summary: Descend into the abandoned metro in Inferno Pathways, a first-person psychological horror game. Navigate dark tunnels, solve puzzles, and uncover sinister secrets. Confront your deepest fears and piece together the haunting story of Mike Collins. Can you escape the darkness?

name: Indigo Prohecy: 15th Anniversary Edition
summary:
Fahrenheit: 15th Anniversary Edition contains:

- Fahrenheit in a specially created case and sleeve
- A sticker set
- A high quality printed artbook
- A thank-you letter written by the team at Quantic Dream

name: Infinite Sunshine Dust
summary: Infinite Sunshine Dust (ISD) is a psychedelic horror adventure game. Four prisoners wander a virtual world for insane experiment and they get involved with many, many strange things.

name: Innocence Rewrite
summary: "Innocence Rewrite" captures the summer before and after the college entrance exam.As old bonds mend and distant feelings return, it's a season of healing amid chaos.No need for correction fluid — just feel, and slowly rewrite the innocence of youth.

name: Intruder in Antiquonia
summary: In this classic point-and-click adventure, Sarah does not remember how she got to Antiquonia, but she has plenty of time to unravel the puzzle of her past as she explores the town where the Internet is not welcome. A beautiful adventure with high-resolution 2D graphics and a lovely soundtrack.

name: Insanity Locked
summary: After a violent accident, you wake up in intense pain and take pills for relief. But they cause disturbing hallucinations. Trapped in a cycle of pain and visions, you search for answers, buy upgrades, lock doors, and monitor cameras, hoping to find a way out of this nightmare.

name: Individual Investor Tycoon
summary: In Individual Investor Tycoon, you can simulate investing in stocks, real estate and bonds from the 90s. In the next 30 years, follow the market trend, make reasonable investment, let yourself out of the trap of the rat race, to achieve financial freedom.

name: Indies' Lies: Desires Flowing
summary: This content requires the base game Indies' Lies on Steam in order to play. A new class, new mechanics, new challenges, and more replayability!

name: In Harness
summary: IN HARNESS is an online co-op 3D jumping game for 1–10 players. With simple move and jump controls, pets team up to clear tough stages and reunite with a girl in heaven, bringing the warm “Helper’s High” of saving friends.

name: Instant Anastasia
summary: In this roguelite horror, rescue survivors on a spaceship tainted by nightmares. Track an invisible foe through anomalies leaking into reality. Use the "Dream Shader" to reveal and fight the enemy. Scarce resources and split-second decisions will determine your survival.

name: Infinity Inc.
summary: Sci-fi puzzle-platformer game. Find a clone gun, create your own clones and overcome deathly traps by destroying them!

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Dusty Weapon Skin Set
summary: Give your arsenal an authentic feel and blend into the desert sands with the Dusty Weapon Skin Set. This skin can be applied to six different weapons. This skin can be applied to six different weapons.

name: InuYasha: Demon Tournament
summary: InuYasha Demon Tournament is a RPG strategy game featuring the characters from InuYasha. Participate in the demon tournament to win the shikon jewel, which is a powerful artifact that will grant great power to whomever attain it. Gather all the shards of the shikon jewel by defeating each opponents. You must use your courage and strategy to outwit your enemies on the battlefield, or the jewel will be lost for you.

name: Intuitive Level Design
summary: "Intuitive Level Design" is an interactive course designed for aspiring game developers. Find and activate commentary nodes scattered throughout the game to learn about the core principles of intuitive level design, illustrated with dozens of practical examples. Learn while having fun!

name: Infected run to Survive: Zombie Apocalypse Survival Story Shooter Dead Cry
summary: Run or die! Can you reach the final survival point? along the way you will meet numerous obstacles and difficulties. A game that sends you into the cruel world of the zombie apocalypse where the dead are teeming all around.

name: In Full Bloom
summary: Feed and raise your little baby. Watch it grow and feed on every and anything. In Full Bloom is a Tamagotchi inspired Katamari-like about a creature with never-ending hunger for anything around it. There is only one way.

name: Investigation
summary: Investigation is a singleplayer body-cam styled psychological horror game about searching for clues and answers while a demonic killer brings these gruesome victims back to life in terrifying ways. Solve the puzzles or be consumed by them....

name: Inner Kung Fu Game
summary: External Kung Fu is about being as hard on the outside as you can, to break sticks and bricks. Inner Kung Fu is about being as soft on the inside as you can, to change your views and attitudes easily.

name: Indian Mechanic Simulator
summary: Fix punctures, repair engines, wash, paint, and restore scooters, cars, and more in Indian Mechanic Simulator. Experience authentic street-side repairs and become the most trusted mechanic in town!

name: Infantry Online
summary:
Infantry Online is a Massively Multiplayer Online (MMO) and is often referred to as the world's first 2D isometric shooter.

The game pits you against hundreds of other online players in whats often an all out frenetic combat lasting hours, whether you're defending a base from the opposite, fighting zombies to save man kind or playing a supportive role in many of the zones available.

You can feel the rush of adrenaline when you and hundreds of other plays clash on the battlefield. Go it alone or form-up into battalions. Tactics and skill determine the victor!

Invade an enemy's heavily fortified base with a well-organized group of teammates for final victory after hours of battle in a game of CTF. Get behind the controls of a heavily armed tank while a buddy mans the turret in a Skirmish battle. Assist in scoring a goal after narrowly avoiding death from the opposing team in a match of GravBall. Unload dozens of rounds into a group of enemies to save a teammate in Team Deathmatch. These are some of the intense experiences to be had in Infantry. Infantry hosts a wide variety of games with heart pounding action and addictive amounts of depth. Hundreds of players can compete on a single battlefield, working together to win the day or dueling against each other for personal glory. With a wide variety of weapons, vehicles, and player classes in the many different types of games, Infantry always offers something new.

name: Industries of Titan
summary: Create a sprawling industrial city. Compete with the other Great Houses of Titan for resources, territory, and power. Do battle with ships, technology, influence, or the sheer productive power of your factories. Stake your claim to the Industries of Titan in this innovative sim/strategy game!

name: Intesa Vincente
summary: "L'intesa vincente" is an exciting head-to-head team game where two teams compete to guess a series of hidden words or phrases. Each team has one "guesser" and two "clue-givers." The clue-givers, who know the secret word, take turns asking a spontaneous question in one word at a time-to help their guesser figure out the word.

name: Internet Club & Cafe Simulator
summary: The ultimate internet café simulation—grow your business, attract gamers, and get rich!

name: International Track & Field: Summer Games
summary: Game Boy Color release of Track & Field games is different to the console and computer version in a way that it does not use 3D graphics but instead uses sprites with 2D graphics with various gameplay perspectives, depending on one of the twelve available athletic games. Main two gameplay modes are Single Play and Versus Play.

name: Inspector Waffles: Early Days
summary: A top-down detective adventure with point-and-click mechanics, inspired by classic Game Boy games. Follow Waffles in his first days as an inspector who wants to prove to everyone that he is more than just a rookie. But beware… Your future worst enemy is hiding in the shadows.

name: Insane Skulls
summary:
Long ago, the Greeks and Romans would play a game called, "Astragalus," which evolved into what Americans call, "Jacks." There have been several variations of this game over time, but it started out being played with small, dried animal bones. In the 90's, there was a major Crazy Bones crazy, a game based off of astragalus with plastic figurines with weird and odd shapes, sizes, and faces.

Insane Skulls is based off of games like Astragalus and Crazy Bones, where a player picks a team of 4 characters (or skulls), all with different stats and properties. Players take turns flicking their skulls at the opposing skulls, carefully aiming, giving a nice amount of upward or forward force, in hopes of knocking the other player's skulls over.

Insane Skulls has 16 different characters, including guest characters like Circuit Dude and Dusty Argile, and supports either a single player mode against the CPU or head-to-head mode against another human.

See how many times you can beat the CPU in a row with the team you make to beat the high score!

name: Ink and Intrigue
summary: Heed magic’s call! Find love as you explore ancient mysteries, craft dragon-rune tattoos, and discover your true loyalties. What passions shape your path?

name: Intruder
summary: The ultimate spy-vs-guards simulator. Carefully sneak your way to the objective as Intruders or use the wide variety of tactical gadgets to trap your opponents as Guards. Intruder allows for stealth, teamwork, and environmental interactions never before seen in a multiplayer game.

name: Infliction
summary:
Infliction is a story driven first person physiological horror experience. Set in a regular suburban home, the story is told over alternating time periods spanning 13 years.
Through environmental storytelling, Infliction tackles taboo subject matter. While you're discovering what has happened over the last 13 years, you're being stalked by an evil entity. Can you learn enough to vanquish the evil that lies within this family home or will you become a victim?

name: Into the Dark
summary:
Expect the ultimate B-Movie Trash experience!
Don´t even dare to hope for state-of the art graphics, a proper balancing, professional voice acting or breathtaking script-writing. This here is 100% pure trash, an adventure / shooter hybrid with gazillions of bad jokes, dozens of pop culture references and a hidden, dense net of subversive, intelligent messages related to post-WWII-politics. Oh yes, you need a basic knowledge of pop culture to enjoy the game, and quite some education on politics to really love it, but who cares?

name: In My Heart
summary: A game poem about medical imaging & defective hearts.

name: In Ashes
summary: An unexpected quest has reached your sleepy town. Once again, you must raise your weapon and step into the boots of a weary, burnt out adventurer. When faced with a choice, what kind of hero will you be? In Ashes is a choice-driven fantasy visual novel about adventurers, monsters, and the forgotten.

name: Inferno
summary: Journey through the Nine Circles of Hell in this atmospheric puzzle game, which closely follows the epic poem "Inferno" by Dante Alighieri. Each circle has its unique mood and mechanics, and interspersed between the over 100 puzzles are plenty of artwork and quotes from the original poem.

name: Invocation: The Festival of Souls
summary: Get ready for the characters of the famous faces of history to take on each other in the arena!

name: Invizimals: The Lost Kingdom
summary:
Explore the world of the Invizimals as the smash hit series comes to PlayStation 3 in a thrilling third-person adventure. You are Hiro, a young explorer who discovers a magical portal that teleports you to the Lost Kingdom -- a land under attack from a cruel, rampaging robot army. Transform into 16 of the most popular Invizimals, using their unique powers and abilities to solve puzzles and battle against your enemies.

Link up with players of Invizimals: The Alliance on PlayStation Vita to swap bonus game items and stage electrifying four-player battles via Cross-Platform play

name: Inertia
summary: A surreal inde RPG about dissociation, recovery, and the friends (imaginary or not) who help us survive. Guide Juno through a new town, (re)build her connections, dig through the static and find out what it means to see the world in color again.

name: Interstellar Enforcer
summary: In a nutshell, IE is a mission based GZDOOM TC for DOOM II. Take doom, mix in a dose of unreal and turok, add a splash of metroid and maybe a little bit of system shock 2 and you'll not be far from the target. You play as an officer of the Interstellar Enforcement Patrol, tasked with policing the obscure fringes of humanities bustling space empire in the future of the DOOM II timeline. You generally do this by shooting things.

name: Invitation to Fear
summary: Invitation to Fear is a survival horror game for 1 to 4 players. After receiving one of the invitations, you will wake up in an unfamiliar place. Before long, you will realize that a terrifying creature is wandering around the building. Don't let "her" find you.

name: In Heat: Lustful Nights
summary: Tired of your current job? Are you missing the thrill that made you truly appreciate life? The Diamond Straits has just what you have been looking for! Experience our many resorts, while getting a big paycheck at the same time. Work hard enough and you might just earn a VIP EXPERIENCE of your own!

name: Intelligence: Anime Girls
summary: Puzzle game in which you want to build an image (with beautiful anime girls) so that the picture was like the original image. Move the puzzle tiles wisely to collect the correct order of the pieces of images.

name: in Space
summary: in Space is a procedural sidescrolling shooter that values precision and strategy over reflex or memorization. Fight through tons of enemies in three different modes, unlock new ships and new weapons. Become the best at shooting two dimensional shapes!

name: Inspector Schmidt: The Ebbing
summary: In this detective RPG, you untangle a thick web of intrigues, lies, and secrets that surround a mysterious death. Find the origin of eerie telegraph signals, question the villagers, decipher the strange symbols that are suddenly appearing all over town - and hide from the danger lurking in the moor.

name: Inago Rage
summary:
Inago Rage is a first-person shooter set in small arenas. The game starts on 1st January 1999 and it is set on Ganymede, Jupiter's largest moon. Through comic-book like sequences with manipulated photographs between levels it is shown that the arenas are simulations designed by humans. There are 50 levels in total and most of them consist of multiple platforms linked together. The player's character can freely move around, jump and shoot. It is also possible to use rocket boots for a short amount of time to cross gaps. The goal of most of the levels is to shoot a certain amount of enemies or collect a number of jewels before time expires. Many small enemies spawn at once and form swarms. There are 31 different types of enemies in total. There are power-ups that provide bonuses such as triplefire, rapidfire, splinter, slow time, boost, guardian, shield, health, neutron bomb, attractor, and lunar quake. Later levels often have a vertical design with many platforms stacked on top of each other. You respawn after falling down, with a small time penalty. The game includes a level editor to build custom levels that can be shared with other players.

The game is now provided free with a purchase of Drunken Robot Pornography which was inspired by Inago Rage.

name: Inkwell
summary: Inkwell is a mystery-puzzle-roguelike with permanent and per-run upgrades, characters to unlock, and a compelling mystery to unveil! It is a rom hack of Pokémon Emerald by DizzyEgg and Unfolding. As a "Rom Haiku" by Unfolding, it is a shorter experience then the standard "Eight Gyms" Pokémon rom hacks.

name: International Pool Championship
summary:
One of the most popular games in the world has now been accurately recreated for you to enjoy at home.

Using state of the art physics combined with easy to use control systems, International Pool Championship will son have you playing like a Pro as you move through the tables with intuitive game guides.

TV style camera angles allow you to get the most from the game play and you can even play head to head in the competitive 2 player mode.

Game Features

- Play US,UK or 9 Ball Pool against up to 32 opponents!
- Play in multiple game modes from Novice through to actual Pro-Style pol tournament tables.
- Pick the game type to suit your skill level. From Rookie through Pro to Championship level, you’ll soon rise through the ranks.
- Play against friends, family and a huge data base of computer players – or even against the clock.
- Choose between knockout or compete in leagues.
- Fantastic stats and facts options provide detail as you progress.

name: Infinity
summary: It is a role-playing game that was in development for the Game Boy Color and was supposed to be released in 2001, but development was canceled before it could end. The game, however, is about to return, 20 years later, with a Kickstarter campaign that aims not only to complete the game, but also to make physical cartridges for the Game Boy.

name: Instinction
summary: Instinction is a prehistoric action-adventure game, with combat and exploration in multiple awe inspiring natural locations. Take on treacherous beasts and embark on an unforgettable journey.

name: Inbound UFO
summary: With a style inspired by the RTS games from early 2000's, a new tower defense combines in a unique way action, tactics, replay value and fun. They are here! Choose your targets, upgrade, replay, discover your enemies and your tactical skills.

name: Indoor Sniper Shooting Alpha Strike in Corona Virus Lockdown
summary: You are the last commando left in the combat in which you need to kill all the enemies who are trying to surmount your country. Be a brave army commando, ambush and kill the enemies before they kill you. Step into the arena and get ready for an all out battle.

name: In the Rural Village of Nagoro
summary: In The Rural Village of Nagoro is a short, side-scrolling game with minimalist gameplay ‘Interact button’ to tell a fate that falls on Nagoro village. Explore and press ‘F' button’ to greet all cheerful neighborhood.

name: Insert Three Coins
summary:
Welcome, rookie. Get your three coins and try your best shot to beat all the arcade machines. This arcade have a single rule: You beat a machine, you get your coin back.

Do you have what it takes to be the arcade king?

name: Inland
summary: Inland - is a fast paced runner game. You run forward and you need to dodge dark obstacles, for each obstacle you overcome, you get one point. But if you run into at least one, you will immediately lose. How many points can you get?

name: Inspiration
summary:
Inspiration is one of the first non-Japanese Yume Nikki fangames. The game centers around a reclusive artist named Alex, who appears to live alone. His computer has broken down, so he has been reduced to reading books he has grown tired of and sleeping to explore his dream world.

Inspiration also makes use of character dialogue, which helps gain an insight into the mind of Alex and figures he sees in his dreams. Interacting with certain objects in the real world bedroom sometimes make Alex speak his thoughts on them.

name: In The Shadows
summary: Demo version of an atmospheric singleplayer campaign with three small medieval levels (two of which are remakes of the orignal E1M1 and E1M2). It features both normal gameplay and a new, very unique stealth mode. The enemy AI has been vastly improved, and there are countless visual overhauls and miscellaneous additions. Very high quality throughout. A full version was never completed.

name: In the Black
summary: In The Black is a PC space combat sim based on realism from the designers of Crysis, MechWarrior 2, and X-Wing.

name: Into The Dread
summary: Something is clearly wrong with this place! The decision to inspect a long-abandoned sewer turned out to be deadly. Will you be able to escape from this nightmare and kill everyone standing in your way?

name: Indoras: The Whispering Shard
summary: Conquer dungeons with synergy-based classes, and flexible/hybrid roles. Run through zones to reclaim the land that was once preserved by the protectors of the realm. Tactical dungeon based RPG that can be played alone or with friends up to 4 players!

name: Infinite Incantation
summary: Fight for survival as you battle massive hordes of enemies. Wield powerful spells that you can mutate and evolve to ludicrous strength. Customize your character's stats, elemental affinities, and make upgrades to become the ultimate spell-slinging force of destruction.

name: Insider Tales: The Stolen Venus 2
summary: A world-renowned painting has been stolen! Help Francesca find the masterpiece and convict the culprit! The luxury cruise ship, The Empire, is boarded by rich tourists, a world-renowned art-exhibition, and a thief. Soon the highlight of the exhibition is stolen and Francesca di Porta, the famous detective, is disturbed in her well-earned holiday to investigate undercover and prevent a panic among the passengers in Insider Tales: The Stolen Venus 2! Solve the case using your Hidden Object talents.

name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade: The Action Game
summary:
Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade: The Action Game is a side-scrolling action title based on the 1989 film of the same name.

Players control Indiana Jones through various levels that loosely follow the movie’s plot, including iconic locations like the catacombs and the Zeppelin.

Gameplay focuses on platforming, basic combat, and item collection, with limited lives and high difficulty.

The graphics and sound vary across platforms, with the Amiga and Atari ST versions generally offering the most polished presentation.

external_ids.url: https://www.twitch.tv/directory/game/Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade: The Action Game

name: Inferno
summary: Do you have what it takes to be the best firefighter ever? Fight the onslaught of fire in 20+ action-packed levels where you’ll have to outrun the clock and put the fire out before it consumes it all… even you! But beware: with a limited stash of water, you’ll need to use strategy and precision to make every drop count!

name: Increment
summary: Press buttons, pull levers, and use your body to discover a strange world in this VR game about increasing. There’s nothing “idle” about this game. Immerse yourself in weird, colorful, reactive environments in this experimental, thought-provoking, hour-long incremental adventure.

name: Invasion Survivors
summary: Invasion Survivors is a fast-paced bullet heaven and bullet hell arena shooter with roguelike elements. Explore a colorful and chaotic world where survival depends on your skills, quick reflexes, and every choice you make.

name: Internal Incident
summary: Internal Incident – a top-down survival horror extraction shooter. Explore the hidden corners of a vast facility in search of resources while fighting off terrifying creatures lurking in the dark. Unveil the secrets of the abandoned complex and do everything you can to make it out alive.

name: Insanus Express
summary: In Insanus express you will manage an express psychiatric clinic with a crazy staff! The game consists of overcoming different scenarios while trying to keep it all under control. But watch out! You can always screw up and get everyone CRAZY!

name: Interstellar Transport Company
summary: Manage a space transportation company. Supply humanity with with everything it needs to colonize the galaxy. In this tycoon game, grow your company from a local transport agency into a galactic logistics empire! Singleplayer, vs AI, and online multiplayer.

name: Intravenous Collection
summary:
Experience the full saga with the Intravenous Collection.

Immerse yourself in the tactical gameplay of Intravenous 2, now including the Intravenous: Remastered DLC - a modernized version of the original game with improved visuals and mechanics.

name: Inkronos
summary: Slay blocks in style as you race against the clock in this arena shooter. Coming in the fall. Wishlist to stay updated!

name: Insane Insects: The Inception
summary: Played over five uniquely different arenas, Insane Insects - The Inception is an airborne Quake III on steroids, a classic old-school fragging game, speed, movement and skill based.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Wheat Weapon Skin Set
summary: Harvest victory and cut down your foes with the Wheat Weapon Skin Set. This skin can be applied to six different weapons.

name: Infested Planet: Planetary Campaign
summary: You've fought battles as a squad leader. Now become the general and win the war. This expansion adds a dynamic campaign to Infested Planet. Every move on the campaign map is a tactical battle on the ground.

name: Inklings
summary: Inklings is a beautiful Lemmings-style puzzler featuring artsy hand drawn and painted levels. Use your ingenuity to guide the otherwise hapless Inklings into the goal with an array of fantastical items including the portal gun, flip gravity, and more. Inspired by the classics, Inklings is pure addictive puzzle solving in some seriously satisfying levels.

name: Infinity Nikki: Danqing Season
summary:
Version 1.8 of Infinity Nikki "Danqing Season" officially launches on July 29 (UTC-7)!

Get ready for new events, a new area, a new ability outfit, new collectibles... and so much more! Stylists, don't miss out on the excitement—dive in and explore!

name: Internet Cafe & Supermarket Simulator 2024
summary: Internet Cafe & Supermarket Simulator 2024" is a comprehensive simulation game that combines the management of both an internet cafe and a supermarket. Step into the role of a shop owner, apply your business acumen, and expand your empire step by step.

name: Internet Court
summary: A live-action comedic courtroom thriller, where YOU are the prosecution, defense and the judge!

name: Into the Unknown
summary: There's nothing scarier than waking up in the middle of the forest alone... or so it seems. Taking control of Rachel in this short, story driven, exploration game, you must find out where you are, why you're there, and most importantly, how to get out. What will you uncover when you delve into the unknown?

name: Incubo
summary: INCUBO is a side scrolling platform game with a semi-horror theme. We present many ghost from around the world in our game as enemy and bosses. You played as a child in his nightmare and discover the truth about his story.

name: Inferis: Dead Below
summary: You're a journalist searching for answers... but beneath the surface lies only terror. The labyrinth you’ve entered to find the missing may never let you leave.

name: Insignia
summary: Explore a colourful world of beautifully animated pixel art, harkening back to the golden age of 2D games. With hand drawn frame-by-frame sprites and gorgeously expansive tile-sets, playing Insignia will have you reminiscing about blowing on plastic cartridges and calling expensive hotlines for hints, no time machine required!

name: Insanitation
summary: It’s Chaos VS Order in this fast-paced battle against family & friends. Will you create Chaos as a Cat - spreading fur, mayhem, & hairballs everywhere? Or restore Order as a Keeper - cleaning & mopping up the muck before Chaos takes over? Pick a side & grab your kibble or gear, & claim victory.

name: Infinium Strike
summary: Non-stop galactic action awaits you in this arcade style tower defense game. Manage the defenses of the TSF Freedom Strike – humanity’s last hope against the hordes of invading alien spaceships.

name: Infection Bio War
summary:
INFECT the world population with the most exciting DISEASE game on the App Store.
Spread your disease using different Symptoms and Resistances!!

name: Inline: Out of Time
summary: Complete your delivery routes as fast as possible to appease your corporate overlord while still finding time to enjoy the sights of the retro-futuristic city and your banging tunes.

name: Inseparable
summary: Inseparable is a highly cooperative pc game for two players (on one keyboard), but playing solo is also possible. Placed in a fantasy world with a vintage style. This game is a fusion of adventure and action. It requires very good coordination from the players.

name: Infected
summary: Not your ordinary shooter, Infected lets your avatar invade your opponents' PSP systems with each of your multiplayer victories. In single-player mode, you play as Stevens, a New York City police officer with immunity to a virus that's spreading across New York. Only you can stop the virus from spreading by shooting infected individuals with a special "viral gun" that's loaded with bullets filled with your blood. Eliminate the virus in single-player mode, or use the PSP's Wi-Fi capabilities to spread your own virus in multiplayer combat.

name: Incaved Runner
summary: Escape a concealed, mutated monster disrupting your scavenging. Master the running, jumping, swinging, shooting and combining upgrades to end up becoming the poweful beast you initially feared, turning the cave system from a nightmarish hollow into a playground.

name: Indie Game Battle
summary: Indie Game Battle is a multiplayer fighting game for up to 8 players inspired by the Super Smash Bros series. However, IGB features indie characters instead!

name: Insert Title Here
summary: This "game" hasn't got any story or plot, any characters, any enemies ... "Insert Title Here" is an interactive experiment in which you will decide what path to choose, how to react ... something innovative which is always nice to try. This experiment will play with you, "talk" with you and put you into a mix of various game genres.

name: Interloper
summary: A space flight and combat simulator.

name: In Search of Heroes!
summary: Calling all Heroes! The age of knights is in its twilight, but the people still require your aid! Venture through various randomly-generated locales, complete quests and take down fearsome bosses. Return to your home estate to construct new buildings, equip powerful weapons, and rally new heroes!

name: Inversed World
summary: Inversed World is a simple 2D platformer game.

name: In Your Flesh
summary: A Visual novel told with handmade art dolls, created for the toxic yuri game jam. Laura lives in a big house. Ruby should not be here.

name: Indiana Jones and the Fate of Atlantis: Special Edition
summary:
As of March 2017, the development of the fan remake came to a halt as Disney and LucasFilm games stated they didn't want to share the Indy license at the moment.

“We have been told that Lucasfilm don’t want to share the Indy license with anyone right one,” the team’s Facebook page reads. “We will keep in touch with Lucasfilm people and continuously trying to obtain a deal for a full project development.”

Indiana Jones and the Fate of Atlantis Special Edition is a remake of legendary game Indiana Jones and the Fate of Atlantis (1992) made by Lucasfilm games.
Special Edition features high definition digital artwork, smooth, realistic animation, high quality music, sound effects and voice overs.

This game is in beta and it will not be released publicly until approved by Disney / Lucasfilm!

Indiana Jones and the Fate of Atlantis is a point-and-click adventure game by Lucasfilm games, originally released in 1992.
Disney. All rights reserved.

name: Inkjet Apocalypse
summary: Inkjet Apocalypse is a hand-drawn 2D shoot 'em up with rogue-like elements. Step into the shoes of a Work From Home Mercenary living in 1998, and pilot a Combat Marionette from the comfort of your own home as you take on contracts, earn upgrades, and rise through the ranks of the mercenary world.

name: Infinite Mansion
summary: A Lovecraftian roguelike where every run is a new mystery. Choose your investigator, explore a procedurally generated mansion, solve evolving story puzzles, and survive tactical combat against otherworldly horrors... or become part of the madness.

name: Injustice 3
summary:
A new Injustice game was rumored due to repeated news around the franchise though the initial job listing would suggest that it is a long way off.

In June a job listing from Warner Bros. Games, that is still listed as of October 2020, for a Principal Software Engineer to work on the graphics of a next-gen vision of the Mortal Kombat and Injustice franchise.

In July it was brought up when the author of the Injustice tie-in comics teased a continuation of that series. The later announcement, of Injustice Year Zero, was not connected to a new game.

In August a teaser image was posted by BossLogic ahead of the DC FanDome event using the title Injustic3.

name: Invasive Species
summary: Invasive Species is a couch co-op tower defense game where you and your friend plant towers in pots to protect your grandparents greenhouse from the robot invasion! Get scrap from defeating enemies and buy upgrades in the catalogue to fend off against more difficult waves of enemies.

name: Incen(diary)
summary: A sci-fi psychological-horror sound novel. Wake up the old system AI, !Rue, and have her unlock the archive logs. Find out what happened to our subjects of interest; girl named Kui and her companion, designation C-06.

name: InfiniPicross 3: Original Puzzles
summary: The original picross puzzles from the Infinipicross 2.0 game, ported to InfiniPicross 3. (If you own the original game, buy this DLC through the bundle.)

name: In Nightmare
summary:
Closing his heart to reality, our protagonist falls into a deep slumber and awakens in a nightmarish dreamworld. In Nightmare is a narrative-driven horror adventure game combining sneak action with diverse puzzles. It follows a young boy in search for the last hope of love who is working out his own salvation by navigating through his fear.

Experiencing effects of a broken family, and the heartache it brings, a young child will escape reality into a dark, whimsical world created from his own memories. This sets him on his journey to uncover what truly lies within. Having suffered in reality, his past trauma turns into terrifying monsters that want to keep him in an eternal nightmare. With the help of his dream spirit, the boy will find ways to sneak past enemies, overcome intricate puzzles, embrace his fear, and uncover the truth so that he may be able to purify the monsters he has created, and finally wake up.

Will you overcome what you fear or be caught in the nightmare?

name: Infinite Cards
summary: Discover infinite cards in this roguelike deckbuilder. Every card is unique, every run a new experience. Craft, combine, and build your deck completely freely to defeat enemies and bosses, or take on cleverly designed puzzle challenges!

name: Infiniclick
summary: Combine, automate and upgrade programs to amass a fortune! Infiniclick is a relaxing (or not, it's up to you) incremental game in which your goal is to pay an unfair debt with Fun Corp.

name: Interspace
summary: Let's crush the space barriers at full speed! Interspace is a fast paced one-button arcade game where you'll have to aim and blast through space barriers to get the highest score possible!

name: In Your Nightmares!
summary: This game is a survival game where you will have to survive five nightmares and escape with your life from the demons that are trying to get you. It's interesting because you have to fulfill a series of challenges to survive and reach the end of the game.

name: Insanitorium: Don’t Be Afraid
summary: Trapped in a psychiatric hospital, you must escape demons lurking in the shadows.Explore Insanitorium only with your flashlight and scarce batteries, defend yourself with a machete and a dart gun, and face the strange patients. Remember, do not listen to the mannequins that whisper inside your head.

name: Infinity Tower
summary: Climb a deadly tower as fast as you can in this intense platformer. Timer is ticking — dodge obstacles and collect nuts on your way to the top!

name: In Her Eyes
summary: A maiden(Meme) from another world is trying to summon you to help her prevent an assassination that is going to happen in 30 days. Your choice will not only affect your card deck and your battle style, but also affect the personality of the girl, which may lead to different ending.

name: Insect Revolution VR
summary: You’ve spent years working your behind off as part of the Doomsday Force, the secret military elite squad that got stuck dealing with every apocalyptic threat. Yeah, it was a thankless job, but you don’t care. You’ve finally retired to your own private tropical island.

name: Incantation
summary: "Incantation" is a first-person horror mystery game adapted from a movie of the same name. The game reveals the chilling story behind "Chen Village" from the movie. A mother searching for her missing daughter accidentally stumbles into a village filled with mysterious cults. Beyond the palpable madness and fear in the village, there's a sinister force that drives one to despair. What happens when one crosses the forbidden line of this evil deity?

name: Infinity Wanderer
summary: Infinity Wanderer is a roguelite, souls-lite action-platformer. Players dive into Lunara's dark story, facing her fears in a nightmare world. With handcrafted levels and deep character customization, it offers fluid, challenging combat that blends fast-paced and strategic souls-like mechanics.

name: Inazuma Eleven GO: Shadow
summary: Inazuma Eleven Go is the fourth installment of the popular Inazuma Eleven series and the first part of the second trilogy. A role-playing game blended with football, players must scout and recruit characters, creating a truly personalised squad you can then battle with friends in multiplayer matches.

name: Intelligent Design: An Evolutionary Sandbox
summary: Intelligent Design: An Evolutionary Sandbox is an abstract god game with fully simulated genetics and evolution. In a universe driven by targets, create, design and try to control an evolving ecosystem for a faceless corporation.

name: Into the Emberlands: Supporter Pack
summary:
For all those who want to go the extra mile to support the developers of Into the Emberlands, the supporter pack offers a collection of bonus content.
Three skins for the Lightbearer: The Stubborn, The Determined, The Fanatic
A mysterious pet: The flying Platypus
The original soundtrack: Brighten your mood with the nine wholesome tracks of Into the Emberlands
The digital Artbook

name: Invasher
summary: One day somewhere in a world. The enemy has invaded. They separated around. Now it's time for our hero, who will save this world!!

name: Indie Darling Bundle Vol. 1
summary: Three indie favourites from Digerati! This bundle contains Slain: Back From Hell, Three Fourths Home, and Uncanny Valley. Slain: Back from Hell: A heavy-metal inspired arcade combat game from the makers of Valfaris. Stunning pixel art visuals, challenging old-school gameplay, gore galore, and the most metal soundtrack you've ever heard! Three Fourths Home: An IGF finalist for 'Excellence in Narrative'. Set in Nebraska, this visual short story follows an extended conversation between Kelly and her family during a drive home through an intense thunderstorm. Uncanny Valley: Nothing is as it seems in this unsettling, story-driven survival horror. Explore an isolated facility and solve its many mysteries. The choices you make have meaningful consequences that will determine your fate.

name: In the Valley of Death
summary: In the Valley of Death features a unique set of mechanics where the player controls Red and Blue, each character having their set of abilities, as they fight their way through colored enemies, where each enemy is vulnerable to a weapon with the same color they have, providing players with a unique challenge as they venture further into the game.

name: Inductor
summary: Inductor is a sci-fi puzzle first-person shooter with the elements of a car simulator. The game combines puzzles and a lot of action in a large open world. Embark on an exciting journey. Save the world from the awakened evil.

name: In Fear I Trust: Episode 3 - Iron and Rust
summary: “In Fear I Trust” 3rd Episode tells us about the strange events at the local factory. They took place when the player used to work there. The mysterious deaths, the mysterious inspectors. Advancing the episode, the player tries to find out what is really going on and how this is related to VERSA company. Why are people dying on a scheduled basis?

name: Industria
summary: Industria is a first-person shooter that takes you from East Berlin into a parallel reality, shortly before the end of the Cold War. On the search for a missing work colleague, you decipher a dark past in a mysterious and surreal steampunk world.

name: Incremental Epic Hero
summary: Incremental, Idle, RPG, Japanese Anime Game! Incremental Epic Hero is a free-to-play idle game with Japanese cute anime!

name: Inspector Javert and the Oath of Blood
summary:
Inspector Javert and the Oath of Blood is an adventure mystery game set in Paris, 1832, beginning the morning after the barricades fell on the famed June Rebellion.

​Inspired by Victor Hugo's literary classic Les Miserables and real historical events, Inspector Javert and the Oath of Blood deviates from the novel at the point where the eponymous Inspector jumps into the river Seine. Instead of meeting his fate in the murky waters Javert survives and grows to discover a new lease on life.

Play as Inspector Javert as you delve into cases, solve crimes, fight alongside your allies, and discover what it means to be alive.

name: In a search of a new home
summary: Are you ready to enjoy the adventure of the fox and help him find a home? A lot of different locations, obstacles, enemies, nice music and other bonuses are waiting for you in this platform game!

name: Intertwined Fate with a Cat Demon
summary: The human, Yi, was accidentally infected by a “blood cicada” on the road and ran into Hitomi, a cat demon who was hunting the blood cicada. Faced by Yi, the human who was scared and also infected, the cat demon chose to stay with Yi, in order to protect and to observe her…

name: Invaders Inc. - Alien Plague
summary: Alien Plague is afast-paced strategy simulation game where you take control of an alien invasion against planet Earth. Lead your invaders to victory and wipe out the human race.

name: Infinity Slime Dungeon
summary: Infinity Slime Dungeon is an Idle RPG roguelite where you guide Jeffrey the Slime on his quest for freedom! Face off against 15 unique enemies in endless waves, collecting souls from each victory to upgrade Jeffrey’s stats and abilities. After every battle, you’ll make a crucial choice: restart and strengthen Jeffrey further with his earned souls, or forge ahead to the next foe, risking it all for greater rewards. Push Jeffrey to new heights—or depths—in his escape!

name: In Purr-Suit
summary: A hidden object game where you need to find over 500 mischievous cats. Prepare for the great purr-suit!

name: Insaniquarium!
summary: Insaniquarium is a virtual pets simulator with a blend of elements from action, strategy, and puzzle video games. In the game, the player must manage a tank of guppies and other aquatic creatures, and each stage begins with two guppies in the tank. Guppies and other fish drop coins, which can be collected by the player and used to purchase fish food and upgrades, such as more aquatic creatures, food that can keep the fish full for a longer period of time, and laser upgrades to repel attackers. The coins will disappear if they reach the bottom of the tank. Each creature must be kept alive by feeding.

name: Intruder
summary: A home invasion thriller

name: Intergalactic Cage Match
summary: Fight for your life against the best in the Universe in this fast paced intergalactic wrestling match which puts you in the ring with 6 of the toughest characters you could ever wish to meet!

name: Invert
summary: In Invert you press buttons around a tile grid that flip a certain pattern of tiles. Your goal is to make all tiles the same color using as few moves as possible. Easy to solve, but hard to solve well.

name: Into The Depths
summary: A roguelike city builder, where you colonize the mysterious underworld. Build your settlement, explore the caves and colonize the deepest caverns. Overcome the dangers hidden in the dark and make the riches of the Depths yours!

name: Indiepocalypse #49
summary: Issue #49 of a monthly indie game anthology collecting games from 10 developers.

name: Invention 6
summary: Invention 6 is a 3D shooter with Scrollshooter elements, as well as a small share of logical puzzles that must be solved to complete the level. Learn the story of Casey and Dorian, shoot robots and zombies, and fight powerful bosses to the fiery Heavy Metal.

name: Inscryption: Kaycee's Mod
summary: Kaycee's Mod is a free mini-expansion for Inscryption that hacks Leshy’s Cabin into an endless, and increasingly challenging, roguelike. Apply different skulls to your run to ascend the Challenge Levels. Reaching new levels unlocks new cards, challenges, and dev logs inscribed by the late Kaycee Hobbes as she uncovered the secrets on the disk.

name: In Gehenna Fantasy Heroine Edition
summary: Turn based rpg, recruit allies, raise levels and battle against the conflicts of the world

name: Interstate '82
summary:
It’s 1982. Auto-terrorism is running rampant while the U.S. languishes in crisis. Groove Champion goes missing and it’s up to Taurus to find him before he becomes a tire track in an all-out war on wheels. Warm up the engine, reload your roof-mounted machine guns, and head on out to the Interstate ‘82. 
 
Interstate ‘82 features fully charged vehicular combat along with accurate car-handling physics, including realistic suspension and fishtail spins in over 40 missions. A new feature of Interstate ‘82 is the ability to get out of the car, car-jack another driver’s ride, and even run for cover if the need arises.

name: Infinite Seek and Find
summary: Welcome to your ultimate hidden object challenge. Infinite Seek and Find offers a wide selection of image sets and customizable difficulty level - from a basic level where only the size matters to the most hardcore challenge, where the colors can trick you.

name: Incur Survival
summary: A Survival open-world game. Gather resources, Hunt, Craft tools and armor, Tame Animals, Ride Animals, Build, and defend your base from creatures, and other players.

name: In the Service of Mrs. Claus
summary: You’re the only elf who can save Christmas from the forces of darkness! Clash with cults, gods, and giant corporations to preserve Mrs. Claus's empire.

name: Invocation
summary:
Necromancers and demons have captured you, imprisoned you, and destined you for certain death, escape from the prisons.

Join the wizards and challenge the demons buried in the depths of the earth; sword, bow, and magic will be your weapons during this battle. Render services to the spirits that accompany the wizards and learn to summon them.

name: Injustice 2: Fighter Pack 1
summary: The first three DLC characters for Injustice 2. Batman’s second protégé, Red Hood, royal exile from Tamaran, Starfire, and the leader of the Lin Kuei, Sub-Zero join the fight.

name: Inferos Numine: Descent Into Darkness
summary: Forge your path through the unknown kingdom. Explore a variety of landscapes and caverns infested with vast monsters and creatures. Battle your way through and explore the kingdom in this 2.5D Style shooter-platform-fighting game.

name: Infinite Jump
summary: "Infinite jump" is a leisure game. Players need to press the space to let the ball jump through the obstacles. The difficulty of the game level will increase with the increase of the number.

name: Indemon Tales
summary: Earn the respect of a guild full of monsters and demons as a lone human by taking part in dangerous dungeon adventures and uncover secrets behind the mysterious demon kingdom of Tarborea.

name: Indiana Jones and the Infernal Machine
summary: 1947. The Nazis have been crushed, the Cold War has begun and Soviet agents are sniffing around the ruins of the fabled Tower of Babel. What are they up to? The CIA wants renowned archaeologist and adventurer Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. to find out. Grab your whip and fedora and join Indy in a globe-spanning race to unearth the mysterious "Infernal Machine."

name: Into the Dead
summary:
In a world overrun with the Dead, you have survived… but for how long?

In a world overrun with the Dead, you have survived… but for how long?

Into the Dead throws you into the gruesome world of the zombie apocalypse where there are no second chances. Do what you have to in order to stay alive, keep moving as fast as you can, and protect yourself by any means necessary. When the Dead are rising, run!

name: Invertigo
summary: Invertigo is a first-person sci-fi puzzle-platformer where you have to manipulate gravity to solve puzzles. Explore the abandoned facility and make use of gravity manipulation to advance through the rooms.

name: In Their Shoes
summary: From the first day of spring, to the last day of winter, wear seven shoes of seven characters and live their most intimate moments. Explore their thoughts, choose their steps and shape their paths in a mumblecore narrative game where the most extraordinary setting is ordinary life itself.

name: Inconvenience Store
summary: Take on the role of a spirit condemned to forced labor in a store in The Afterlife​​ Your salvation is to buy a ticket to Paradise and escape by any means necessary. ​If you fail to manage the store, Hell will be waiting for you.

name: Into Evil
summary: In this modernized take on old-school roguelikes! Explore a vast megadungeon where death lurks around every corner! Battle nightmarish foes in frenetic real time combat! Brand yourself with the souls of fallen heroes!

name: In The Dark 2
summary:
A devastating virus threatens to cripple the Galactic Federations Chief Neural Core, threatening to put an end to intergalactic travel and turning a galaxy-spanning empire into mere island settlements - disconnected and alone.

Ikalo Pann, Captain of the Starship Leviathan, must track down the source of this virus and bring the unknown terrorists before the Federation to answer for their crimes. An encrypted message sent by a dead man offers a single thread to unwind the mystery. Within are galactic coordinates and a brief message: "Come find me, Pann..."

Join Ikalo as she solves hundreds of complex puzzles, explores planets for clues and uncovers a deep science fiction mystery.

name: Infected Mushroom Pinball
summary: Wether you´re a music lover, a hardcore pinball fan or just curious about pushing boundaries of virtual experiences, Infected Mushroom Pinball is your gateway to next-level audiovisual immersion, where the line between real and virtual blurs.

name: Ines
summary: Experience a unique psychological horror set in the 90s with retro style. Solve complex puzzles and uncover ominous rituals of a secret society. Immerse yourself in someone else's past and feel deep emotional pain and fears. Face your own demons and uncover dark secrets that will keep you on edge.

name: Infinite Turtles
summary:
You are but a cog in in infinite machine. Yet you are all the cogs. There is no end and no beginning. Only computation.

There are only a handful of base components to master. Clone replicates a token. Filter redirects a zero of Nul token to another path. A lock will not allow a token through until it has been unlocked from the side. Switch directs tokens left or right, which can be selected by supplying a token at the other end. And finally a nullifier converts a zero to a Nul and vice-versa. All other units in the game are ones made by you.

name: Infamous: Second Son - Paper Trail
summary:
Paper Trail is a site that is centered around Infamous: Second Son. Its purpose is to have a series of mini-games released on a weekly basis which eventually leads to free DLC for people who participate in the events.

As of December 16, 2018, the website is no longer active, but the in-game missions are still playable.

Paper Trail began a week before the release of Second Son and launched a series of quizzes that would, by the time Second Son came out, be used to start a small series of events inside the game.

By completing each "episode" the player would gain Karmic points which track the player's progress throughout the event game.

name: Infamous: Second Son - Limited Edition
summary:
This edition, when pre-ordered, also comes with the exclusive Cole's Legacy.

Cole's Legacy is an expansion pack for Infamous: Second Son which was initially available only by pre-ordering the game (For US Customers), or purchasing the Special Edition (All other Countries).

The pack contains missions uncovering the events which happened during the seven year time span between the activation of the RFI in Infamous 2 and the storyline of Infamous: Second Son. This is the only time when Zeke Dunbar makes a cameo appearance and Dr. Sebastian Wolfe's brother Raymond Wolfe appears in a cameo as well.

After completion of Cole's Legacy, the Cole's original bike courier jacket is awarded for in-game use. The design of the jacket is slightly different compared to the first two games of the series. In this game, the design of the jacket shows some tears in the front and the back of the jacket and rather than the yellow pads being sewed up on top of the black jacket, the yellow and the black are sewn together imitating as a jacket pad-less. There are also some more minor changes such as the zipper on the jacket is also revealed due to Delsin wearing it without zipping it up and covering it, and also small changes to the collar area of the jacket.

Since June 25, 2014, European Infamous: Second Son players can now access the Cole’s Legacy’ DLC from the PlayStation Store

name: Injustice 2: Infinite Transforms
summary: Allows you to Transform Gear without using Source Crystals.

name: Injustice 2: John Stewart
summary: Special skin that turns Hal Jordan Green Lantern into John Stewart Green Lantern - includes new appearance, moves, and dialogue.

name: Incarceration
summary:
It's inCARceration -- a one of a kind warioware-style minigame collection!!!!!!

You have been trapped in your car by an oppressive legal system (american) and your only hope of escape is to gain parole -- by completing a series of strange and surreal jobs!!!!

Do you have what it takes to earn parole, or will you be executed for your failures?

name: In Loving, Oblivion
summary:
I have always been in love with my best friend, that won't change even after he lays his eyes on you.

Right?

name: Internet Entrepreneurship Simulator
summary: In the context of the first Internet wave sweeping the world, can the player play the role of an entrepreneur who has failed many times but never gives up, and become the world's number one Internet company in this great era?

name: Into the Underdusk
summary: A stagnant world slowly sinking into the depths of forgetfulness. You alone must brave this world on a quest to regain your lost locket and regain your memories before it's too late. Choose your path through an eery pixel art landscape, brave brutal precision-platforming gauntlets, meet strange denizens and grab collectibles to increase your powerset in a bid to regain your very soul.

name: Infinite Runner
summary: Dive into the ultimate test of reflexes and agility in Infinite Runner. With simple controls and an addictive gameplay loop, you'll find yourself immersed in an infinite adventure where every hop counts.

name: Infinitrap: Ohio Jack and the cup of Eternity
summary:
InfiniTrap is a fast paced maze game for hardcore players. The game will start off with 40 levels and will be available on Windows, OSX and Linux.

Every level starts with the player character standing on the start tile. The start tile is perfectly safe-- No, trust me. It's safe. Once you leave the start tile, you have a limited time to reach the treasure before the level crushes you. To complicate things, each level will include a number of obstacles to waste your time and possibly kill you. You can make your own levels!

This game will make you ragequit and break your computer or become a god-like speedrunner :)

name: Interactive Sex: Futanari BDSM
summary: A simple interactive sex game with juicy animations and graphics. Choose from various Futanari BDSM sex acts and positions to make the girl cum while watching out for your stamina.

name: Infectonator 3: Apocalypse
summary: A campy, crazy pixelart zombie apocalypse arcade sim where you're the bad guy. Drop your virus and spread it across the globe while you unlock a whole horde of bizarre undead to do your bidding.

name: Interim Crossroads
summary: A visual novel with choices and consequences, set in a purgatory dimension where we must complete certain tasks before we are deemed worthy to move on. Build trust and romance, confront the past, and choose the future.

name: Incursion Red River
summary: Incursion Red River is a tactical first-person extraction shooter set in war-torn modern day Vietnam. Exclusively single-player and co-op gameplay! Customize your loadout, complete contracts & extract, or die trying!

name: Infinity
summary: Magic the beautiful girl with the power of stone. Fun puzzles and beautiful and sexy illustrations are fun. Let's complete all stages. Girls are waiting for you.

name: Indiepocalypse #56
summary: Issue #56 of a monthly indie game anthology collecting games from 10 developers.

name: Inevitable Light
summary: Survive and explore the vast and brutal desert of the INEVITABLE LIGHT. Shelter-in during sand storms, make fire during freezing nights, walk in the shade on boiling hot days, and most of all, stay away from the hyenas. Think through your next move. Resources are scarce. Death is inevitable.

name: Into a Hearth Yonder
summary: Forge genuine bonds with artificial allies and real friends in Viteria. Craft, explore, and befriend both the diverse cast of Settlers and the native Automata in order to unravel secrets and help the island thrive.

name: Into the Mine
summary: Old-school-inspired SHOOTER. Steal a treasure map from a gang of murderous bandits before heading into the darkness of an ancient mine. Avoid dangerous environmental hazards while battling deadly cursed enemies as you search for gold in this atmospheric single-player adventure!

name: Intravenous 2: IV1 Remaster
summary: Described by its developer as "Intravenous 1 2.0", Intraveous 2: IV1 Remaster is a remaster of Intravenous (2021) using assets and features from Intravenous 2 (2024) released as downloadable content for the latter.

name: Inkbound
summary: Go on co-op adventures in Inkbound, an online roguelike from the creators of Monster Train. Craft powerful character builds in procedurally generated runs and battle your way past the inky hordes with a unique active battle system.

name: Inverse Ninjas vs. The Public Domain
summary: Fight off increasingly powerful ninjas as some of the most iconic characters of all time in this 2-4 player party game!

name: Interwoven Dream
summary: Interwoven Dream is a Victorian-era visual novel set in 1800s London that follows four reunited friends investigating a series of mysterious disappearances. The narrative unfolds through multiple character perspectives as they explore the city's hidden underbelly, where the line between dreams and reality becomes increasingly unclear.

name: Infinite Blue
summary:
A pinging sound signals a notification on your phone – a chatroom app has been mysteriously downloaded that can’t be uninstalled. You’re not the only one.

You and six strangers, all living near the same city with different backgrounds and lifestyles, come together to try and understand why and how you were chosen to be a part of the app. As the days pass and you become immersed into each other’s lives, it’s not long before these strangers begin to take an interest in you. At the same time, a literal and figurative storm is brewing, and somehow, you’re at the center of it.

As love blossoms and thunderclouds form, your choices will change the course of everyone’s lives forever.

name: Infinite Lagrange
summary: Infinite Lagrange puts you at the head of a galactic fleet and lets you travel through uncharted space. You’ll use stargates to hop from area to area, coming across lost cities and alien fleets from friends and foes alike. You’ll start off with three to five ships, but once you construct a spaceport and upgrade your tech, you’ll be able to expand your fleet considerably. You can also design a plethora of different ships for your varying needs, from constructing frigates for cargo to forging battlecruisers to defend yourself.

name: Inkshade
summary: Inkshade is a turn-based tactics game carved out of strange wooden miniatures, wrapped in a web of locked rooms, and orchestrated by an otherworldly game master. Victory is not guaranteed, and the only constant is the cruel black ink that flows within the pieces.

name: Inertial Drift
summary: An arcade racer that tears up the rule book with innovative twin-stick controls, completely re-imagined driving mechanics and a huge roster of fiercely individual cars and tracks.

name: Incredipede
summary:
Incredipede is a puzzle game that celebrates the vast diversity of life in the world. The game follows Quozzle, a lone Incredipede on a quest to rescue her sisters. She has a unique ability to grow new arms and legs wherever she needs them, transforming into a snake, a spider, a horse, a monkey - anything you can imagine. You can give her antlers or a tail, use nature as a blueprint or strike out in weird new directions. Control Quozzle as she learns to swing through the trees, climb sheer cliffs, dance over rivers of lava, and even soar through the air on thermal winds.

Incredipede was made by a small team headed by Colin Northway, author of Fantastic Contraption. It was written while traveling in over a dozen countries including Honduras, Turkey, Japan, and Costa Rica.
publishers: Colin Northway with art by Thomas Shahan

name: Indie Pogo
summary:
"Indie Pogo is a platform brawler game for 2-4 players about bouncing, ricocheting, and pogoing your friends into oblivion!

It’s sort of like if we replaced the cast of Smash Bros. with 30+ indie fighters and gave them all trampolines to fight on.

Inspired by games like Super Smash Bros, Legend of the Mystical Ninja, and League of Legends, we are developing a competitive yet quirky game that is easy to learn yet difficult to master.

After collaborating with over 50 studios across 15 different countries, we're striving to create the ultimate indie crossover!"

name: Inkulinati
summary: Inkulinati is an ink-based strategy straight from medieval manuscripts, where a rabbit’s bum can be deadlier than a dog's sword. Become a master of the Living Ink, build your own bestiary, defeat medieval superstars and collect perks to unleash hidden powers.

name: Intlovert Game Club
summary: A lot of unique Japanese nerds appear one after another! Let's enjoy the exciting daily life with him, a member of the nerds circle who is interested in you!

name: Inkwellers
summary: Online 2 player co-op puzzle adventure game, you and your friend become the Inkwellers! Dwellers of stories who venture into journals to uncover their true meaning. With your friend, you'll explore hidden worlds, solve tricky puzzles, and uncover secrets.

name: Infinite Space
summary: Infinite Space, a role playing game exclusively for the Nintendo DS portable handheld system, takes place in outer space and gives players the ability to control, build, outfit and customize more than 150 spaceships. Infinite Space stretches the DS hardware to the limit, offering over 200 characters and the ability to control multiple spaceships at any one time. Releasing in 2009 and currently being produced by Atsushi Inaba and directed by Hifumi Kouno (from developer Nude Maker), Infinite Space is one of the most complex RPG titles developed for the DS to date, and shows PlatinumGames commitment to teaming up with the most creative minds in gaming.

name: Interstellar Dragon: Into the depths... of space!
summary: Camer the Dragon is in a UFO in the depths of space, when suddenly a massive wave of Asteroids/Meteoroids show up! Avoid them for as long as you can!

name: Incredible Mandy
summary: Experience a fantastic adventure across vast landscapes. From mountain top to canyon deep, from sea shores to hidden corridors, search for clues and solve the creative puzzles never seen elsewhere; use the sword in your hand and wisdom in your mind to challenge the overwhelmingly huge foes.

name: Insane 2
summary:
Insane 2 offers a number of innovations in the off-road racing genre. Besides the traditional time trial mode, the game features 9 other game modes, including the popular “Capture the flag”, “Gate hunt” and “Pathfinder”, as well as some new competitions, such as bonus hunting, territory control and helicopter pursuit. All of these modes are also available in multiplayer, with up to eight players participating simultaneously. 
 
More than one hundred and fifty races combined into championships and cup competitions take place in Europe, America, Africa and the Antarctic. The game has an enormous variety of long distance tracks: sand and snowy deserts, high-speed roads and impassable cross-country paths, African beaches and deserted Antarctic stations. 
 
The game features 18 vehicles of different classes, from buggies to monstrous “Bigfoots”, as well as an additional prototype class. Rating points won in the races can be used to upgrade any of the vehicles, from a selection of 15 running gear, body or engine upgrade alternatives. Each vehicle is furnished with a detailed destruction system. Reaching the end of a course without suffering any losses is an enormous challenge that only a select few are able to accomplish. The opponents, who constantly create extreme situations, aren’t the only danger: players also need to watch out for railway crossings, heavy tanker trucks and even lightning in stormy weather.

name: Inuyasha: Fuuun Emaki
summary: Inuyasha: Fuuun Emaki is an Adventure game, developed and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: In a Bit of Tales
summary: In a Bit of Tales is a unique horror anthology game featuring seven spine-chilling stories delivered in an omakase-style experience. Explore haunting dreams, mysterious cults, ghostly schools, and more!

name: Intergalactic Bubbles
summary: Blast your way through space in this innovative 3D bubble puzzler! Bounce, bobble, swing, and explode bubbles across the universe. Intergalactic Bubbles advances the classic match-3 genre into the 21st century with stellar graphics, 3D action, and upgrades.

name: Interpoint
summary: Interpoint is a first-person sci-fi mystery with elements of psychological horror. A secret organization made the discovery of parallel worlds. You are Harry G., a scientist, who took part in a project that was supposed to benefit all of humanity.

name: Invention 7
summary: The game combines a first-person shooter with easy puzzles, as well as a scrolling shooter mode, where the player will have to fly a space plane.

name: In Search of Freedom
summary: In Search of Freedom combines close-quarters and ranged combat with environmental puzzle solving. The game rewards creativity: using the environment, combining different Blaster chargers, and coordinating enemy waves are the keys to survival. This isn’t just about shooting — it’s about thinking, improvising, and adapting your arsenal to every threat.

name: Into the Inferno
summary: Explore this top-down dungeon crawler with semi-randomized levels. Find items like a boomerang and bow and more to defeat enemies, and collect soul crystals to access boss rooms.

name: In Death
summary: Created exclusively for VR, In Death is a Roguelite Shooter set in the godless afterlife. Battle through procedurally generated levels and dungeons in intense ranged combat, coupled with a unique locomotion system perfectly attuned to your fighting style.

name: Indoorlands
summary: Indoorlands is an amusement park management game where you can control your rides and freely design your halls. Create and expand your individual indoor park to inspire your visitors. Let your creativity run wild, but keep an eye on your finances!

name: In The Middle Of
summary: In the Middle Of is a narrative adventure of mystery and fantasy. Isolated in a cabin next to an ancient forest, Shafer will discover that the world is not as banal and logical as he believes and he will be surrounded by enigmatic characters, creatures and extraordinary events.

name: Interquel Mùjiān Zhé
summary:
The traitor of the Immortals, Ye Jiming, in a desperate attempt to escape pursuit, used the legendary Yeming Relic, said to have the power to shatter the barriers between three thousand worlds.

When Ye Jiming awakens again, he finds himself surrounded not only by a completely unfamiliar otherworldly landscape, but also by strangely familiar faces, seemingly bound to him by fate...

name: Infiltrate
summary: You are a secret agent on a mission of crucial importance. Your mission is to infiltrate a top secret fortress. You must capture enemy documents and get out alive. Your challenge: the diabolical maze of corridors and elevators designed to confuse you and keep you from the documents. Your danger: enemy assassins programmed to shoot on sight. Your weapon: a high-power laser gun as powerful as that of the enemy. Your advantage: you're sharp enough to duck when they shoot. It's a hectic chase. Hop an elevator. Survive enemy fire. Fire back. Duck. Infiltrate...if you dare!

name: Into the Cannon, Soldier!
summary: You are the commander on the last line of defense. Hold your base, recruit soldiers, and launch them via cannon to another collapsing front. A cooperative (1-2 players) tactical defense game where your decisions decide the fate of two battles.

name: Into the Dark
summary: Into The Dark, is a third-person perspective Psychological horror/survival game inspired by games like Silent Hill and Resident Evil. It puts you in the shoes of a thief, who in hope of finding something EXTRAORDINARY enters the Quinson Villa, a place locked down, for decades, no one knows why no one knows what crawls inside, but the only thing they do know, is it hides something!

name: Infected: The Twin Vaccine Collector's Edition
summary: Search for a missing girl who holds the key to stopping a global epidemic in Infected: The Twin Vaccine! A new breed of virus has spread throughout the City of Oxford forcing the area to be quarantined. The first reported case of the virus was found in 6 year old twin sisters Tiffany & Theresa Morrisey. Tiffany never survived the infection but Theresa made a full recovery and is now believed to be the key to finding a cure. In the chaos of a city-wide evacuation, Theresa has gone missing. You must travel back to the abandoned city of Oxford to find her before the virus spreads globally. Though be wary...you’re not the only one back in town.

name: Infinity R
summary: Welcome to Infinity R, an IDLE where the road is endless, the drops are regular, and the only thing standing between you and victory is... well, a bunch of pesky tolls and a never-ending fuel gauge!

name: Intruders
summary: Intruders is a survival horror / strategy game where you get kidnapped and in order to save your life you will need to survive five nights. Use camera system and environment to defend yourself against several intruders.

name: Inventory Quest: Hero's Hoard
summary: Inventory Quest: Hero's Hoard is a short and fast-paced inventory management and loadout optimization game. The player must upkeep a hero's loadout from random item drops and try to survive as long as possible to achieve a new high score.

name: Intonight
summary: In "Intonight" dive into an emotional journey under dazzling neon lights, where love collides with betrayal. Witnessing your girlfriend's infidelity at a nightclub shatters your world, pushing you to seek a fresh start amidst nightlife's temptations and challenges.

name: Invisible
summary:
You are in a closed space craft. Your aim is to survive even though you defeat other passengers.
This is a multiplayer battle royal type FPS game that is casual and easy to play.
The aim of the game is to survive and defeat other players as many as possible.

name: Infection Crisis: Fight For Life
summary: Welcome to Infection Crisis : Fight for life. This is without a budget survival game made by a single developer. A zombie apocalypse has happened in your country. Player must survive on this road.

name: Into the Fold: Nala Junction
summary: A fast-paced boomer shooter set in a strange mountain town. Blast through enemies, explore deadly levels, and fight to survive. Inspired by classic '90s games.

name: Into the Fold: Nala Junction
summary: A fast-paced boomer shooter set in a strange mountain town. Blast through enemies, explore deadly levels, and fight to survive. Inspired by classic '90s games.

name: Insula: Bounty Royale
summary: Insula: Bounty Royale is a fast-paced, intense PvP arena shooter with heavy PvE elements. A fully intertwined story advanced by accomplishments in the multiplayer arenas and some of the most addictive high octane aerial combat to be found, make for a truly unique play experience.

name: Insanity Within
summary:
Step into the shattered mind of a man haunted by his past in this chilling psychological horror puzzle game. Return to the eerie, riddled manor where you once lived with your wife and daughter, a place steeped in tragedy and shadowed by accusations. Imprisoned for a murder you can’t recall committing, you’re drawn back to uncover the truth, battling the relentless grip of schizophrenia that twists your reality with every step.

Navigate a series of mind-bending puzzles that test not just your wits, but your sanity. As your mental health unravels, the world around you distorts and nightmares seep into reality. Scavenge for meds to hold the madness at bay, but time is your enemy, and every moment pushes you closer to the edge.

With each puzzle you conquer, uncover heartfelt letters from your daughter, addressed to you, piecing together the heartbreaking story of your family’s collapse. Search the manor’s forgotten corners for hidden artifacts that reveal its sinister secrets and the fractured memories you’ve buried deep.

As you descend deeper into the manor’s depths, brace yourself for a devastating revelation. This is a journey of guilt, grief, and discovery where every answer comes at a cost.

name: In The Shadows
summary: Embark on a short yet captivating journey in "In The Shadows". Player must manipulate abstract objects, harnessing the power of light and shadow, to cast silhouettes that form familiar shapes and objects.

name: In Season
summary: In Season is a chaotic and fun couch Co-op game! Complete orders in time by planting and harvesting crops correctly and gain enough stars to make it to the next season!

name: Invasion Deutschland
summary: Alien monsters fall over Germany and have taken over the rule. Buildings throughout Germany are besieged by them.
