summary: Welcome to Indus, an Indo-Futuristic Battle Royale featuring a next-gen tactical battle royale experience, a never-before-seen Grudge feature, a unique Cosmium win condition, groundbreaking Avatars, deep lore, immersive graphics, and more in TPS/FPS battle royale mobile gaming. Join our Open Beta and step into the world of Virlok, where your gameplay experience will help shape the future of Indus. Be limitless. Be a Mythwalker. Crafted in India for the World

name: Interlude
summary:
Interlude is a 1 - 2 player adult-oriented sex game for multiple systems.

The player or players answer a short quiz regarding their sexual preferences and mood. The game then recommends a sexual interlude from a manual containing 106 possible encounters.

name: Inky Caps Clash
summary:
Who will win the match? The team that paints more ground when the music ends!
Inky Caps Clash is a local multiplayer family game in which players compete for territory either individually or teaming up. Cover the ground in your team's ink by clashing into adversaries, making the most out of the environment and power ups!

name: Indentured Servant
summary: In this VR experience you are stuck on a fishing boat, you must sort fish to pay of your debt.

name: Infinite Pixel Battles
summary: Follow the White Rabbit and enter the matrix of Infinite Pixel Battles!

name: In Orbit
summary: In Orbit transforms data collected by NASA’s “Eyes on Earth”—the satellites relaying information about our climate, oceans, and soil from space—into a multisensory, interactive experience that celebrates the marvelous complexities of our planet and our drive to unravel them.

name: Incident at Grove Lake
summary: A PSX Style adventure game based on accounts of Alien Abductions. Intended to be played in one sitting.

name: Invasion of the Mutant Space Bats of Doom
summary: This game is based on classic Atari shoot-'em-up Demon Attack. This is a sequel of Mutant Space Bats of Doom and have 66 stages, arrenged in some sort of pattern and includes extra items what increase your power fire. The enemies are fly space mutant demons who attack your ship in a coordinated movement.

name: Incrediball: The Seven Sapphires
summary: Incrediball: The Seven Sapphires is an arkanoid style game for the PC.

name: Inga Ouhou: Murderous Plaza
summary: This is a game about the 12 Star Signs x Blood Thirsty Killers x Communal Life.

name: Ink Wars
summary: Ink Wars

name: IncrediBots 2
summary: IncrediBots is back, and better than ever! Create your own custom robots, replays, and mini-games!

name: Inferno
summary: After discovering & rescuing an unconscious elite warrior from a dangerous jungle, a soldier, a scientist and a nurse decide to team up and escape from the ravaged army base where they'd been struggling for days. Can they find help in the jungle? Who will survive and make it?

name: Insomnia: A Sleepless Journey
summary: Explore the world of Insomnia. A platformer with metroidvania-like progression.

name: In Another Brothel
summary: A physics based platform puzzler where we follow the dark and brooding protagonist in his quest to rescue some dames.

name: In the dark forest
summary: "In the dark forest" is a 2d side-scroller defense game. Improve your skills and upgrade weapons, protect your home from waves of undead!

name: Infinite road
summary: Infinite road is a simple but difficult game that will challenge even the most experience players. Move the road to allow the character evade the obstacles and get to the maximun distance possible.

name: Inochi no Nai Uta
summary: Experience 7 games like enjoying a music album. An omnibus work featuring a dark and mysterious world view with the theme of "death and life" and a unique game system with a music player motif.

name: In Somnio
summary: 5 Short, Surreal & Unsettling PS1 Styled Horror Experiences Based on Types of Nightmares

name: Infiltrating a Cult
summary: Your mission is to infiltrate a cult with your master. One night, you successfully snuck into the church, but then...

name: In the Middle of the Night
summary: A game about camping.

name: Interminal
summary: Procedural First-Person Shopper

name: Inspirit Online
summary: An MMORPG with an anime artstyle.

name: Infinity Assassin (VR)
summary:
Infinity Assassin is an stealth action VR game that you can play with HTC Vive on PC. 
You can play various missions as an assassin in the medieval fantasy world.

name: Interview
summary: A Commodore 64 game by Front Runner about getting to a job interview at Front Runner in 15 minutes.

name: Interactive meadow 64
summary: Hello there. I am puffy. I am you. Welcome to our interactive meadow. Stay a while. Relax and breath. Forget about anxiety. Forget about depression. Be your own best friend.

name: Incoming War
summary: Incoming War is a vehicle simulator with builder and RTS elements where you take on the role of a commander for one of two warring robot factions. Sit at the controls of units that you recruit in the buildings which you construct. Fight for survival by expanding your base!

name: Inventory Hero
summary:
Inventory Hero is a frantically paced role-playing game where you leave the exploration and the monster battles to the computer so you can focus on the true meaning of adventure: managing your inventory.

Drop the trash, equip the good stuff, save the potions for a rainy day, and remember to watch out for rabbits…

name: Infferno
summary: Infferno is a post apocalyptic isometric top down shooter for 1-2 Coop Players Online or Local Offline

name: Inhumane
summary: The first available piece of Interactive Fiction created by Andrew Plotkin, being a a parody of Infocom’s Infidel.

name: Inkub
summary: In a strange and distant world you will have to lead a bionic vegetative growth enterprise.

name: Interlude
summary: Explore a virtual dungeon where each room is an entire game world, each with its own characters, gameplay, and themes. Dive deeper and deeper, unlock more and more worlds, and be the first to reach the Core!

name: Infinite Abyss
summary: Infinite Abyss is a combination of a dynamic game of action with strategic elements in a stylized 2D world. You will play the role of the last living astronaut to survive on a lonely planet.

name: Input6

Armed with a hammer, quick feet and determination, Bugsy sets off into an underground labyrinth full of crumbling ruins, mysterious relics, and loads and loads of monsters. -Explore a massive map with lots of winding paths, secret areas and shortcuts. Multiple playthroughs and speedrunning are greatly encouraged!-Loads of abilities to discover. Sub-weapons, movement tech, and equippable augmentations are all at your disposal! Mix and match abilities to how you see fit in your playstyle. No two playthroughs will look the same!

name: Intellivision Rocks
summary:
The sequel to Intellivision Lives!, this compilation includes over 30 more emulated Intellivision games, primarily those originally published by Activision and Imagic. It also has the complete library of Intellivoice games (minus Tron Solar Sailer, due to licensing restrictions) and a complete library of Entertainment Computer System (ECS) games (again, minus a few licensed titles), and some unreleased games. The complete list of games follows:

Atlantis
B-17 Bomber (Intellivoice)
Beamrider
Beauty and the Beast
Bomb Squad (Intellivoice)
Deep Pockets
Demon Attack
Dracula
Dragonfire
Fathom
Game Factory (ECS; previously unreleased)
Happy Trails
Ice Trek
League of Light (previously unreleased)
Magic Carousel (Intellivoice; previously unreleased)
Melody Blaster (ECS)
Microsurgeon
Mind Strike (ECS)
Minotaur (debugged version)
Mr. BASIC Meets Bits N' Bytes (ECS)
Nova Blast
Number Jumble (ECS)
Pitfall
River Raid
Robot Rubble (previously unreleased)
Safecracker
Space Spartans (Intellivoice)
Stampede
Swords & Serpents
The Dreadnaught Factor
Thin Ice (release version)
Tropical Trouble
Truckin'
White Water!
World Series Baseball (ECS; Intellivoice)
Worm Whomper
Each of these games is played via a very accurate emulator. In fact, there are three emulators included on the disc: DOS, Windows, and Macintosh. But there's more to the package than just emulated games. Each game is complete with a box scan, overlay scan (if applicable), instructions, and credits. There's also a museum of Intellivision oddities, including the complete video of several Intellivision commercials.

name: Infidel
summary:
Infidel is an interactive fiction computer game published by Infocom in 1983. It was written by Patricia Fogleman and Michael Berlyn and was the first in the "Tales of Adventure" line. Due to Infocom's virtual Z-Machine, it was ported to a wide variety of popular computing systems of the day, including the Apple II and Commodore 64. It is Infocom's tenth game.

In 1916, Dr. Ellington came into possession of a 5000-year-old fragment of pottery covered with hieroglyphics. (Conveniently for the text-only game, these runes look strangely like ASCII characters.) After years of painstaking research, Ellington managed to decipher a portion of the text, which indicated the general location of a pyramid that no one had heard of before. He managed to organize a modest expedition to the area in 1920, but found nothing before he died except a small block of limestone bearing the same style of hieroglyphics. According to the partial translation he made, the new fragment spoke of a queen and great riches. When Howard Carter discovered King Tut's tomb a few years later, Dr. Ellington's widow figured that someone had found the pyramid her husband had been looking for. She stowed the papers and artifacts away and forgot all about them. Rose found them in the early 1980s after her mother's death and did some preliminary fact-checking. The pyramid indicated by her father's papers is nowhere near Tut's. In fact, no pyramids have ever been discovered in the area Dr. Ellington was investigating. Rose is by no means a rich woman—she only wants someone to give her father the recognition he deserves—so it'll be a modest expedition. But it sure sounds like the perfect chance for an opportunistic soldier-of-fortune to make a name for himself.

Indefinite is a frantic memory game that is simple yet insane. Indefinite makes you an unfortunate suspect of an unfair interrogation. Indefinite will question you until you crack. 
 
It is a unique experience that is hard to label. In the end, Indefinite is Indefinite.

name: Injection π 23: No Name, No Number - Complete Edition
In Search of Fon Vitae

The PlayStation 2 port of the game, originally released for Windows and Mac.
It is a typing tutor game based on the Initial D anime that requires a USB keyboard to play.

name: Infinitode

name: Infinite Arcana
summary:
Infinite Arcana is an action Roguelike mobile game with a fantasy adventure theme.
Fist to flesh, heart-piercing fighting, you may enjoy the best action experience.
Randomly generated maps and monsters, endless floating isles to be explored;
Interesting game modes with random character skill builds more than 100 styles.
The mystery of "Infinite Arcana" is waiting to be unraveled, and the eroded continent is calling for your rescue.

name: Infinite Slice
summary: Addictive & minimalist game for all ages.

name: Incredible Monster VS US Army Prison Survival Game
Invisible Sun
summary: A surreal fantasy RPG about magic and discovery of the unknown.

name: Inner Call
summary: Inner Call is a 2D adventure game where you play as a wise orc and help the locals with their problems. For the last 20 years, the forests have been filled with various monsters, which are now aggravating the villagers.

name: Into the Midnight

InorStreet

name: Infinite Knights
summary:
The one who pull the sword, will become the king and lead the knights to defeat devils.

Are you the one, who can pull up the sword?

The story starts where the original Blue-Shift ended: after having saved himself from Black-Mesa together with Rosenberg and the other 2 scientists, something goes wrong and Calhoun is teletransported in the alien dimension for a computer error.... yes I know, isn't very original.... but is just an excuse to put the hands again on the weapons!

name: Intern: An Intern's Guide to Maintaining Internal Rage
summary:
Welcome to your first day at *redacted*! This new employee guide comes to you directly from the Far Corner Devs.

We here at *redacted* thank you for joining our family. You may have heard people refer to this job as: monotonous, passion devouring or a complete waste of shareholder funds.

name: Incursion
summary: Incursion is an indie FPS that aims for a unique wave survival experience with class-based combat for both co-op and singleplayer. Fight alongside strangers or friends and take advantage of unique team compositions, upgrade choices, and strategies to win in this solo-developed indie title.

name: Inexplicable Geeks: RestoreTheMillerCut
summary: The studio needs your help rewriting their next big superhero blockbuster for mass public consumption! What kind of movie will you make?

name: In Game

name: Inertial Drift: Twilight Rivals

name: Infinity Beats Song Edition
summary:
Infinity Beats Song Edition is a fun, exciting and thrilling rhythm game where you need to hit the notes based on the rhythm of the music. 
- Classic rhythm game style where you simply hit the notes based on the beats and melodies.
- Handpicked sound tracks with catchy melodies and nice beats.
- 3 levels for each track and adding.
- Different Mods to modify game play.
- Very smooth game play.
- Futuristic graphic styles with a space journey theme.
- Multiple special effects to choose.

name: InSight

name: Introvert

name: Injustice: Gods Among Us - Red Son Pack

name: Invasion
summary: Magnavox Odyssey launch title, sold separately. A combination of strategic moves made on a separate game board and tactical combat resolved on the screen; different assaults use different cards. Used game cards number 4, 5, and 6.

name: Infamous: Second Son - Collector's Edition

- A full retail copy of Second Son with the Collector's Edition cover

- Set of eight pins from Delsin's in-game vest
- Official DUP Patch
- Vinyl Decals

DLC:
- Delsin's "Legendary" in-game vest
- Cole's Legacy expansion

name: Inbox Unbox

Inkya Danshi de Asobou!
summary:
Chifuyu, the main character, has a cute face but his personality is the worst sexual pervert.
Chifuyu also bullies and humiliates his "toy" Natsuna today!!!

summary: Cyberpunk visual novel about the growing up of a girl from the suburbs who dreams of a life in the big city. It's also about a conspiracy, hacking, surveillance, but most importantly about friendship. Standalone version.

name: Interstellar Expedition
summary: Interstellar Expedition is a futuristic side-scrolling shooter game, where players can control their spacecraft using the mouse and engage in thrilling space battles. In the game,

name: Interplanetary Hunter
summary: The whole Galaxy is occupied by the outlanders. Now we need you to drive your mecha to eliminate the invaders on the space stations and the planets. Collect the booty and upgrade your equipments.

name: Inferno 2
summary: Inferno 2 is an intense, atmospheric twin-stick adventure-shooter. Blast through 80+ levels full of enemies and secrets while upgrading your ship the way you want.

name: Into the Backrooms
summary: Into the Backrooms - Psychological horror in which you will experience the true experience of fear.If you’re not careful and you noclip out of reality in the wrong areas you’ll end up in the Backrooms

name: Infinite West
summary:
Driven by the brutal murder of both wife and child by a savage gang, a former gunslinger unleashes frontier justice in the Wild West. 
 
Infinite West is a challenging, strategic puzzle game that is inspired by classic board games, such as Chess. 
 
You will strategically navigate small 7x7 grids to avoid attacks, take out enemies, and gather resources. Every move counts if you want to survive. You will need to think carefully before you act.

name: Incredible Monster Prison Escape Police Jail Break
Instant Armory

In INSTANT Chef Party, you will have to compete with up to 4 players in a series of mini-games themed around food and cook. Be ready to enjoy serving, cooking, harvesting, doing dish-washing and many more activities in coop or versus your friends & family!

name: InstaTok Tycoon

name: Infernoculus
summary: Demonic turn-based soccer game

summary: Infinity Racer is designed to be a fast, simple to control and satisfying to flight experience. Enjoy the simple and colorful atmosphere and master your reflexes.

We visit New York places such as 57th West Street with old stetic graphics as tribute for PS1 3d-Games. "The world doesn't know it but we are in danger."

name: Initial 2: New Stage & Xuan Yuan Sword Bundle
Inside Out Thought Bubbles
summary:
A bubble shooter game based on Disney and Pixar’s Inside Out

Disney Interactive brings you this one-of-a-kind bubble-shooter based on Disney and Pixar’s,
Inside Out!
Growing up can be a bumpy road, and it’s no exception for Riley. Like all of us, Riley is guided
by her Emotions — Joy, Sadness, Anger, Fear and Disgust. And now that Riley is officially a
teenager she is navigating new Emotions Anxiety, Embarrassment, Envy and Ennui too!

name: Infinitum
summary: Travel through space. Attend the planets. Gather resources. Find artifacts.

name: International Affairs
summary: A one of a kind visual novel that asks: "Do YOU have what it takes to seduce a world leader?" With jaw-dropping dialogue, shocking plot twists, and five globetrotting hunks to choose from, the prospect of achieving world peace has never been so sensual!

name: Infinite Pizza
summary:
Your dreams have come true, before you lies the infinite pizza in all its glory. 
 
Equipped with your Pizza Cutter Wheel and the Tomato Sauce Maker you set out onto the impossible journey towards the center of the Infinite Pizza. 
 
Can you survive its cheesy surface or will you become one with the cheese? 
How big will your slice be? 
Was there ever anything else than pizza?

name: In a Detective's Mind

summary: A kinetic thriller created for NaNo17

name: Injustice: Gods Among Us Lobo
summary: Download the mighty mercenary and bounty hunter Lobo for your Injustice: Gods Among Us DLC collection. Please Note: This pack also contains a compatibility update.

name: Infected
summary: First Person Survival

name: Infinite Dungeon Crawler: The Frozen Expanse
summary: DLC adds an additional world to travel to when you go through the Gate. Explore this frozen, inhospitable world, filled with creatures toughened by the harsh environment. NOTE: You must unlock the base game to load this expansion pack.

summary: Inside Intruder - is a psychological horror game that mostly focuses on atmosphere. Game takes place in your own home, where a uninvited guest comes in.

name: Ink.
summary: Ink. is a colorful roguelike adventure where every game is a unique journey, different from the previous one.

name: In Sync: 2 Fun Balls
summary:
In Sync is a super fun offline single-player puzzle game where you control two balls, which are in sync. Make a move and they will both roll in the same direction. You must have a steady hand to roll them around the traps, through the gaps, and on the winding paths at the top of the walls at the same time.

Challenge yourself with this addictive tricky puzzle game, where you have to be resourceful to find the right path to victory. All levels are unique, and will provide you with lots of fun.

name: In Car Speed Test: Cops Edition
Interstellar Rogue

name: Indigenous
summary:
Indigenous is a virtual reality game in development currently only for the HTC Vive. You play as a primtive character in a chaotic, post-glacial rebound environment. 
Upon leaving the ice age, you regain your connection with the earth. In your travels you discover ruins of what used to be temples of the ancient ones. There you learn about your ability to move earth by strengthening your primal bond.

name: Ink World
summary: "Ink World" is a 2D platform jumping game with the theme of Chinese classical ink painting. The story tells that the protagonist constantly improves his abilities through battles, thereby eliminating many beasts in ancient Chinese legends.

name: Inca Gold
summary: It is a Donkey Kong like Atari 2600 game.

name: Incite
summary: Resist or Obey. The choice is yours.

summary: Smash demons and deflect bullets in a hardcore arcade clicker with the RPG elements.

name: Infector
summary: Tabletop inspired roguelike

name: Interference
summary: Similar to "Broken Telephone", a group of players take turns to draw and describe the previous player's item before revealing the end result, and the increasingly confused steps that led there.

name: Intricacy
summary: A game of competitive puzzle design

name: Inertia
summary: You're stranded in space in an asteroid field. Use your ship to smash through fuel-rich asteroids for points and fuel, and use any power-ups you find along the way. But remember, an empty fuel tank is just as deadly as an asteroid. The void of space is a tough place to be, but you can't stop now.

name: Injustice: Gods Among Us Killing Joke Pack
summary: Add Tourist Joker, Red Hood Joker, and Final Confrontation Joker to your Injustice: Gods Among Us DLC collection with this Killing Joke Pack.

name: Infinitesimal Point
summary: Main character has been attacked by a strange creature, and gets into the off-world through the portal. Here he faces a long journey where every new step is a danger. Crowds of foes will turn his way into hardship.

name: Invincible Fins
summary: A game recommended for younger kids. You control a little fish that just got back to the ocean from a thrown away aquarium. Explore the colorful underwater world, collect treasures, avoid dangers and find your new home.

name: In the Darkness
summary: Hello there traveller. Are you going into that maze? I must warn you, it's an awfully dreadful place there. Full of monsters and the like. You won't find many torches in there, you'll be in the darkness. But if you insist, go right on ahead. Farewell traveler.

name: Intel Discovered
summary: Advergaming gets real as Intel teams up with one of the guys from LMFAO and Captain America to make an FMV Kinect game that will blow your damn mind.

name: In the Name of the Tsar
summary: This mod is an overhaul of Hearts of Iron IV and takes place in alternate timeline where Russia, after the Brusilov's offensive manages to break through the Austrian defenses taking out Austria Hungarian Empire from the war. Germany, fearing complete destruction of their Empire sued for peace later in the beginning of 1917.

name: Injustice: Gods Among Us - Ame-Comi Skins
summary: Add to your Injustice: Gods Among Us DLC collection with this Ame-Comi Skin Pack.

name: Infinite Dungeon Crawler: The Abysmal Furnaces
summary: DLC adds an additional world to travel to when you go through the Gate. Prepare yourself for a fiery, bleak world, filled with lava flows, strange iridescent vegetation, ancient ruins and hellish monsters. NOTE: You must unlock the base game to load this expansion pack.

name: Inspiration Dave
summary: Inspiration Dave is a 2012 flash platformer by Melos Han-Tani (co-creator of Anodyne series.) You control a character on a mission to find inspiration through musical notes throughout whatever world he lives in - via going through 33 small platforming stages, with three goals: Finish the stage, collect all 20 notes, and finish the stage 100% very quickly! Only finishing the stage is necessary. There are unlockable secrets for how many notes you collect and stages you finish quickly.

name: Invincible Knight
summary: A side scrolling action game focused on speed, for the PlayStation 3.

name: Intelligent Strategy Games 10
summary:
A collection of classic board games including:

- Draughts
- Go
- Renju
- 4-in-a-line
- Othello
- Gomoku
- Backgammon
- Chinese Chess
- Chess
- Bridge

name: In the Groove 2
summary: In The Groove 2 is the second iteration of a dance/rhythm series made by Roxor. It's extremely similar to Konami's Dance Dance Revolution and is the center of a massive gaming community for it's ability to play custom songs.

name: Incandescent 2
summary: Incandescent 2 is bigger and better than the original. Take your ship and shoot all the many enemies that will attack you. Features multiple difficulty modes and new enemies to face.

name: Into the Deep Web
summary: A dicey venture through the deep web.

name: Insects Awaken
summary: Description: Insects Awaken is a puzzle visual novel set in the 1940s. It follows the story of Chen Shan, a young man entangled in espionage while defending his family and homeland. He embarks on a journey between the isolated cities of Chongqing and Shanghai, braving the chaos of war with his passion and youth.

name: Inpulse
summary: You are flute. You are kaizo. You are music. Audiate your movement through the environment, and catch the sounds to propel yourself through the air. A hand-drawn, 2D musical platforming experience designed to make you into a kaizo master. March to your own music in Inpulse.

name: Install Fee Tycoon
summary: Chaos3D, The popular game engine, has started charging developers each time their games are installed. They are also paying you to re-install those games. Get Rich, and destroy the video game industry in the process!

name: In Freedom Rest Ideal Tomorrows
summary: Lead your group of warriors in a unique country (procedurally generated), where looting cities and facing guards is just the beginning. With each victory, increase your power, preparing to face the king and take control of the area. Are you ready to go for the victory?

name: Inferno
summary:
You awaken to cries of agony all around you. As your vision recovers, you find yourself in a place only true evil could call home. Fire lashes out of the floor. Spikes dripping with the blood of countless victims line the walls. Bones litter the floor, and tiny beasts you've never seen pick at the remaining flesh. You hear the clanging of armor, the grinding of bones, and the maniacal screams of death approaching. 
 
As you pull yourself to your feet, you notice that you're standing next to a dismembered corpse. His organs are spewed all over the surrounding area. You don't know where you are, or how you got here, but you do know two things: You're getting out, and you aren't going to end up like him. 
 
Destroy the demons, vanquish the undead, and escape the inferno... or become another bloodstain on the wall. 
 
Inferno is an exciting arcade/adventure that will test your reflexes, your mind and your courage. 
Both the enemies and the levels themselves will become part of your worst nightmares. 
 
The game uses the ASCII 8 mapper.

name: Inner Blade
summary: This is a speed-focused action-adventure game. You will play as a inner ninja, entering your partner's dreams and collecting powers and ninjutsu within a limited time frame, defeating enemies in the dream world, and saving your partner's soul.

name: Infernal Bloodrush
summary: INFERNAL BLOODRUSH is a 2.5d first-person doomlike where instead of shooting bullets, you spew flames. As demons threaten to spill into the world, it's up to you to protect the Realm by burning every demon to ash.

name: Insomnis: Enhanced Edition
summary:
Insomnis is a first-person horror game focused on story, exploration and solving puzzles to advance through a terrifying atmosphere. Players take control of Joe Castevet, who will have to deal with a mysterious inheritance he has just received. Discover all the secrets of the Castevet mansion!

Insomnis: Enhanced Edition includes:
- Base Game
- Special Cover
- Artbook
- Set of cards

name: Inevitable
summary: July 2018 - Game Jam

name: Infantry Assault: War 3D FPS
summary: Infantry Assault: War 3D FPS, one of the variety of war games. Each new level has something new, different effects for shooting, a variety of soldiers, etc. The main goal of this game is to complete the level without leaving a single soldier alive.

name: Indoor Soccer
summary: Indoor Soccer is a Sports game, developed and published by Universal, which was released in 1985.

name: Inaccessible world
summary: One week in the year, all comers are allowed to test themselves on the most dangerous hunting in the world.

name: Indianapolis 500 Legends
summary: Fight to the finish in a hand-built speed machine racing seven inches off the ground at nearly 180 mph through a moving minefield of crashes, spinning cars, rolling tires, and 32 rivals on the world's most famous racetrack in Indianapolis 500 Legends, an arcade-style racing experience set in a dynamic era spanning 1961-1971. Players will experience the traditions, rivalries, terrifying speeds, jaw-dropping maneuvers and infamous events that characterized this historic period at the world-famous Indianapolis 500 race.

name: Inky and the Alien Aquarium
summary:
Inky and the Alien Aquarium is a brand new puzzle adventure game for the Game Boy Advance.
You play as Inky, a flapjack octopus, who has been abducted by aliens and put on display in their aquarium.

You will explore the alien mothership screen by screen, solving 50 puzzles to traverse the aquarium and bowels of the ship.

Along your journey, you will rescue sea creatures, and collect items to unlock more sections of the ship.

name: Interland
summary: Interland is an educational browser game by made by Google to teach kids basic concepts for Internet use such as security and ethics.

name: Interactive Storybook DS: Series 2
summary: Full of gaming goodness and positive fairy tales, this title immerses both the parent and the child into the world of skill building, learning, reading and having fun! Bringing different generations together like never before, Interactive Storybook DS aims to bring loved ones together to share, to grow and to prosper.

name: Injection π 23: No Name, No Number - Expansion Events
Infinity Quest
summary: An indie turn-based RPG.

name: Inner Seasons
summary: Inner Seasons is a first person platformer with speed slide gameplay. Dash, jump, crouch and dodge walls flying at you with precise timing to progress. Slide through the seasons of life playing as River and learn from your mentor, Farley.

name: Infinite Minigolf: Hangar 37
summary: Put on your space suits and prepare for landing in Hangar 37 on the Intergalactic Spaceport in this sci-fi Infinite Minigolf adventure! Meet a goofy team of aliens and robots who will help you complete four new and challenging courses, consisting 108 brand new minigolf holes.

name: Ingrids Back
summary:
"Ingrid is Ingrid Bottomlow, the intellectual-but-clumsy gnome we met in Gnome Ranger. Her beloved home village Little Moaning is earmarked for a yuppie-friendly transformation by Jasper Quickbuck of Ridley's Manor. 
 
Ingrid has three cunning plans to stop him - producing a petition with everybody's signature, finding a more orthodox prevention method, and finally infiltrating Ridley's Manor itself by pretending to be a maid, and then finding proof that he's a dodgy geezer who should be locked up. These three quests can be played in any order, although they logically follow on from each other. She is accompanied by Flopsy the dog in the first 2 parts, and her cousin Daisy in the third." --mobygames.com

name: In the Dark
summary:
Pain....Darkness...Alone.
A man wakes, no proof of his identity, except for fragments of memory in a muddled mind.

Danger...Destruction...Help Me...

name: Inferni: Hope & Fear
summary: Inferni: Hope & Fear is a unique combination of deck builder and battle royale, creating the world’s first 8 player online coop card game.

name: In the Mood
summary: Uncover beautiful ladies hidden under stacks of colorful balls in classic arcade-inspired puzzle action!

name: Integer
summary: The number must get BIGGER.

name: Insane West
summary: This game is a horizontal version of the clearance game, currently has 14 levels.Each level is a short, difficult one, and hopefully you'll find a way to get through it after each death.In particular, there is a third person survival mode being tested.

name: In the Wild
summary: Take control of your favorite animal and learn interesting facts while exploring various beautiful environments. Complete tasks, play mini-games, and watch the animal AI explore with you in this educational single-player simulation game.

name: Intellivision Flashback
summary: A compilation of 20 classic Intellivision games.

name: Interactive Storybook DS: Series 3
summary: Full of gaming goodness and positive fairy tales, this title immerses both the parent and the child into the world of skill building, learning, reading and having fun! Bringing different generations together like never before, Interactive Storybook DS aims to bring loved ones together to share, to grow and to prosper.

name: Into the Breach: Advanced Edition
summary:
Nearly every aspect of the game will be expanded with new content, including:

New Mechs and Weapons: Five new mech squads and nearly forty new weapons.

New Challenges: More enemies, more bosses, and more mission objectives that add additional challenge and variety to any run.

New Pilot Abilities: The expanded roster includes four new pilots and triple the amount of skills any pilot can earn through promotions.We’ll be elaborating on all of this new content over the coming weeks before launch and can’t wait for everyone to check it out.

name: Incoboto
summary: A smart little mobile puzzle game

name: Incarnatia
summary: This Japanese game is a fusion of art and games in one place. It involves the 20th century painter Salvador Dali. With his own interpretation, CG artist Shimo Hirokazu has his mysterious art world rebuilt into a three-dimensional world.

name: Invincible Iron Man Gagaga-In
summary:
Invincible Iron Man Gagaga-In is a cancelled “80’s giant robot fighting action game” for the Virtual Boy, that had been in development by Hudson Soft and the planning and contract development group Eighting. It was planned to release in Japan roughly a year after the system launch.

The game has never been officially announced, but images of a design document and an EP-ROM cartridge containing a sample build have been shared in 2018 by a former Hudson employee.

name: Intellivision Collection 1
summary:
The Intellivision Collection 1 cartridge brings 12 classic Intellivision games to the Evercade! Including Astrosmash, Night Stalker, Frog Bog and more!

Includes:
- Astrosmash
- Buzz Bombers
- Frog Bog
- Night Stalker
- Thunder Castle
- Thin Ice
- Snafu
- Shark! Shark!
- Slap Shot: Super Pro Hockey
- Pinball
- Princess Quest
- Word Rockets

NOTE: Only Word Rockets of The Electric Company Word Fun appears in this collection.

name: Introvert: Consequences
summary: Four high school shooting survivors move to a new city and attend a 5-day group therapy program. Discover the secrets, situations, and people that await you in this surreal universe while trying to deal with the guilt and grief caused by the disturbing unforgettable past.

name: Invention 2
summary: While you were on the island exploring the underground laboratory, the infection was busy spreading throughout the world.

name: International Running Stars
summary:
Live the life of a professional runner, while you take part of the most thrilling marathons and half marathons. Customize your athlete and represent your country in different events. Get to the podium and climb the highest of the olympus while winning medals. 
Three exciting game modes 
More than a hundred square miles of city. 
230 countries for you to choose. 
Facebook connection options. 
 
Enroll yourself in exciting marathon and half-maratons in your city. Create your own character and customize every aspect. Win medals with every podium while living the life of a professional athlete. You can even do some field training before jumping into the real deal. Just tap onto the Training mode and start practicing. 
 
Every race is a challenge, and you are about to live it! 
Do you have what it takes to become the International Running Star? 
 
http://www.internationalrunningstars.com

name: Infinite Survival
summary: Infinite Survival is a roguelike survival game with turn-based gameplay. The game features a completely procedurally generated open world. Craft new items and weapons, lay traps and defences, use stealth to evade enemies, and explore in any fashion you want.

name: International Space Banana
summary:
Take control of aerospace scientist turned banana as you attempt to retrace your steps across 8 unique, punishing levels through this seemingly abandoned space station.

"Flight" your way through various obstacles from floating crates to spinny things, plus doors and buttons, which would be fine if you had hands to operate them... but you don't, so there's that. International Space Banana features painfully accurate physics simulations, battle against the seemingly endless impossibility of the trajectory of curved objects moving in zero-gravity.

As though life as a banana in space isn't rough enough, add insult to injury as you attempt to take on the most basic of tasks such as passing through automatic doorways before they close, problem solving your way through (not very) complex obstacle courses and more.

All you really have to do is generate enough applied force to worm your way through a maze of literal junk. Don't even worry about drag because you know, it's space, so that's one less mountain to climb, just get yourself to the control station.
It really could not be simpler.

name: Interlinked
summary: Build infrastructure to connect the expanding world to the internet! Having a working strategy and great management is key to winning your competition in this capitalist environment.

name: Innsmouth Corporate Plaza
summary: Caleb is in his flat reading a newspaper. Suddenly, he hears an uproar down Innsmouth Plaza. He hears some shots, so he gets his Tommy Gun and decides to investigate.

name: Intergalactic Wizard Force
summary: A twisted saturday morning cartoon adventure

name: Infinite Mana
summary: Infinite Mana is a RPG about exploration, a light sandbox, and glitch mechanics set in the magickal world of Arukea. You are the Wanderer: branded and without memory. Make friends and discover who you are, unlock unique Guises (classes), seek Relics, talk to animals, collect items, fish, and more!

name: Into The Flames: Spooky Pack
summary: Into The Flames Spooky pack gives players two new spooky characters to take on emergencies with!

name: Into the Flames
summary: An Open World multiplayer firefighting game!

name: In the Name of Freedom Episode 1: Vietnam
summary: A 3D platformer game set in time of vietnam war

name: Interplay Collection 1
summary:
The Interplay Collection 1 is an Evercade cartridge which is a compilation of 6 classic Interplay games.

Games included:
- Earthworm Jim
- Clayfighter
- Boogerman
- BattleChess
- Incantation
- Titan

name: International Athletics
summary: Accurate representations of 14 events: 100m, Long Jump, Shot Put, High Jump, 400m, 110m Hurdles, Discus, Pole Vault, Javelin, 1500m, Hammer, Running Target Rifle Shooting, Rapid Fire Pistol Shooting and Archery. Superior control system and character animation, and truly competitive A.I. Hugely detailed international stadiums, including venues in Canada, France, Japan, Spain and China. Single-player Decathlon, Tournament and Quick Event modes, and multiplayer modes for 2-4 players. Beat personal bests and world records, accumulate medals and earn trophies to unlock extra events and tournaments! Create your own customised male or female athlete with their own distinctive attributes. Hugely popular genre featuring intuitive Wii Remote and Nunchuk controls for instantly replayable, hugely compelling gameplay, mirroring the real events.

name: Intertwine
summary: A recurring dream. A flash of deja vu. An undeniable connection. Some say these are remnants of our past lives—echoes of the memories we’ve made in centuries past. When I ran into you on that fateful day…

name: Insane Cold: Back to the Ice Age
summary: WINTER IS COMING! Save mankind from the coming eternal frost!

name: Interplay Collection 2
summary:
The Interplay Collection 2 is an Evercade cartridge which is a compilation of 6 classic Interplay games.

Games included:

- Earthworm Jim 2
- Clayfighter 2
- The Adventures of Rad Gravity
- Claymates
- Prehistorik Man
- The Brainies

name: Inner Fire
summary: Collect flames and dodge obstacles in this relaxing endless runner game.

name: Infinity Heroes
summary: Infinity Heroes is a simultaneous turn-based collectible hero card game. Features PC & Mobile crossplay, a single player Roguelike Adventure and Infinite Customization via name and card art replacement of every card with any image on your computer.

name: Innocence Or Money
summary: Innocence Or Money tells the Story of Jennifer, who is an innocent girl from a little town named Greensdale, she has lived all her life there with her sister Jessica and her uncle. She also has a boyfriend called Mike. One of her dreams is to go to the big city so she will pack everything and take the journey of her life!

name: Invector: Rhythm Galaxy - Latin Power Song Pack
summary: Latin Power Song Pack, showcasing electrifying tunes from Latin urban sensations like Yng Lvcas, Tiago PZK, Myke Towers, and more—bringing a fresh wave of Latin hip-hop to the gaming world.

name: Inuyasha: Battle of Hell
summary: A new Inuyasha mobile game announced at Chinajoy 2019.

name: Internal Plexus
summary:
A Cayote named Fletcher wakes up one night when his computer updates on it's own. He finds a mysterious fuse box that wasn't there before attached, and a mass of wires leading to a strange mechanical door in his basement...

It was developed as an entry for Dream Diary Jam 6.

name: Invasion
summary: Invasion is a game about heroes who are fighting an invasion of wild animals that has hit their village.

name: Into the Void
summary: Into the Void is a strategy RPG and exploration sci-fi game with an epic story and intense battles. Travel through space and discover the origin of a cosmic threat which destroyed Earth centuries ago. Fight or cooperate with the different factions; be a leader !

name: Infect Them All 2 : Zombies
summary: A sequel to the iOS game, where you make zombies by infecting people.

name: In-Flight Pac-Man
summary: Help Pac-Man make his way through the maze and munch the dots and prizes. In order to survive a few rounds, avoid the pesky ghosts or you’ll be game over soon!

name: Incaved
summary: In Incaved you play as one of many Russian civilians taking shelter in ever expanding cave systems after nukes were dropped. With limited supplies, oxygen and sunlight, survivors become hostile. The question raises whether it's safer down here in the caves, or up there, in the radiated wastelands.

name: Invert by SlushyRh
summary: Embark on a precision platformer journey to the moon! You'll climb, fall, then cry and do it all again.

name: Invisible Seams
summary: This story is a spinoff to my free fantasy dating sim Lovewood! However, you don't need any prior knowledge to understand and enjoy Invisible Seams.

name: Incineration
summary: A replacecment for Episode 3 of Doom. Just maps in here no new music or graphics.

name: Infinite Golf 2
summary: Are you ready for a new golf challenge? Infinite Golf is back! You can choose from 4 different game modes in 4 different environments. In Classic Mode you don't have to worry about losing or winning. Just enjoy the calm atmosphere! In Time Attack mode you have 30 seconds and 5 additional seconds for every completed level. In Arcade Mode you have 3 tries for each level. If you run out of tries your game is over. In Multiplayer mode you can compete against up to 3 other players in 81 different game mode combinations! With procedurally generated levels there is always one more level!

name: Invasion of the Space Aliens...
summary: A Point And Click Adventure Game created by Aleksandar Janjic as part of the Reality-On-The-Norm project.

name: Infinity Challenge
summary: An infinite 3D Rail Shooter game with procedurally generated high quality tracks! Take the challenge and choose one of the many maps and defeat countless waves of enemies while traveling through beautiful and mysterious worlds! Face fearsome machines and creatures that will do whatever it takes to destroy you and end your race to save the galaxy!

name: Insecticide Troopers: Star Zerg
summary: The new flames of war have ignited, and you will lead the mobile infantry regiment to defend the position. At that time, these damn Zergs will come from all directions, but I believe that under the leadership of your heroic lieutenant, you and your subordinates can definitely defeat these damn Zergs

name: Infinite Sparkles
summary: Old school is still extremely cool in the far future but spaceships have to get with the times to survive. Blast your way through space in this evolving twin-stick arcade-style shooter with an accessible attitude and a heart of titanium.

name: Ingnomia
summary: Following in the footsteps of Dwarf Fortress and Gnomoria, this game aims to provide the best experience of both worlds. The graphics and accessibility of Gnomoria and the depth and rich content of Dwarf Fortress.

name: Indiepocalypse #4
summary: Issue #4 of a monthly indie game anthology collecting games from 10 developers.

name: Ingrid's Back!
summary: A text adventure centering around a gnome called Ingrid Bottomlow.

name: Insomnis Experiment
summary:
Inspired by 'The Russian Sleep Experiment' creepypasta.

'Russian researchers in the late 1940s kept five people awake for fifteen days using an experimental gas based stimulant.'

Explore the facility, find out what happened and what remains there.

Keep cutting.

The game is 10 minutes long.

name: Insemination Diary of Milk, a Bursting Busty Cow Girl
summary: A role-playing game from Aralac.

name: Invisible Mind
summary: Go on a trip around the worlds created by your own mind and learn yourself.

name: Infasia
summary: Vous êtes Xen, un diplomate d'une région paisible du Nord qui se retrouve plongé dans la capitale du monde d'Infasia. Entre guerres de clans, invasion de Sans-âmes, lutte entre des puissances incommensurables, vous devrez vous forger un nom dans ce royaume pour accomplir vos objectifs…

name: Instant Artist: Puzzle Mashup
summary: Express your art by mixing pieces from different puzzles!

name: Ink'n'Think
summary: Ink'n'Think is a local co-op game. Solve puzzles, open doors, activate platforms, teleport, discover secrets and more in this colorful puzzle game.

name: Inner Darkness
summary: Inner Darkness is a first-person horror game made in pixelated 3D graphics that immerses you in an atmosphere of loneliness. The gameplay consists in walking around locations, solving riddles.

name: Interregnum
summary: Your people need you.Take your sword and serve your country !

name: Invert Y
summary: A quick escape game where you have to go out the fastest way possible! Made for the WGJ147 with the theme INVISIBLE

name: Injection
summary: A programming puzzle game where the player must hack the game's code to progress.

name: In Silence
summary: In Silence is a multiplayer horror game. One player takes on the role of the monster who has hypersensitive hearing abilities and is almost completely blind. The other players(2-6) play as survivors, trying to escape or hunting the monster.

name: Infinity Escape
summary: Infinity Escape is a reflex based game that will push your gaming skills to the maximum in a world full of obstacles, only to get the best score!

name: Industry Idle: Expansion Pack 2
summary: Industry Idle is an idle game that combines factory building, resource management and market trading. Design & build your base, expand & scale up your productions, improve & optimize your economy. Plus all the incremental game goodies: offline earnings, prestige to unlock more powerful upgrades.

name: Inside a Dungeon
summary: What will you find inside a dungeon? A treasure chest filled with gold and traps, a battle against the dangerous forces and greedy desires of humanity, or a place full of misery waiting for your demise.

name: Invizimals: The Resistance
summary: The world of Invizimals The Resistance features a pulse-pounding storyline that immerses players in an epic adventure. There are 150 creatures waiting to be captured, including 90 beloved classics from PSP, and even more ways to capture them with 20 brand new mini-games designed by Novarama. The Resistance also feature new and exciting battle game modes, 'Survivor' and 'Free For All'.

name: Infinity Dungeon 2 VIP - Summon girl and Zombie
Incubation: Time Is Running Out
summary:
Travel to the colonized planet of Scayra, and enter the dark and terrifying world of Incubation - the latest episode in the Battle Isle saga. Following a power plant accident, the vast energy shield that separates the Chromian colonists from the indigenous life-forms - the Scay'Ger - suffers a total shut down, allowing contact between the two races for the very first time. A human virus has not infected the Scay'Ger, mutating them into violent, blood-thirsty monsters. As commander of a squad of elite space marines, only you can stop the vicious attacks and evacuate the remaining colonists before all is lost. 
 
The battles in this turn-based tactical game are not waged in open fields, but fought within the dark and complex industrial buildings of the colony city; Scay Hallwa. You'll enjoy the unique challenge of leading your men through various alien scenarios, never knowing what's around the next corner or behind the next door. 
 
Incubation also features a real-time 3D environment and with detail and features never seen before in a game of this genre. The action can be viewed from the eyes of the individual soldiers, from the attacking aliens' perspective, or from any external position thanks to the complete camera freedom offered by the stunning graphics engine. All the events in the game are fully animated, as are the actions and movements of all the characters; giving them an incredibly lifelike apperance and a host of realistic mannerisms. They walk, rest, run and fight - all in glorious 3D.

name: In your Shadow
summary: "In your Shadow" is a Visual Novel that tells the story of three people: Lilly, Skyler, and Zachary. One night all of their lives change: Skyler is poisoned, Lilly is catfished, and Zachary gets a call that changes his life.

name: In-Sanity
summary: Take control of an everyday blue collar worker trying to make ends meet without becoming completely lost to depression.

name: Inevitable VR
summary: See if you have what it takes to solve the puzzles within game to enable you to retrieve, take control and bring the space station back to a stable condition whilst under pressure.

name: Infinadeck Medieval Maze
summary: A twisty-turny castle maze designed to show off the strengths of the Infinadeck omnidirectional treadmill. Designed for both slow and fast walkers, this experience is fun for all ages when paired with a full virtual reality setup.

name: Invader Signal
summary: Invader Signal - In this game, you choose a certain color of your charge to destroy asteroids flying in your direction, which can change their colors and cluster. You need to be careful when striking, as spaceships are constantly flying in front of you, which cannot be touched!

name: In-Terror-Gation
summary:
The game was developed in around 2 weeks for Senscape's Cursed Adventurous Jam 2022 (Won 3rd Place).In-Terror-Gation is a horror investigation game influenced by the works of Lovecraft and Junji Ito. As a psychiatrist at the Innsmount Prison Hospital, you are tasked with the interrogation of a mysterious patient in the hopes of getting to the truth behind a bizarre case of kidnapping.

Ask questions, listen to what she says, and examine your evidence to find the contradictions that may lie within. Only by questioning everything can you figure out the real truth about what happened to this patient, and just what is going on with her.

name: Infinitum: Legends
summary: Infinitum: Legends is an RPG that blends new design elements with classic terminal-based exploration and combat to create a unique blend of action and character development. Infinitum: Legends is the sequel to the original Infinitum game.

name: Indiemon Battlegrounds
summary: A collectable tile game based on the Indiemon franchise.

name: In the Bog
summary: Play as a frog, eat flies, care for offspring.

name: Into the Dungeon
summary: Going down to the Dungeon for the treasures of the immortal ghost, you have embarked on a dangerous path. Each turn is fraught with danger, and each step may be your last one. Can you steal the treasure and get out from the dungeon?

name: Infini: #InfiniPrison
summary: Ignite your jetpack and propel yourself through a challenging time-attack level. Share your score with the community using #InfiniPrison!

name: Incredible Dracula: The Ice Kingdom
summary: Join Dracula on his most "chilling" adventure yet as he tries to stop the Ice Queen from turning the world into a giant snowball! It's the most fun you can have at subzero temperatures!

name: Interstellar Orphan
summary: Planet looking for home.

name: Into the Woods
summary: A short, five-minute experience visually inspired by the aesthetics of PS1 survival horror games

name: Investigate
summary: You've been sent to a remote lighthouse to investigate the death of an old woman. What will you find?

name: Initializing Maintenance Run: We're Good to Go.
summary:
Who've we got on shift today?

Year 3484 aboard The Adamant Gambit.

name: Into the Rift
summary: "A metroidvania with running and jumping and swords and sticks and quests and action packed conversations!!"

name: Inspector Ooh: The Great Monkey Detective
summary: This is a 2005 game originally aired on the Playhouse Disney website, the game was inspired on the Ooh and Aah's bumper series called Inspector Ooh. In the game you need to find 3 things hidden in the stack of 3 pictures, you have 20 seconds to do each picture, but if you click on a banana, you gain more time. Also Ooh and give you a hint

name: Indonesian Culture
summary:
This game is based on Theme 7 material "The Beauty of Diversity" for 4th grade elementary school students in Indonesia.

This game tells the story of a 4th grade elementary school student named Dimas. Dimas lived his school days normally until one day after school, he fell asleep and dreamed. In his dream he saw a map of Indonesia and he heard a voice telling him to complete a quiz about Indonesian culture so he could wake up from his sleep. With this game, it is hoped that 4th grade elementary school students can learn Theme 7 "The Beauty of Diversity" more fun and not boring.

name: Into the Dark
summary: Large blue, somewhat E2M5ish fortress with several outside areas and a dark platforming section. The map source is included.

name: Infested: Space Colony
summary: Infested: Space Colony is an intense action top-down shooter in a dimly-lit environment where aliens roam in shadowy darkness. Explore various sections of the colony ship. Hunt down aliens before they hunt you down.

name: Invert pixels
summary:
Invert pixels have a minimalistic pixel graphics because gameplay is most valueable.
Some of the puzzles will have more difficulty but you can try as many times as you like!
If you like interesting block game try this one because it have all the charm of the puzzle game: simple, fun, attractive and suitable to everybody. Remember this is very simple and addictive gameplay.

name: Inside the Memories
summary: Travel through your memories in this touching version of the "Find a Pair" game that carefully re imagine a classic mechanic with brand new challenges.

name: Infanticide
summary: Infanticide is a horror walking simulator set in Japan.

name: Indie Game Farmer
summary: A game about the downsized game industry practitioners, return to the hometown farm and realize the indie game dream.

name: Into the Dark: Narakan
summary:
You awaken, lost inside an ominous forest, abound with fearsome creatures intent on cracking your knight's plate armor open and feasting on your bloodied flesh. You brave the threatening black wood, searching for the radiantly-glowing child calling your name; wondering, too, how she knows your name. You didn't know it; not before she called it.
Find the Child. Defy the Foe. Escape the Forest. Conquer Fear.

name: Invaders from Dimension X
summary: Invaders From Dimension X! is a solitaire game depicting battles between the crack 124th Galactic Marine Raider Battalion (nicknamed “The Old Reprobates”) of the Unified Space Alliance Defense Force and the invading “pods” of a mysterious alien race, commonly known as the Kay’otz.

name: Instakitty 3D
summary: Instakitty 3D is a virtual pet simulator for mobile devices.

name: Incompetent Alchemist
summary: I am an alchemist... Very incompetent... I was dissuaded from the alchemy school.Because of I couldn't find a job, I have to go to the next-door town... I haven't eaten for three days... Can I make a living here?

name: Inventory Manager
summary: Everyone's favorite part of any video game is managing their inventory, so why aren't there tons of games available where this is the main feature? To fill the void this game focuses on the most fun aspect of any game Inventory Management!

name: Inner City Kids
summary: A turn-based tactical combat game, where the player controls a group of kids who discover that the city's adults are being replaced by robot imposters.

name: Injustice 2: Enchantress
summary: The all-too ordinary life of June Moone ended the day she was possessed by the Enchantress, a demonic sorceress with aspirations of world domination. Today, she fights for her very soul, struggling to harness the Enchantress' magic for good.

name: Inverted
summary: Inverted is a new game that calling for amazement and joy of people who like stretch their brains. The main character of this puzzle by mysterious accident find himself in a castle full of solitude, fear and oblivion.

name: Invisible Fear
summary: Invisible fear is a horror game where you will have to go through a nightmare, surviving during the nights, using your camera that is able to show the non-existent to your eyes...

name: Invention
summary: 3D first-person shooter with RPG elements. Actions in the game take place on a mysterious island within a secret laboratory...

name: Independant Video Video Game
summary: Created from the point of view of washed up film director gone game developer Jurgen... answer important psychological questions to experience indie gameplay.

name: Incubation: The Wilderness Missions
summary: Incubation: The Wilderness Missions is Blue Byte Software's official expansion pack for Incubation: Time Is Running Out. It features a brand new campaign, new Scay'Ger and weapons, a map editor, and additional multiplayer options.

name: Inside the Cubes
summary: ITC is the story of Andy who is kidnapped by Tisafolians. Andy is put into a station, in where there is no gravity, to be tested some skills that are observation, analytical intelligence, eye hand coordination, weakness, etc. Your choices matter and change the end of the game.

name: Intensive Care ( Hospital Interactive Story )
summary:
A new story gamel by Tictales : Hospital Interactive Story! Plunge in the medical world and make life changing choices in every episode! 
 
You are a new intern in the hospital, you will be able to gradually discover and socialize with your colleagues but also your patients. Make the right choices and you will have the opportunity to learn more about them. Despite their different secrets and personalities, maybe someone would make you fall in love? 
 
Would you choose the alluring Hadrien? The kind patient Killian? Or would you get back to your ex Jason? Despite the stress, the emergencies, the love and the jealousy, would you be able to manage everything? 
 
Who never dreamed about being a doctor and save lives for a living? Who doesn’t want to know how it feels to work in one of the most important professions in the world? 
Now you can! With this new game Hospital Interactive Story you can dive into a fantasy world witch in it you are a doctor! 
Rush to the hospital and start an amazing adventure! make life choices that can take you to places you’ve never been! 
 
Hospital Interactive Story is a new interactive episode game that gives you the opportunity to create your own story! It doesn't matter if you are a man or woman, boy or girl, gay or straight, every one of you gets the opportunity to make choices by your own personal judgement and create a story just for you - an individual life story. 
 
if your dream is being a doctor and work in a hospital, now you can see how it feels! 
This is an amazing opportunity to see the interactive life of a doctor, to make choices as one in every episode of this story game, and even find love! 
You can meet and interact with patients, friends, colleagues and potential partner! 
In every episode of the game you will get the chance to make choices that make you the person you wish to be. 
 
In this new game you will have to find balance your choices between two central components of your daily life: love and career. It is known that people have a hard time managing these two areas successfully, and this is one of the reasons that make this game so great - it can actually help you. By playing the game on a daily basis, you can learn more about yourself through the choices you make. 
 
Hospital Interactive Story FEATURES: 
- You have full control of the story - your choices will make an impact. 
- Multiple different characters you can interact with in different ways. 
- Create your dream romance and love story. 
- Find the balance balance between business and pleasure. 
- Enchanting realistic graphics, colors and sounds. 
- learn how to be the best doctor

name: Invincible Cleopatra: Caesar's Dreams
summary: Help Cleopatra find the amulet of dreams and stop the war

name: Infinite Innocence
summary: Infinite Innocence is a game about finding anomalies, but it is very easy to see them with lighting. What if we give it a little more difficulty and tension? Will you be able to remember everything until the end?

name: In the Grass
summary: A little game no one should play.

name: Infektor
summary: Take control of a microbe and guide it through a hostile environment. Fight for your life in Survival mode and spread infection in Infect mode. Quick reflexes and smart use of environment are your only weapons in this challenging arcade style action game.

name: Ink Neko Maid
summary: A relaxing puzzle game with cat-girls.

name: Inu Dai Suki!
summary: Pet Club: Inu Dai Suki! is a Strategy game, developed and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: In Memory
summary: Step into the memories of a prisoner of war and let the story unfold.

name: Infinity
summary: Infinity (INFINITY.WAD) is a Doom episode replacement mod of eight levels, created by Bjorn Hermans and Holger Nathrath. It replaces episode one of the game, and is a sequel to Serenity and Eternity by the same authors

name: Infinity ZigZag
summary: Infinity ZigZag is an arcade game where you need to change the direction of a circle moving along a zigzag corridor.

name: InKing
summary: Inking is a fast-paced 2D top-down action game. Players take on the role of an ink bottle warrior on a journey to become the king of tools. Use your fast attacks, moves, and powerful skills to defeat the tools that stand in your way, prove that ink and pen are the best tools, and become the King of Tools.

name: Intrepid Lepid
summary: Venture through your own house to break free from your family

name: Injustice 2: The Atom
summary: Physics prodigy Ryan Choi has taken on the mantle of The Atom. Now armed with quantum shrinking technology, Ryan will use the subatomic power of the quantum bio-belt to seek out his lost friend and further the fight for justice.

name: Infinitype
summary: Infinitype is a word making game that follows a group of primates on their quest for knowledge. Go for large words and collect many bananas!

name: Infecto
summary:
A mad scientist created a deadly virus.
Mankind is on the verge of extinction.
People turn into zombie mutants.

name: International Basketball Manager 23
summary: Become the basketball manager of the moment and leave your mark by leading your own dynasty. Control all the management tools that International Basketball Manager 23 puts at your fingertips to take your team to the top. Manager, your time has come!

name: Interplanetary Gardener
summary: Mow the lawn, survive harsh climates on alien planets, and use your credits to upgrade high-tech equipment. Become the best interplanetary gardener!

name: Influenced
summary: #hustle for #lyfe

name: Inventorious
summary: Inventory management puzzle game.

name: Intergalactic Ambassador
summary: Negotiate with alien lifeforms entering our solar system to determine their intent, build bridges, or torch them outright.

name: In the footage
summary: "In the footage" is a horror exploration game.[/h2]You awaken in an empty room with nothing to do but play a videotape lying on the floor and contemplate the meaning of the footage. That's all you can do at this point.

name: Insect Hazard
summary: Action game in which a girl's school is attacked by insects. This is a story using selected dot animation and 2D illustrations.

name: Into the Circle
summary:
Inspired by the sport of curling, this physics game gives a lot of challenge with a relaxing experience

Shoot the ball in the right direction with the right amount of force into the next circle. Aiming from one circle to the other and achieve a perfect score! How far can you go?

name: Infection Maze
summary: Infection Maze is a Zombie FPS game developed by Masatoko Games in Japan.

name: Inside the Forest
summary: You and a group of friends decide to go on a camping trip in the Darkwood Forest, It starts off smoothly, but unforeseen events occur. and it’s only a matter of time before the true horror reveals itself.

name: InfiniteCorp
summary: The 2190 year. You are an employee of a corporation dealing in goods distribution and logistics in the “megatower” – the place where all local citizens live. Find yourself in the cyberpunk reality by playing InfiniteCorp, a decision-based strategy card game!

name: Invaders From Uranus
summary:
Invaders from Uranus is a a Retro First Person Shooter inspired by the "Halo" series where you must fight against little evil pink aliens to protect Earth! In the not too distant future, aliens invade earth. The evil aliens are set on one thing, the destruction of mankind. You, and your squad of highly trained soldiers, must defend Earth at all costs.

Equip an assault rifle, heavy pistol, sniper rifle, shotgun, or even captured alien technology to bring down enemy infantry and aircraft!

Aliens are much more advance than humans. Their plasma weapons burn through the toughest of armors and their shields block even the fastest projectiles. Use your surroundings , weapons, and squad mates to strategically defeat your foes.

name: Into The Depths
summary: A classic grid & turn-based roguelike, procedurally generated dungeon crawler, aimed at re-creating the games of yesteryear.

name: In the Darkness of the Sea
summary: In the Darkness of the Sea is a short narrative game about a boy lost in the middle of the ocean.

name: Insania
summary: Insania is a frenetic coop game for up to 4 players. Play local or online. Use items while cooperating with your friends to stop an invasion of horrifying creatures and find the source of the invasion.

name: International Karate 2000
summary: The classic karate fighter is back on the Game Boy Color, remade with the nostalgic gameplay that fans around the world will adore, and new play modes to keep the action fresh and exciting. Hiyah!

name: Infection
summary: Dave's fate rests in your hands.

name: Indy 4
summary: The game is housed in a large custom square cabinet with two steering wheels and four pedals on each side. The monitor sits in the top of the cabinet. The game uses a full-color RGB display and does not use color overlays. The cabinet also features overhead mirrors to allow spectators to watch the game while it's being played.

name: Instant Tennis
summary: INSTANT TENNIS, INSTANT FUN

name: Injustice: Gods Among Us General Zod
summary: Download General Zod, one of Superman's greatest enemies, for your Injustice: Gods Among Us DLC collection.

name: Inside SCP-167
summary: Inside SCP-167 is a first-person psychological horror game that combines investigation and puzzle-solving. Take on the role of Alex, the most experienced agent of the SCP Foundation, and explore a labyrinth of cubic rooms in order to put an end to a growing evil that is spreading throughout the area

name: Inhumanus
summary: Inhumanus is a story-based Sci-Fi singleplayer/co-op virtual reality shooter. Use a variety of guns to survive a complex full of aliens, robots, and mutants.

name: Inotia 3: Children of Carnia
summary:
Protect your loved ones in Carnia by joining the adventure! 
What would it take to change a warrior's destiny? 
 
An inevitable fate lies before the children of Carnia. The greatest epic adventure RPG by far! The Chronicles of Inotia 3! The new legend is about to begin in the continent of Inotia. 
 
"With the coming of age ritual ahead, Lucio and Ameli from Carnia village happen to be acquiring guntlets, and the adventure stirred up by these guntlets leads to a consequence that is a way beyond their imaginations against monsters... Lucio and Ameli realize soon that they have extraordinary destinies lain before them... Warriors' fates have been predestined for thousands of years already... Will those who are born to be warriors be happy after all?"

name: Interplanetary Voyage
summary: Interplanetary Voyage is an Action game, developed and published by Magnavox, which was released in 1973. The player guides their dot, which has momentum, to planets to complete missions given by cards with a maximum number of moves allowed.

name: Infinite Dungeon Crawler
summary: Fantasy turn-based RPG. Build and customize your party with 8 character classes and lots of weapons and armor options. Explore and fight through randomly generated worlds in search of loot with over 35 monster types to battle. Lots of skills, abilities, and magik spells provide ample re-playability.

name: Inferno Arena
summary: Prepare for intense 5v5 FPS action. Inferno Arena is a 3-freedoms-of-movement multiplayer First Person Arena Shooter in ultra-low-latency 1,000 ticks-per-second glory.

name: Industrial Complex
summary: Episode with 6 levels (1 briefing w/o monsters, 1 secret) featuring new textures, sounds and a new shotgun.

name: Ini
summary: At the beginning there was only darkness. Shadows dominated life but light dropped into the dark and a complex world evolved.

name: Infinity Attackers
summary: The Infinity is an endless source of power, used for good all over the galaxy. Recently however, a group of space pirates know as the Drognoks have made it their mission to destroy The Infinity, and harvest the remains for power and greed.

name: In the Hole
summary:
Light the Way!

Young Thyme has fallen into a hole in the ground, finding themselves surrounded by darkness in a strange dungeon. A mysterious entity allows them to borrow a magical lantern filled with fireflies to help them navigate the dark halls, and defend against the angry spirits.

Can Thyme make it out of the dungeon alive? At what cost?

name: Interactive Beckett Inversions
summary: Excerpts from Watt

name: Industrial Spy: Operation Espionage
summary:
Blending the stealth, RTS, and RPG genres, Industrial Spy has the player leading a team of superspies (Espion Agents, part of the Blitzstrahl corporation) infiltrating various locales like museums, a military installation, and even a German-style castle full of traps. Each of the agents has his own specialties, like computer hacking, rollerblading, handguns, etc.

Gameplay is like a regular real-time strategy game, with the player acting in the role of commander without taking a direct hand in anything. Give the agents orders and try to keep an eye on all of them as they carry them out. Each agent's skills can be upgraded after missions. Keep them out of sight of guards, spring traps on them, or engage them in hand-to-hand or ranged combat.

name: Ink, Mountains and Mystery
summary:
Ink, Mountains and Mystery is the second stylized indie game developed by the same minds behind The Beautiful Dream from NetEase Games. Using multi-layered, hand-painted 3D models and a unique rendering technology thanks to the self-developed NeoX engine, this game represents a unique artistic conception filled with gorgeous colors and great rolling landscapes. 
 
 
Ink, Mountains and Mystery has turned the aesthetic of two-dimensional paintings into spanning three-dimensional worlds. By using the classical horizontal scroll view together with a free-look view, players are led into wondrous scroll paintings of charming landscapes and will even enter the world of the Song Dynasty classic, A Thousand Li of Rivers. Prepare to experience the charm of ancient traditional cultures by exploring the brilliance of these classic works. 
 
 
It represents the artistic conceptions and beauty of traditional Chinese landscape paintings, often characterized by the prominence of blue and green colors. Prepare to enter this charming landscape and immerse yourself in a world full of wonder. Let the impressive painting style, intriguing tales, diverse personalities and moving music guide you on your fantastic journey through the unknown. 
 
 
Based on classic stories and tales from masterworks, A Chinese Bestiary, Flowers in the Mirror and more, this game contains many striking and touching tales. Follow the adventures of two unlikely protagonists as they explore different works and form bonds with all manner of characters. Let the impressive painting style, intriguing tales, diverse personalities and moving music guide you on your fantastic journey through the paintings.

name: Invasion of the Box People
summary: Destroy box shaped aliens before they can kill you! Outside of basically shooting the invading boxy aliens dead, you can also knock them into each other to create a powerful-yet-comedic “domino effect” – and when all else fails, pick up upgrades to boost your firepower.

name: Indiemon: Thunder Region
summary: After more than a year's absence, the Indiemon series returns. This time, the hero, Landon, finds himself in a new region with new Indiemon to capture.

name: Insector X
summary:
Insector X is a horizontally scrolling shooter.

The Genesis version has a number of differences: "realistic" sprite work (compared to the "cute" style of the original), brand new music, a reworking of the secondary weapon system, the removal of the autofire powerup, and new stage sections, among other things. Hot-B's original design for the game was better realized on the Genesis, as Taito requested a more comical style of game for the original release.

name: Inter Milan Club Football 2005
summary: The follow-up edition to Codemasters' multi-title soccer franchise (each dedicated to a single team in the UK and continental European football league and featuring unique presentation and other team-specific aspects), the 2005 series is powered by an accelerated game engine and new animation system to deliver faster and more responsive gameplay for precise control on the pitch. With twice the amount of official team content in each game, great skill moves and new game modes including Career, Practice and classic Scenarios (plus new clubs added to the line-up), the new Club Football 2005 range will bring players even closer to the heart of the action and the heart of their team.

name: Industry Giant 2 HD
summary: Economic booms, stock market crashes, oil crises, upswings, triumphs... Now you can become the greatest power in industry! Begin in the year 1900 with little money but large ambitions and through skilful decision-making you can build up an enormous business empire. Make critical decisions which products you should manufacture, where to gather the best raw materials, where to sell them and how to effectively transport them there.

name: Infinitroid
summary: A roguelike sci-fi platformer inspired by Binding of Isaac and Metroid, with a unique customizable weapon system.

name: Indigo
summary: The Indigo mod for Ocarina of Time is an ambitious romhack that creates a new adventure focused on an alternate Hyrule in which you play as adult Link from the start.

name: International Football
summary: International Football is a management game allowing you to participate in the World Cup with a choice of 32 teams from around the world. With your squad of 20 players you can train the players as well as change your tactics and playing styles. Once you are happy with your selections it is time to play your next game. On the match screen you can see both teams kit but the match is described in text. You can see a timer, the score and any incidents that occur. During a game and at half time you can substitute players or change tactics.

name: Inertia Ball
summary: This is an unusual adventure future simulation space game, in different gravity under your operation will also change. Players can feel the vastness of different planets in the game, feel different gravity, feel their own different operations. Conquer the universe!

name: Incunabula
summary: Based loosely on the Civilization biard game from Avalon Hill in which you guide your tribe towards a great nation, while competing with your neighbours and face catastrophes like earthquakes or plagues.

name: Industrial Petting
summary: Industrial Petting is the chance for you and your friends to explore an alien world, find new pets, get them to love you, and sell them on the galactic market. Build factories to make more creatures, farms to feed them, and gadgets to entertain them.

name: Inochi no Spare
summary:
Shukugawa Meguri is afflicted with an illness called the “Oumon” disease. At this point in time, nobody knows its cause, and there’s no real treatment for it yet. The only option with a slight chance of success, is to undergo a heart transplant. But finding a compatible heart is something that can be compared with a miracle. For that purpose Meguri’s sister, Ria, was actually born as a designer baby. So that her heart could be used “like a spare”.

This is the story about two sisters, the youngest born for the sake of the eldest. Other than their family, only Meguri's best friend Ryuuji knows about their secret. Her resolve wavers during the little time they have left. What will be the conclusion at the end of these emotional moments?

name: Interworlds
summary: Worlds are inter-connected. If you do something to the mini-world, a bigger "you" in a bigger world will do the same thing to your world. With this magic, you will solve puzzles and fight with enemies throughout the adventure.

name: Inflate Me to the Moon
summary: Use inflation to launch yourself to the moon!

name: Intergalactic
summary: Destroy Asteroids and Ships, Explore Space!

name: Indy Pro '22: Rebirth of the Territories
