summary: Indy Pro '22: Rebirth of the Territories is a pro wrestling booking simulator based on the real world of independent professional wrestling.

name: Invasion UAC
summary: Invasion UAC is a megawad by David Bernardi (Xsnake), meant for ZDoom-based source ports. Containing 32 very large, difficult levels, aimed primarily at cooperative gameplay, but also supporting single player, Invasion UAC is set mainly in a series of UAC locales overrun by the forces of Hell, which also include some new monsters through DeHackEd. The WAD is notable for featuring infinite ammo, eliminating the need to scour for supplies and focusing purely on the combat for most of the map. Invasion UAC was originally released in 2005, as three-level wad, and new levels would be added to the project gradually, until a full 32 were reached in version 5, released in 2009. The latest version, iu-part5-zd109c.wad, dates to 2012.

name: Inside
summary: Inside is a first person horror game. Developed by 9ine and released on Jul 29th, 2012

name: IndividuaLand
summary: Turn based combat strategy game with town management. 16 different Jungian personality types. Teach skills to characters, attract new visitors, improve profession skills, go on adventurers, craft items, fight with more than 100 monsters in 6 different type adventure areas.

name: Inaka Kurashi: Nan no Shima no Monogatari
summary: The game puts the player in the role of 15 year old Tomoko on her visit to her grandparents living on an island in Okinawa. As Tomoko, you must interact with inhabitants, explore the island, and live many little everyday relaxing adventures. Released only in Japan.

name: Inotia 4: Assassin of Berkel
summary:
Which side will you choose when the two forces rise again?
Inotia saga brought to the next level! 《Inotia 4》

Stride along with Kiyan, the Shadow Tribe's virtuoso, and Eara, the influential Channel of Light, in their fantasy adventure story.
With improved graphics and storyline from the previous series, get indulged in the battles against goblins, orcs, and more!

A new hero awaits to be released from his shadows, or not...in the all-new Inotian continent mobile RPG action game

name: Into the Valley
summary: A single player third person detective adventure RPG set in ancient Egypt. While the game is primarily a quest game in which you have to follow clues to find your daughter who has been kidnapped by slave traders, it does contain elements of combat and exploration.

name: Invisible Man
summary: A story about a man turned invisible by an experiment. Explore the mysterious facility and escape it.

name: Inuyasha: Feudal Combat
summary: Featuring all your favorite characters from the hit TV show, the first Inuyasha fighting game for the PlayStation 2 features a mission mode, a battle mode for versus gameplay, practice mode and a story mode. Featuring an original battle system, the game allows you to partner with another character, select the best formation system and develop and strengthen your fighting partnership, and destroy objects around you as you battle to take out the opposition.

name: Inglorious Pirate
summary: Inglorious pirate is a 2D platformer with side-view shooter elements. The player will play the role of an old pirate, from whom a treasure treasure was stolen.

name: Inside Kitty's Outside Adventure
summary: Go on a big adventure when Inside Kitty takes her first big adventure in the outside.

name: Inertix
summary:
A unique minimal puzzle that will satisfyingly tease your brain.
Play Inertix and embark on a timing puzzle journey filled with exquisite mechanics that will put your synchronization skills to the ultimate test! All while relaxing your senses.

name: Infinity Tempest
summary: You must help the three heroes to flee from their pursuers in an endless race for the survival of humanity.

name: Interplay Klondike Solitaire
summary:
Interplay is proud to present Klondike Solitaire for Android!

- The classic game of Solitaire, for free!
- Test your skills with Traditional and Challenge based scoring
- Beat the clock with Timed Play!
- Play Solitaire as you've always known it or switch to Vegas rules for a new challenge!
- See how your game has improved with user statistics
- An easy to use interface

name: Inferno Puzzle
summary: Simple low poly puzzle game with challenging levels and darker theme

name: Interlakes
summary: Interlakes, a game being developed by indie studio Team Revived, is an open world sci-fi third-person survival shooter game inspired by War of the Worlds and games such as Half-Life 2 and The Last of Us. In Interlakes, you explore a vast and beautiful world invaded and in the verge of being conquered by alien forces. We aim to improve aspects of survival genre.

name: Inescapable VR: Underground
summary: A mysterious villain has locked you in an old basement and given you a simple task: to escape by completing the series of puzzles set before you. With a bomb timer set for one hour, can you discover the inner workings of the game and complete the challenges in time, or is your fate inescapable?

name: Inspector Gadget
summary: A second Inspector Gadget LCD game.

name: Instant Brain
summary: Instant Brain is an Adventure game, developed and published by Cave, which was released in Japan in 2011.

name: Invisible
summary: An interactive narrative game about homelessness in Montreal

name: Inize Warrior
summary: The "Beat it, then break it" pixel art RPG featuring two storylines and a unique battle system with platforming elements.

name: Invasion VS
summary: Four-player competitive retro shooter exclusively for OUYA

name: Ingredienta
summary: Discovering, brewing and perfecting powerful elixirs, mixtures and droughts. Exploring unique, randomly-generated fantasy lands. Overcoming obstacles and dangers using various potions and gathering ingredients for stronger ones. Welcome to Ingredienta!

name: Inbetween a Land of Grass
summary: Some people need some help!

name: Infinite Realms
summary: Sci-fi strategy MMO browser game developed and published by Joyport. Now shut down.

name: Inner Abyss
summary: The world is riddled with monsters beyond our understanding, from horrors unknown. It is now your task to find out why they are here, and how to get rid of them before it is too late.

name: Incredible Dracula: Legacy of the Valkyries
summary: Gather your undead cronies and set off on a journey through fantastical lands and past fierce creatures of legend to claim a treasure beyond imagination! Count Dracula awaits your arrival.

name: Ink and Paper: Wandering
summary: Fight enemies with four different styles in turn-based tactical combat. Grant mercy to your enemies and maybe they'll spare you. Flee when you can't win, and return with friends. Avoid spiritual foes, who can't be defeated in battle. Step in the world of the well known, but still different fantasy.

name: International Tennis Tour
summary: International Tennis Tour is a video game about tennis and being an international superstar. There are practice, exhibition, and career mode where the player is given a generous number of dollars and must compete on the world tennis circuit in order to gain more money.

name: Interlayer
summary: Find out what lies in the realm between two opposing universes with up to 4 players in co-op! Evolve your cybernetic suit and weapon by using them, construct outposts, automate resource gathering, and find out what secrets the Wardens of this place want to keep hidden. But most importantly, survive.

name: Infinite Dronin
summary: Your challenge: defeat waves of enemies, level your drone and survive as long as you can. Infinite Dronin is a roguelike hack-and-slash arena fighter with a Twitch twist.

name: Insect
summary: Insect is one of the few games released for the Game Boy Advance add-on Play-Yan. It was distributed online by Nintendo in 2005.

name: Invert: Tile Flipping Puzzles
summary: Invert is a brain-teasing, tile flipping, minimalist puzzle game. Sit down, get comfortable and flip your way through 160+ unique puzzles that will leave you flipping in your dreams!

name: Insectophobia : Episode 1
summary: Insectophobia is an episodic platformer. It's the story of John and his struggle against monster insects.

name: Insurgence: Chains of Renegade
summary: Insurgence is a 2D Role Playing Game with Visual Novel elements, Enjoy the classic RPG experience and discover the meaning of redemption and friendship within the Insurgence movement.

name: Internet Reversi
summary: Internet Reversi is a game pre-installed on Windows ME and Windows XP systems that features online play.

name: Intern Astronaut
summary: Intern Astronaut is a VR game about flying a space ship.

name: Inside The Memory
summary: [Using Live2D, almost full voice] (Voice is only in Japanese)A mystery that begins with a single invitation received from your uncle.A ``mystery'' that happens to someone who was supposed to be an invited guest. Please try to solve it by yourself.

name: Independence Day
summary: Laser gun version of Independence Day by Tiger Electronics.

name: Inn The Dark
summary: You have been sent to aid in a Triple Homicide case. But you soon find that things are not as they seem. Inn This first person horror game you must investigate the strange super natural on goings in a haunted hotel. Run and hide from danger using only a Flashlight and Camera!

name: Inconvenience Store
summary: Party game with wacky physics, compete in a gauntlet of minigames to become employee of the month!

name: Inspector Parker Unsolved
summary: 2 pack of casual games: Inspector Parker and Betrapped!

name: Independence Day
summary: Based on the homonymous movie.

name: Infestus
summary: A Kingdom in turmoil, a rising darkness in the North, will you take on the challenges ahead?

name: Insanity Edged
summary: Insanity Edged is a GZDoom mod for Doom 2 with 3 playable maps, a new set of weapons, and a cinematic story line. It takes place in the same universe as Winter's Fury.

name: Insecticide
summary: Enter the fast shooting world of Insecticide as hot shot rookie Detective Chrys Liszt and help solve a crime of epic proportions. Lead your team on a bug hunt, collecting clues and solving puzzles. Use old-fashioned street smarts, unique insect abilities and an arsenal of ingenious bug weapons to confront your suspects. Explore a futuristic world of mutant insects and uncover the truth in a city infested with corruption. It won’t be easy solving this mystery, but some buggy’s got to do it!

name: Intellivision Shark! Shark! Gen2
summary: A remake of Shark! Shark! for Sony digital distribution channels.

name: Interregnum: Dark Archer
summary: Rebel camp deciphered.We have to stand rebels off.Use your arrows carefully.

name: Infinite Versus
summary: Experience the ultimate triad of high-speed gameplay, hitch-free online battles with zero-input delay, and unmatched mod support. Infinite Versus operates with the new Blitz Netcode and provides full mod support for stories, stages, assists, audio, & characters. Your next battle awaits!

name: Invasion: Family Ties
summary: Rick travels to Indiana to visit his mother, but during his stay, unexpected events occur that lead him on a thrilling adventure. However, little does he know that a major threat looms on the horizon that will change everything. Will Rick be able to save the day and protect those he cares about?

name: Invasion: Brain Craving
summary: It's the zombie-slaying survival game with JRPG elements you didn't know you wanted! Get swarmed by zombies in active-time battles, search for other survivors, eat and most importantly: SURVIVE!

name: Invisibox
summary: Invisibox is a tough puzzle game where you have to solve sliding puzzles by controlling invisible boxes while avoiding various obstacles.

name: Indie Assault
summary: Indie Assault is a fast paced platform fighter with advanced techniques. The characters are pulled from exciting indie games, and show off several of their signature moves in their distinct and visually stunning play styles.

name: Indestructotank Anniversary Edition
summary:
A remake of IndestructoTank, with some elements from Indestruc2Tank.

Strap on your IndestructoBelts - it's gonna be a bumpy ride!

name: Invasion
summary: Invasion - is the simplest 3D shooter with surviving elements in which you must survive on an unknown planet.

name: Infinite Cube Defense
summary: If you want to spend a little time playing games and keep moving and catching monsters, start right now.

name: Infinity Boob Clicker
summary: Endlessly click on what you always wanted to! Progress and improve your tools and conquer them all!

name: Invadead
summary: shoot at hordes of zombies using diffrent guns and grenades, epicly decimating them by your pure handsomeness.

name: Industry Idle: Expansion Pack 1
summary: Industry Idle is an idle game that combines factory building, resource management and market trading. Design & build your base, expand & scale up your productions, improve & optimize your economy. Plus all the incremental game goodies: offline earnings, prestige to unlock more powerful upgrades.

name: Infamous Duck Ball
summary: boat, duck, and balloonfish

name: Into Hell
summary: Into Hell is intended to be an episode of levels that take you deeper and deeper underground, until you find a crack in the Earth and dive into the realm itself.

name: Industrix
summary: Step into the world of industrial production and become a master in factory-building! Create efficient production lines and manage your resources. As you progress through the game, you'll need to complete challenges for a certain company in order to rank up and unlock new technologies!

name: Incoming Message
summary: Far away space stations and long distance friendships.

name: Infinite sky
summary: This is an escape flight game. The pace of the game is very tight. The player's goal is to survive as much as possible.

name: Infinity Pipe
summary: smysl 2 gravity, is a mind bending 2D puzzle game where your goal is to reach the red flag. To do this, you must move around your character as well as altering the direction of gravity to access areas previously unattainable.

name: Indoors: The Alston Manor
summary: All kind of unsolved horrors from all around the world are just a door away. INDOORS is a single-player horror anthology game developed by Snova where your puzzle solving abilities will take you through 7 paranormal escape rooms.

name: Innoquous 5
summary: Innoquous 5 is a huge puzzle-platformer... with a twist! Hit a gravity arrow or jump into a flipper and you can rotate gravity, opening new paths through each of the huge collection of levels!

name: Innerworld
summary: Horror-RPG game with anthropomorphic casts called “Beastchild”. Defeat monsters and cults tring to kill Nicolas, and rescue his friends and family. It features speedy, and tense battles with ATB system. Analyze the enemy and gain advantages. Make full use of the items and destroy them.

name: Infected: Super Soldier Project
summary: A police officer goes to investigate an old house where he hears reports of noises and screams, a team was sent before him and they didn't give any feedback, something macabre awaits this police officer.

name: Inagawa Junji: Kyoufu no Yashiki
summary: Inagawa Junji: Kyoufu no Yashiki is an Adventure game, developed by Billiken Soft and published by Visit, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Instinct Rush
summary: Hit vehicle, rub guardrail, cut human body, and drive freely.

name: Inside Explorer: Mummy with figurines
summary: The scans of this mummified man tells us about late Egyptian burial practices, from the placement of his hands to figurines he was buried with.

name: Intrepid
summary: You have to enter an embassy and steal secret plans from the vault.

name: Injustice: Gods Among Us - Special Edition
summary:
The Special Edition includes:

Exclusive red SteelBook case
Red Son DLC Pack
20 additional missions set within the Red Son storyline

name: Ingredients for the Chaos
summary: Ingredients For The Chaos is an open world RPG and has two different combat modes.The game takes you on an epic adventure full of greed, passion and intrigue. Get to know different companions on your journey and fight the chaos together with them.

name: Inside Explorer: The Gilded Lady
summary: Inside Explorer: The Gilded Lady DLC offers an epic exploration of a real ancient mummy from the Field Museum's collection.

name: Indeep
summary: Play this casual classical dungeon crawler anytime and anywhere and save your progress for later. The dungeon is waiting for you!

name: Into the Hive
summary: Into the Hive is an immersive first-person shooter horror game, crafted in the nostalgic style of the PlayStation 1 era. Initially developed as an entry for the 32-bit Jam 2021 in a 2 week timeframe.

name: In the Mix featuring Armin Van Buuren
summary:
Step into the world of a DJ and youll surprise not only your friends and rivals, but also yourself with In The Mix featuring Armin van Buuren.

This Wii game gives everyone the chance to mix Music like a real DJ. Using the unique capabilities of the Wii you can start DJ-ing in an instant. It includes more than 60 famous tracks by Armin van Buuren and other artists, and 30 special remixes. In career mode you will work your way up from underground clubs to stadiums to become an international superstar. In party mode you are left entirely free to mix the music in the way you want, and to show off your newly-learned skills to your friends. In studio mode you can use samples and loops to easily create and save your own tracks. You can then use these tracks in party mode. In The Mix featuring Armin van Buuren has something for everyone.

name: Ink Escape: Coven Conundrum
summary: Ink Escape: Coven Conundrum is a puzzle-based escape room. Solve puzzles and discover the stories of your ancestors in the books you have inherited.

name: Incremental Island
summary: Build and expand a vibrant civilization on a procedurally generated island

name: Insect Seeker
summary: Finding game for insects and animals hidden in photographs

name: Integer Snake
summary: Integer Snake is a puzzle webgame, where the player connects neighboring squares that contain the same number and attempts to build high numbers and attain a high score.

name: Infinite Scuba
summary: Explore the ocean like a real scuba diver.

name: Introvert Quest
summary: Introvert Quest is a comedy based JRPG set in a fictional, modern setting. Experience the life of a socially awkward shut-in who is pushed into herculean tasks by his therapist.

name: Inferno: Deathfield
summary: After a long time in exile, Lucifer, the King of the Underworld rages again to conquer the Hell. The demons emerge through the door of death and a chosen warrior is destined to seal it once for all and save the mankind from a total abolishment. Be the chosen warrior and save the world!

name: Indestruc2Tank
summary: Indestruc2Tank, the long awaited sequel to the surprise hit IndestructoTank with tonnes of new features! All new hand animated graphics, an Improved Physics engine, three distinct game modes including a story mode with levels, bosses and a fully voice acted cast of characters! Earn medals by achieving goals and use them to unlock secrets such as alternate tank graphics and much much more! Armor games is proud to present Indestruc2Tank!

name: In the Days of My Life
summary: Management and life-simulation Game with elaborate Relationships, where players manage their character’s actions and activities as they explore topics about self-discovery, parent-children relationships, friendships, and growing up as a College Student.

name: Ink of Fate
summary: Explore the world of books, discover its secrets and collect every page in Ink of Fate. A narrative 3D puzzle game in which you will help Helena, a half elf who embarks on a journey to rewrite her destiny and avoid the tragic end imposed on her by her author.

name: Infinity Racer XD
summary: Infinity Racer XD is designed to be a fast, simple to control and satisfying flight experience. Enjoy the simple and colorful atmosphere and master your reflexes. Infinity Racer XD fast, it's fun and it's awesome to kill time and to beat the high score.

name: Infinite Canyon
summary:
Test your skills and reflexes flying impressively fast planes in procedurally generated infinite canyons !
Earn your wings with 3 increasingly fast planes and see how much score you can make with each of them.
Fly low, fast, near obstacles and mostly survive the longer that you can to increase your score.
Both accelerometer and touch controls are implemented to adapt the flight experience to you.
Will you be able to keep mach speed at 15 ft from ground ?
Ready for the next step ? Achievements and scoreboard will spice up the challenge.

name: Insider Tales: Vanished In Rome
summary: Adventure awaits you in Italy! Crack a new, mysterious case with Inspector Francesca di Porta! Travel to Rome on the trail of a couple that seems to have disappeared from the face of the earth.

name: Infinite Skyline
summary: Infinite Skyline is a open world helicopter simulation indie game with focus on racing, dogfight and exploring set in a huge city. You can choose several types of missions or just free fly with one of the several helicopters.

name: In the Dark
summary: A short 2D metroidvania that explores some darker themes contrasted by bouncy, pixel art visuals.

name: Injustice: Gods Among Us
summary: A completely separate beast from its big console counterpart, Injustice: Gods Among Us for mobile is a fighting game that can unlock features in the console versions.

name: Interstellar Distress
summary: A 4 player co-op horror where you answer distress calls and board spaceships in search of survivors.

name: Interior Designer
summary: Step into the world of Interior Designer. Embark on client jobs, dominate the Design League, and create stunning interiors. Shape your spaces, and unleash your style. Your masterpiece awaits.

name: Inv+
summary: Inv+ is a Space Invaders clone homebrew for the Atari 2600.

name: Inner Struggle
summary: How long can she resist the unbearable weight of her own mind?

name: Injustice 2: Sub-Zero
summary: Download and play as Sub-Zero, who fights using a deadly combination of ice powers and martial arts.

name: Interstice
summary: A hardcore, rougelite, bullet, hell monster capture game. Inspired by nuzlockes. Capture spirits and do battle, can you make it to the centre of the Interstice and unravel its secrets?

name: Infiniminer
summary: Infiniminer is a first-person competitive mining game that takes place in a procedurally generated block world allowing players to mine, build, and explore. Best known as an inspiration for Minecraft, the game was abandoned shortly after its initial release.

name: Infinite Dunamis
summary: One day while returning home from a job in the Royal City, a gifted engineer by the name of Luke comes across a young woman being attacked in the cave near his village. After fending off her attackers, he attempts to pull her from a heap of discarded mechanical parts only to discover she herself is half robot! Somewhat curious about what he has stumbled onto, Luke decides to take her home and fix her up, but little does he realize the chain of events he is about to find himself tangled up in...!

name: Inuyasha: Naraku no Wana! Mayoi no Mori no Shoutaijou
summary: Inuyasha: Naraku no Wana! Mayoi no Mori no Shoutaijou is a board game, developed by WinkySoft and published by Takara, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: Intelligent Strategy Games Volume 1
summary:
A collection of classical board games which includes:

- Backgammon
- Draughts
- Gomoku
- Chinese Chess
- Bridge

name: Inn: the Countryside
summary: Become a real cooking chef in a cozy countryside tavern – play Inn: the Countryside! Go into the simple but amazingly delicious recipes of the province dishes; please tourists with your mastery and sweet-heart atmosphere. Improve your cooking skills and open your own prospering inn’s net!

name: Inspecteur Banaan en de ontvoering van Mabella
summary: A Dutch Point 'n click adventure created by Torpedo Software for Davilex. You play a cop named Govert Banaan and you have to investigate a kidnapping case of the fictional pop star MaBella. In the game you have will explore Amsterdam. The graphics style is a mix of real-life photographs and cartoon characters.

name: Inuyasha: Kagome no Sengoku Nikki
summary: Inuyasha: Kagome no Sengoku Nikki is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 2001.

name: Injustice 2: Brainiac
summary: Play as Brainiac before earning him in-game through completing story mode.

name: Infinite Red: The Day the Earth Stood Still
summary: A game about an unreleased, unfinished, video game tie-in to a canceled 1999 multimedia reboot of Infinite Red, a 1970s tokusatsu character.

name: Indian Battle
summary: The player takes control of a cowboy battling Native Americans. There are three types of enemies including the Indian footman, Indian on horseback and Buzzard. Arrow and tomahawk projectiles can also be shot for points. Enemies on the same plane such as scorpions cannot be shot and limit where the player can move the cowboy. Obstacles such as cacti and rocks block the cowboy's line of fire. One hit from an enemy or projectile takes a life away. The player is required to kill a set number of enemies to progress to the next level.

name: Intelligent Strategy Games Volume 2
summary:
A collection of board games including:

- Renju
- Reversi (mis-labeled as Othello on the box)
- Chess
- Four-in-a-Line
- Go

name: Inquisitor
summary:
Inquisitor is played with a mouse only. The goal of the game is to be the first faction to reach 3 points. Each round you will select a number of personnel required for the mission. If no assimilants are present on the away team or they choose not to act at this time the mission will be a success and you will score a point, if an assimilant is present they will often sabotage the mission and it will fail, scoring a point for the assimilants.

There are also two interrogation rounds where you can determine the faction of a single personnel. Use these carefully as attempting to identify assimilants is key!

name: In Darkness We Hide
summary: In Darkness We Hide is a multiplayer hide an seek game where you try to hide in the dark to avoid the hunters but stay in the light to prevent yourself from going insane.

name: Industriworks
summary: Dig and build in a blocky sandbox world, economize heat in smelter to smelt more resources at once. There is few ores, metals, alloys and other materials, that you can use in your crafting to make powerful tools and golems.

name: InfinityAngel
summary: InfinityAngel is a 3D action NFT game from South Korea.

name: Interpol
summary: Interpol is a game for two players, one controls two spies (red characters) and the other controls two police officers (blue characters). The spies are in possession of secret information and must try to leave the country with them, by air or by sea. The police officers have to stop their plan. The airport and the port are blocked by the police, and individuals interested in traveling must present a code which only the police knows.

name: Injustice 2: Black Manta
summary: Download and play as Black Manta – whose powerful armored wetsuit makes him a formidable combatant. Sworn to avenge the death of his father, Black Manta has long waited for his moment to strike.

name: Inertia
summary: In this game the player controls a spinner that is bouncing while is trying to collect scattered titles.

name: Insulated at the Bottom
summary: Insulated at the bottom - An atmospheric third-person shooter, meet and destroy enemies on your way, cope with difficult platforming and plunge into the atmosphere of an abandoned military base.

name: In Misery: Episode 1 - The Farm
summary: Lost on an unfamiliar back road in one of the most remote parts of Missouri, you stop in a small town called Misery for help, but what you find is much worse. In the single-player, exploratory, horror anthology series "In Misery", your main goal is simple: make it out alive.

name: Initium Legenda
summary: "A new and grand fantasy world that has never existed before opens." "You're the adventurer who will start the legend with Siryu!" Initium Legenda is the first authentic SRPG game developed and launched by Legenda Inc.

name: Infinite Mario Bros.
summary: A browser game that procedurally generates platformer levels with graphics, sound and mechanics based on a combination of Super Mario Bros. 3 and Super Mario World.

name: In The Shadows
summary: Survive in the night from the things full of spite.

name: Interview
summary: They're waiting for you.

name: Inspace 2980
summary:
Inspace 2980 is a stylish and dynamic shmup from the 16-bit era of games consoles and arcade machines.
Take part in an exciting adventure and save the galaxy! Once again!

name: In another world, I will attain my dream of ALL I CAN SEX!
summary: A role-playing game from dieselmine.

name: Incognito
summary: An indie game like no other. Incognito is a cross genre adventure that thrusts you into a foreign solar system known as Sector 42. You are forced to survive in deep space through exploration and questing between planets. Incognito mixes different gaming genres together into one complete narrative.

name: Input Chaos
summary: A physics based multiplayer fighting game.

name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
summary:
As Indy, the player must complete several cycles of the following three types of levels:

1.Mine level: Whip your way through a mine in order to free children that are held captive. Use your whip to swing across chasms, climb ladders, ride along conveyor belts and defend yourself against attacks from Thuggee guards, bats, snakes and the fireball-throwing Mola ram. Escape with the mine cart after you've freed all children.
2.Mine cart level: Pick the right route through a network of tracks while riding in a mine cart. Avoid potholes, broken tracks & guards in carts and safely reach the end of the track.
3.Temple level: Make your way to the altar and grab the Sankara stone while Mola Ram, bats and Thuggee guards attack you. Watch out for that lava.

name: InMind 2 VR
summary: An adventure game about a scientific journey inside the emotions chemistry of human brain. You'll take part in the process of one teenager named John becoming an adult, and help shape John's future self, by triggering emotions in key moments of his life. The destiny is in your hands! VR isn't required.

name: Infinite Dungeon Crawler: The Caverns of Grimlock
summary: DLC opens up another world that you can travel to when you go through the Gate. Fight challenging monsters like Driders, Grimlocks, and the horrifying Mind Flayer in a dark and twisting cavern type of world. NOTE: You must unlock the base game to load this expansion pack.

name: Inside: Before Birth
summary:
If you woke up alone in the darkness and trapped... What would you do? Run away or continue?
I only say you... When the darkness hunts you, you don't know what is real...

name: Into the Rhythm VR
summary: Into the Rhythm VR is a drumming experience brought to virtual reality. You are given drum sticks along with 6 drums. Follow the dropping notes to play the awesome music you always wanted. All you need is a place to sit, and motion controllers to strike with rhythm!

name: Inventorix
summary: Inventorix, your trusty high-tech space asset inventory device, holds the key to extracting value from the vast resources scattered across the cosmos. But this marvel of technology comes at a price—quite literally. You secured it through a questionable loan scheme, and now you're on the hook to pay off your ever-increasing debt before the space loan sharks come knocking.

name: In Her Footsteps
summary: In Her Footsteps is a short story about mending a broken heart from the award-nominated creators of Causeway, No Response and Helmouth Halls

name: Invisiballs
summary: Invisiballs is a competitive local multiplayer game for two to four players. Everyone controls an invisible ball inside a maze and must capture a golden artifact to win the game.

name: In Bred With Rednex
summary: An adventure game starring the Swedish techno/folk/bluegrass band Rednex.

name: Inva Noid
summary: Endless invaders/breaker high score chaser!

name: Incursion2D
summary: A fast paced action RPG where you will fight increasingly difficult waves of enemies, each with unique abilities! You will be fighting various bosses, work on your secondary skills, collect cosmetics for your character and work on your very own island!

name: Invasion of the Mushroom Men of Planet Y!
summary: This is a quick, goofy game that lasts about ten minutes per play through-unless you choose wrongly-organ music, please! In addition to your choices, there is also the random element of chance that may affect your fate. Due to the constraints of the game engine, can only be viewed in windows mode.

name: Into the Holoverse
summary: A turn-based tactical hololive battler. Also gacha.

name: Indekos
summary: Indekos follows university students Roy and Doni sharing a rented room. This action-adventure game blends joy, romance, and personal challenges, letting players experience the highs and lows of student life while navigating their evolving relationship and balancing academics and friendships.

name: In Other Waters: Xenobiologist Edition
summary: The Xenobiologist Edition brings together the three core parts of In Other Waters - the game, where you explore and study an alien ocean alongside Dr. Ellery Vas, the companion book, and the Original Soundtrack by Kingdom series composer Amos Roddy.

name: Interstellar Highway Robbery
summary: Take space dosh. Shoot bad guys. Steal ships.

name: Infinite Chump
summary: A surreal, mutated roguelike where you are a chump, infinitely.

name: Into the Mosswood
summary: Into the Mosswood is a very short micro-game that will take ~15 minutes from beginning to end. It's a fairy tale. WASD or arrows to move, F to interact.

name: In the Bush
summary: In the bush is a casual rougelike where you play as a fly who needs to clear the stage from other insects to proceed to the next stage. At the start of each stage you get to select a mod that makes you stronger.

name: Invector: Rhythm Galaxy - Spinnin' Song Pack
summary: Unleash the energy of the Spinnin' Song Pack, featuring 6 thrilling songs by the likes of Martin Solveig & GTA, Sam Feldt ft. RANI, R3HAB & INNA & Sash!, ÖWNBOSS & Sevek, Tujamo, Bingo Players ft. Far East Movement.

name: Intake: Be Aggressive
summary: Master your reflexes with the fast shooter Intake: Be Aggressive! Intake is the new retro-futuristic drugstep arcade shooter from Cipher Prime. In this psychedelic shooter, you battle a never-ending barrage of pills, pushing your skill and reflexes to the limit to avoid a lethal dosage. Blast and combo your way through an epic cascade of audiovisual mayhem so intoxicating it comes with its own warning label.

name: Internet Cafe Evolution
summary: This is a business simulation + construction game. It tells the evolution history of Internet cafes that began in the 1990s, and also carries the youth of nearly two generations over the past thirty years.

name: Inside the loop
summary: A mysterious journey inside a loop. Game done during the Ludum Dare JAM 47

name: Interplay Solitaire
summary: Interplay's classic Solitaire is back with 26 different games of Solitaire to choose from!

name: Inventris TD
summary: A tower defense shooter where the combat happens inside your inventories.

name: Influent: Definitive Edition
summary: Influent is a 3D Language Learning Game focused on vocabulary acquisition and pronunciation that gives players the freedom to choose what words they want to learn in a way that is more immersive and fun than ever before! The Definitive Edition now includes all 23 languages!

name: Instacalm VR
summary: Learn meditative practice mindfulness and relaxation Instacalm VR is a suite of relaxation training and meditative practice training products

name: Indoor Sports
summary:
A collection of indoor sports games.

- Ten-pin bowling
- Darts
- Air Hockey
- Ping-Pong

name: Infinicity
summary: This little sandbox game generates gigabytes of procedural city, traffic and world around you as you move.

name: In A Dark Cave
summary: An exploration game about finding secrets.

name: In Plain Sight
summary: An emotional and impactful story set in modern America among residents of a trailer park who struggle not only with their economic situation but also with a net of mysteries and secrets.

name: Insurgence: Bloodmoon
summary: Insurgence: Bloodmoon is the third entry of the Insurgence series which tells the story of Richa and her friends in Valdera, a small island rife with mysteries.

name: Incoherence
summary: Enter the mind of Jason Bethlam as he awakes to a brightly lit room. With an assortment of items, a camera, and no memory of how you got there you’ll need to photograph everything and solve puzzles to piece together the mystery of what happened and escape.

name: Incredible Dracula 4: Games of Gods
summary: Outsmart a god in a thrilling showdown of wits and enjoy a lot of laughs along the way! Featuring drop-dead gorgeous visuals and a story that will keep you in stitches, Incredible Dracula 4: Game of Gods will take you on a journey you'll never forget!

name: In an attempt to save the innocents
Industrial War
summary: Explore the world In the 1920s, with more than 800 cities and 200 mines. Know your industrial chain and plan the role of each city; know your nation's unique polity structure and adjust your overall strategy. Resist the restlessness of your neighbors, acquire resources, and develop your industry.

name: Into the Box
summary: Psychedelic chiptuned dizzy game

name: Incoherence
summary: What started as a relaxing day off with your partner suddenly takes a turn when you find yourself waking up alone at the metro station of a creepy, abandoned complex owned by a mysterious megacorporation...

name: Invasão
summary: About halfway through A 2ª Jornada, Sirey and his companions built 1 million Teenooks and sent them to the alien ships in orbit. And now you control just one of these robots, Teenook965421, who has infiltrated the tunnels of an alien mothership.

name: Incredible Shrinking Fireman
summary: Incredible Shrinking Fireman was a budget platform adventure title

name: Infectious
summary: Play as a lethal virus infecting various organs in your host's body while trying to outsmart the immune cells that seek to eliminate you and your kind.

name: Invasion Eternity
summary: Embark on an epic ninja adventure in a world filled with thrilling quests, powerful champions, and strategic multiplayer battles! Assemble your team of elite warriors, conquer bases, and reap passive rewards to strengthen your champions. Dominate the battlefield!

name: Intake
summary: Intake is the new retro-futuristic drugstep arcade shooter from Cipher Prime. In this polychromatic love child of Dr. Mario and Ikaruga, you battle a never-ending barrage of pills, pushing your skill and reflexes to the limit to avoid a lethal dosage. Blast and combo your way through an epic cascade of audiovisual mayhem so intoxicating it comes with its own warning label.

name: Inzo
summary: Inzo. A puzzle solving, murder-mystery sleuthing, foul-mouthed adventure game.

name: Into the Waves
summary: Morin is a barkeeper with an unusual curse. All people look like shadows to him, except for one mysterious stranger... Solve the mystery of the curse, fight true darkness and mix the most unusual cocktails in the atmospheric visual novel — Into the Waves!

name: Infinity Wars
summary: Defend the higher dimensions against the enemy scourge! Engage in warfare, command armies, and summon creatures, Infinity Wars is an exciting action-strategy game.

name: Into King Rabbit's Mansion
summary: Fast-Paced Stealth Adventure inside a Massive Intricate Hand-Crafted Mansion

name: Inukko Club: Fukumaru no Daibouken
summary: Inukko Club: Fukumaru no Daibouken is an Adventure game, developed and published by Jorudan, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: InMind VR
summary: InMind is a short scientific adventure with arcade elements designed for the Oculus VR. Submerge into the microworld and experience the miracles of the human mind.

name: Industry Mania
summary: Industry Mania is a casual and time management video game. This game utilizes a point-and-click arcade gameplay model that enables the player to recruit workers, give workers salaries, manage energy resources, operate factories, collect products, sell products, and make even more cash.

name: Inkanians
summary:
Inkanians is a puzzle game on you control a squared-inca moving boxes, slide blocks, teleport... to collect all the diamonds of the level 
 
History: Two incas stole a treasure and a mysterious magic turning them in to rocks inside the cave. Now they have to find the way to escape. 
 
The game starts with easy levels to explain all the mechanics and increases the difficulty in various ways until the last levels. There is no constant difficulty increase, you can find a normal level and after that some a bit more easier to no get frustrated after something hard

name: Into the Dim
summary: Roguelike RPG where the player must try to rescue his dog from dungeons filled with monsters and puzzles.

name: Interstellar Invaders
summary: Interstellar Invaders is an arcade game which cobines the game mechanics of Arkanoid, Galaga, and Missile Command in hand-built and (eventually) proceedurally generated levels.

name: Inbound
summary: Inbound brings the missile defense arcade games of the 80's into the modern era!

name: Invest Simulator: Work Stage
summary: The investment simulator for employees. Players should accumulate funds through working, part-time, lottery, gambling and other ways to reach 1 million funds to start the company. You will become an investment expert.

name: Inzipid
summary: The one wakes up in a well with no idea where he is. Exploring the world he finds at least two hard conflicting parties. He knows for sure what's right and who's wrong. But only in the beginning.

name: Invisible Crush
summary: A hard core arcade casual game.

name: Infinity Mechs
summary:
Infinity Mechs is a super robot-featured idle game developed by SkullStar and licensed by Game Duchy. Here you’ll have access to a galaxy of mechs with a consternation of team building strategies!
Mecha army needs your leadership! Watch the live battlefield where particle effect will sweep your screen! Adventure, intense PvP, one-hand-hold operations...Mechs are a man’s romance! Now the mechaland ushers you in!

name: Infinity BattleSoul
summary: "Infinite BattleSoul" is a action Roguelite adventure game. Players can fight alone, form battle squads with friends, and use characters with different abilities to fight. Build the most suitable combination of ZhanHunQi to feel the most enjoyable combat experience brought.

name: Indie Stars Double-Pack!
summary: Two games from WayForward on one DVD-ROM.

name: Insects runner
summary: The house of the old gnome was attacked by a pack of strange beetles. To repulse an attack, the best wars were sent. You must control 3 cannons that will help you kill the bugs and go ahead. Show your skill and ability to shoot in the game!

name: Invasion From Space
summary: Simple remake of Space Invaders adding destructions and physics

name: In Passing
summary: A first-person 3D platforming experience through a broken mind turned against you.

name: InsanZ: Dr.Test
summary: Are you ready for Dr. Test´s place? Wander his laboratorys, explore his place and discover new enemys, crazy machines and new items. Experience survival-horror.

name: In the Backrooms
summary: "God save you if you hear something wandering around nearby, because it sure as hell has heard you.."

name: International Cricket 2010
summary: The 2010 cricket game from Codemasters, licensed by the ECB, Cricket Australia and the MCC; International Cricket 2010 is the second cricket game to be released by Codemasters for the Playstation 3 and Xbox 360, following Ashes Cricket 2009.

name: Inazuma Souls
summary: Inazuma Souls is a hackrom of Inazuma Eleven 1 focused on difficulty and being much more challenging than the base games. Besides, it is a hackrom with +1000 players that can be signed, including players from all the sagas and custom players. It also has a postgame with many secrets and a very high difficulty, a unique experience when playing Inazuma Eleven.

name: Infernal House
summary:
Far away, in the night, a house...
Within its walls is what may be the greatest discovery of the century. After investigating a kidnapping case, you find yourself thrown out of town, in this extraordinary home. Its structure shocks you... It seems to contain a great mystery, much more than a simple abduction...
It will take a lot of common sense and observation to find out what this hell house seems to be hiding!

name: Intelligence Trader
summary: Intelligence Trader gives you a chance to lead a secret spy agency. Plunge into the atmosphere of the Cold War era, witness the way of the famous confrontation, from the Berlin crisis to the Charter of Paris, and try to change the history!

name: Interstate 35
summary: A visual novel exploring a near-apocalyptic vision of North Texas, told through the poetic words of a young woman going home.

name: Inoue Mami: Kono Hoshi ni Tatta Hitori no Kimi
Infiltration: Alone in Combat
summary: A Third Person Shooter Game where you have to infiltrate the enemy lines and complete the mission.

name: Inhabitants of The Fir Forest
summary: Henry was alone (or not) in his home in the fir forest of horrors!

name: Inside
summary: Inside immerses you in a mysterious forest where shadows and whispers toy with your psyche. As you delve deeper, the line between reality and illusion blurs, with only a flashlight guiding your path in this psychological horror journey.

name: In the Cards
summary: a short game about a first date & a tarot reading

name: In Hindsight
summary: Will you survive the last days of Summer?

name: Inconsistencies
summary: When a young private investigator breaks into an old family home with her partner to solve a mysterious, inter generational double suicide, she sets off a chain of strange incidents.

name: In It Together
summary: In It Together is a retro inspired 2D puzzle platformer where you go into dangerous areas and solve problems to retrieve suitcases from the pesky Bandidos Gang. You have no attacks. What you find on the ground is what you need to use to take out the enemy.

name: Inmate: Survival
summary: INMATE: Survival is an open-world survival game, where you play the role of a prisoner sentenced to stay on a 4*4 km Island with many types of enemies both humans and animals.

name: Into the Abyss
summary: You are Sonja, a student of necromancy fighting to rid the world of a terrible illness that's taking the lives of all mankind. Fight alongside a zombie, a witch and even death in this exciting journey of persistence, friendship and determination!

name: Inuyasha: Secret of the Divine Jewel
summary: Inuyasha: Secret of the Divine Jewel is an epic role player game released for the Nintendo DS platform. Inspired from Rumiko Takahashi's popular animated TV and comic series, Inuyasha: Secret of the Divine Jewel takes you to a new level of gaming with intriguing game play and brilliant graphics. This epic role player game starts off with the detailed and engrossing stories of Inuyasha, Kagome, Miroku, Sango and Shippo. With features like intuitive command-based control scheme and the new Cover Fellow System (CFS), you will get Inuyasha and his friends to work together on the Nintendo DS in a in a battle to save the world from Sara, Lord Gorai and many more demons. Get yourself the Inuyasha: Secret of the Divine Jewel and conjure up some magic!

name: Into the Backrooms: Last Tape
summary: "Into the Backrooms: Last Tape" transports players into a dark and eerie world of the Backrooms. Immerse yourself in an atmospheric horror experience, explore procedurally generated labyrinths, and uncover the secrets lurking in the dark corners.

name: InGame.exe
summary: It's year 2079. One of the best policemans have been fired and a strange floppy disk falls into his hands. When he tried to run it on his PC, he found himself in the digital world. In this world exists a virus, that intends to destroy everything around. Only the protagonist can stop the virus and get back home.

name: Insider Tales: The Stolen Venus
summary: Help solve the biggest art robbery in decades and recover a stolen masterpiece in this mysterious Hidden Object game!

name: In Cell
summary: In Cell is a kinetic visual novel (linear, no choices) about the epidemic of sexless, nationless, and friendless men. Gender dynamics are currently not functional, sustainable, or beneficial to either men or women. In Cell is uncensored conversation between the sexes.

name: Inkslinger
summary: As an Inkslinger at Brassknee's renowned Wordshop, it's your job to write letters for the citizens of Isle Shammer. But through the veil of work lies forgotten trauma. A voice begins to speak to you in recurring daydreams, telling you about your tragic past in Nomania.

name: Inheritance: Ladeina's Path
summary: An adult action adventure with exploration and a rich story.

name: Infected Area
summary: Infected Area is a Doom II episode replacement mod of seven levels, created by Chuck Grant in 1996.

name: Intruder -Sakura Yashiki no Tansaku-
summary: Boy meets a girl and he falls in love with her. He loves her so much so he decided to get into her home... That's where real drama begins!

name: Inverse
summary: A minimalist puzzle game with some hard levels.

name: Interstate '76
summary: It's 1976 - a different '76. Stretched out before you are thousands of miles of desert - the American Southwest. The massive engine roars as you slam down the accelerator. It's time to get funked up. You are Groove Champion, auto-vigilante. Your agenda: Payback for your dead sister. Your weapon: A 425-horsepower '72 Picard Piranha with two 50-caliber M60 machine guns on top and a flame-thrower on the side. You're one mean dude in an even meaner ride. They've messed with the wrong Champion.

name: In the Morning Turns to Ash
summary: A narrative camping game about mourning a dead father.

name: Inari
summary: Descend from the heavens and slay the evil spirits plaguing Japan in INARI, a side-scrolling hack-and-slash inspired by Japanese folklore. Slice your way through wicked yokai as you run across rooftops, through crowded festival streets, and make your way to the leader of the demonic parade.

name: Infinity Loop
summary: Infinite Loop is a very simple, relaxing and never ending game for iPhone, iPad and Android. Your goal is to turn all forms on the grid so that there would be no open connections. Most levels are algorithmically generated and randomly colored, and after successfully completing each level you will be rewarded with a beautiful design of your own making.

name: Infineural
summary:
Infineural is a short horror game that doesn't rely on jumpscares or monsters to shock the player, but instead on the concept of time dilation. This game features multiple endings.

Remember: 1 minute on Earth is 10 years in the warp-drive, so make sure you drink that coffee. It makes you forget.

name: Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet
summary: Set thousands of years in the future, Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet puts players into the role of Jordan A. Mun, a dangerous bounty hunter who ends up stranded on Sempiria – a distant planet whose communication with the outside universe went dark hundreds of years ago. Jordan will have to use all her skills and wits if she hopes to be the first person in over 600 years to leave its orbit.

name: Invasion: Neo Earth
summary: Retro turn-based strategy in a sci-fi world of sinister alien invaders. Take command of troops, tanks and aircraft as you position your units for the perfect strike or unbreakable defense. Plot the course of humanity's war against the insidious Sectyd by choosing your own missions.

name: In the pines, in the pines, where the sun never shines
summary: A two-bit murder ballad.

name: In Tran Sit
summary: "An angst-ridden 22 year old rides the bus."

name: IncrediBubble
summary: In 2003, astragon Software GmbH publishes IncrediBubble on Windows. This puzzle game is now abandonware and is set in a real-time, tile matching puzzle and oceania themes

name: InfiniMath - Endless Math Puzzle
summary: InfiniMath - Endless Math Puzzle is complete puzzle game project that requires your math and logical thinking skills.

name: Infinilands
summary: Infinilands is a pixel art sandbox survival game that lets you explore and modify a procedurally generated world full of unique plants, creatures and ruins. You can build houses and fight monsters with your friends in online/split-screen co-op. This game also supports dedicated server.

name: Indiana Jones and Fountain of Youth
Internet City
summary: A Short Spin-off Game for the PlayDate

name: Input Out
summary: Input Out is a Puzzle game where the player commands a circle to the goal by Inputting movement commands. Navigate your way through 100 levels filled with different threats and interesting obstacles. Can you Input your way Out?

name: Inside Me
summary: "Inside Me" is a top-down shooter in which you play as one of nanorobots embedded in the human body to fight infection.

name: Infinity Blade Saga
summary: Powered by Epic’s Unreal Engine technology, the ground-breaking Infinity Blade games have brought Kinect gaming to new heights with gorgeous visuals, adrenaline-fueled sword fighting battles, and a thrilling story of love, betrayal, and redemption.

name: Indiepocalypse #8
summary: Issue #8 of a monthly indie game anthology collecting games from 10 developers.

name: Inops
summary: Explore the shadowy Mine, twisty Jungle and extra-terrestrial Elect-City but be careful of lurking dangers. Escape traps, solve puzzles and dodge enemies using the Inops ability to split into many little creatures or join into one big Inop whenever you wish. Use the environment to your advantage by using unique intractable components whilst guiding the Inops simultaneously. Get to the end of each level and save as many Inops as you can to avoid being lonesome.

name: In the Shadow of the Truth
International Cricket Captain
summary: International Cricket Captain, known as ICC for short, is a cricket management simulation game influenced by the popular Championship Management series' style stat based gameplay.

name: Instruction Chu
summary: Instruction Chu is a liver game. The liver needs to control a poor head and retrieve his body under the guidance of the audience.

name: Inﬁnite Borders
summary:
In the last years of the East Han period, when the flames of war are not ending in Coveting the World, the scoundrels from all over the world are scattered like stars in the central land, so only a true hero can rule in this three kingdom turmoil.
Here are the most realistic war scenes. Three hundred masters of the Three Kingdoms await your dispatch, and the combination of weapons and tactics has infinite possibilities. You can rule the territory with all your might to advance the construction of internal affairs, and you can use all your resources to colonize the territory.

name: Inhabit
summary: Make your way around your home and surrounding areas, practicing healthy habits and exploring the world in this open ended slice of life puzzle game.

name: Inverness Nights
summary: Visual novel about relationships.

name: Invictus: In the Shadow of Olympus
summary: Invictus: In the Shadow of Olympus is a real time battle strategy game with characters and themes drawn on Greek Mythology.

name: Interlopers
summary: Interlopers is a solo-developed FPS inspired by retro classics. Wield big guns, shoot hordes of enemy robots, and explore hand-crafted levels set on multiple alien worlds.

name: Insert Rich Family Name
summary: As one of the surviving members of a wealthy family, navigate a treacherous web of lies, deceit, and suspicion to identify the killer and claim your inheritance. But with a killer on the loose, you must be careful not to become the next victim.

name: Industrial Domination 1810
summary: A real-time simulation game made by SeaPandas Studios in which you create your own company during the Industrial Revolution.

name: International Superstar Soccer Advance
summary: International Superstar Soccer Advance is a Sports game, developed by Konami Computer Entertainment Osaka and published by Konami, which was released in Europe in 2003.

name: Insaniam
summary: Insaniam is a first-person investigative time-race horror game. You play as an investigative reporter sent to examine an abandoned pshyciatric hospital, but not all is as it seems. Do you have what it takes to face whats inside?

name: Infinity Ops
summary:
A multiplayer FPS in a sci-fi and CYBERPUNK setting!
The event of the game take place in the distant future, when humanity has surpassed the limits of technological development and the world has descended into the chaos of interplanetary warfare!
Player will face team PvP combat as classes like Recruit, Saboteur, Tank, and Assault! Each of the classes has its own features and abilities.

name: Interconnected Stories
summary: Decide the fate of our friendly characters through dozens of cards. It's up to you to make their dreams come true or provoke unpredictable stories!

name: Instant Sports Tennis
summary:
Instant Sports Tennis is an innovative and fun way to play tennis with your family and friends. Play with motion gaming and move your Joy-Cons just as a tennis racket! 
 
Challenge elements with storms on the field, smash walls in an Arkanoid-ish play style, master the gravity… and don’t forget to work your lesson with the Maths mini-game. 
 
Play with up to 4 players simultaneously, smashes, lobes, the field type is now having an impact on the gameplay, 10 challenging and entirely new mini-games. 
 
Instant Sports Tennis is the most complete casual and arcade game dedicated to tennis on Nintendo Switch.

name: InterSpace
summary: A portal-like puzzle game with stealth combat and unique missions for each level. It is the perfect combination of puzzle and FPS, with stunning graphic and great storyline to back it up.

name: Inside Path
summary: This is a simple game about elimination. Just click on the cubes of various colors to know how to play.

name: Intergalactic Genocide
summary: The zombie epidemic, which is the first stage of the 3 stage alien attack, has begun, the governments have banned news channels from reporting on it until they know more about the subject, but they were unable to control social media quickly. .

name: Influence, Inc.
summary: Manage a digital influence agency in this strategy-simulation game about modern-day propaganda and advertising. Manipulate social media and the mainstream news to promote celebrities, market products, and even sway elections. Research, share, leak, and target your way to influence.

name: Intergalactic Mystery
summary: Embark on an epic adventure with Duke and Floc, fighting in alien worlds, unraveling cosmic secrets, and challenging bosses in search of the celestial origins of an enigmatic Alien. RPG, adventure, shooting, and NPC interaction. Get ready for intense action!

name: In Between
summary: In Between is a first person story adventure game about a lonely man and his near death experience.

name: Infectis
summary: Hazy and disoriented, you awake in a prison cell with no memory of who you are or why you're here. Break free of your isolation and explore the abandoned hallways for a way out, guided by mysterious messages warning you to avoid the basement.

name: Into the Cave
summary: Let's explore that mystery cave!

name: Instant Indie Collection: Vol. 2
summary: Get Instant Indie Collection: Vol. 2, Arcade game for PS4 console from the official PlayStation website. Explore Instant Indie Collection: Vol. 2 game detail, demo, images, videos, reviews.

name: Infinite Adventure
summary:
The Abort/Retry/Fail team is proud to present the famously lost INFINITE ADVENTURE. This game is a visionary pioneer in procedural text generation, randomly generating rooms, maps, items, descriptions, and puzzles for a text adventure set in a Victorian mansion. INFINITE ADVENTURE was available for sale for only one month through a Spring 1987 shareware catalog published in Cleveland, Ohio.

An "interactive feelie" accompaniment to B.J. Best's game And Then You Come to a House Not Unlike the Previous One.

name: Inamina
summary:
Jacob Miller's life is a mess, with no future. Everything will change after receiving the invitation to participate in the last stage of a new food product.

During the ten days that the trial will last, the participants will undergo a strange program of physical and sensory stimulation based on a new way of understanding food production and human nutrition.
The trial will be carried out in full isolation at the Spira food and nutrition facility.
Be part of something that will change the future of humanity, be part of Spira.

name: Invasion Rush
summary: An apocalyptic disaster has left the door open for all kind of creatures to invade our home! Jump right into action in this hero-top down shooter-coop-roguelite experience, power up your survivors, defeat bosses and try to see how far you can get!

name: Invasion of the Zombie Monsters
summary: Invasion of the Zombie Monsters is an arcade-platformer in wich you take control of Ned, who must try to save the world from the zombie hordes and take back his girlfriend!

name: International Superstar Soccer 2000
summary: Game Boy Color port of International Superstar Soccer 2000.

name: Inflatables
summary: Time to bounce!

name: International Rally Championship
summary: International Rally Championship is a rally computer game which is part of the Rally Championship series. The game was released for Windows in 30 June 1997. It is developed by Magnetic Fields and published by Europress. Several different front covers were released for the game. The game is a sequel to the 1996 version of Network Q RAC Rally Championship. It would in turn be succeeded in 1999 by Mobil 1 Rally Championship.

name: in my Dream
summary: As a content of the game there is no clear purpose, just walk.

name: Intergalactic Fishing
summary: Intergalactic Fishing is a fishing RPG that makes use of procedurally generated content and graphics. Travel to lakes all over the universe and catch unique fish, explore uncharted lakes and sell data, complete quests, upgrade your gear, compete in fishing tournaments, design your own lures, and more!

name: Initiation
summary:
Lost for far too long, he’s drowning in his loneliness looking for a lean comfort by remaining close to the same rock.
His feelings elude leaving him in oppressive despair. How to find the spark to lit the darkness? In which form will it come to you?

name: Into the V.O.I.D.
summary: Board your spaceship and delve Into the VOID, facing waves of relentless enemies. Grow stronger with each battle to overcome Zentharian commanders and their “Bullet-Hell” attack patterns. This top-down roguelike shooter promises short but intense runs where your wits and reflexes will be tested.

name: In Exilium
summary: In Exilium is a minimal hack and slash RPG focused on player discovery. You play as a once mighty king who has been exiled to a strange, hostile world. Only through exploration can you learn of why you were exiled… and how to return.

name: Inari's Tale
summary: A 2D action-puzzle-platformer mixing traditional animation, strong story-telling, and evolutive gameplay.

name: In the Chips
summary: You are in control of a Silicon Valley software firm and try to multiply your $100,000 investment.

name: Inside Explorer
summary: This is Inside Explorer where you can digitally explore the inside of things. It is loaded with real-time rendered 3D visualizations based on unique scientific data.

name: Intexistentance
summary: Working a perfectly normal shift in a world under reconstruction

name: Insane
summary: Insane (stylized as inSANE) was a survival horror video game, formerly in development by Volition to be published by THQ, in collaboration with film director Guillermo del Toro. It was being developed for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360, and was to be released in 2013. It was intended as the first installment of a planned trilogy of Insane video games.

name: Interplanet Ex
summary: A lonely space trucker journey... With pirates.

name: In the beginning
summary: Do you want to become a God? Welcome to the coolest social simulator in the world! Here you can create your very own people and uplift them form humble cavemen to an adnvanced civilization!

name: Inverse Evolver
summary: Inverse Evolver is a side-scrolling action that combines roguelike mechanics. Explore different dungeons; use diverse items to form powerful combos, and beat ferocious beasts and bosses.

name: IndyCar Series 2005
summary: IndyCar Series 2005 is a racing simulator developed by Codemasters. It is the sixteenth game of the Official IndyCar Series games series. The game was released on June 24, 2004 for PlayStation 2 and Xbox, and is based on the 2003 IndyCar Series season.

name: Infinite World
summary:
A PM was involved in a bug 
and putted into an infinite procedural world

name: I need to pee
summary: A short horror game made in 24 hours for Halloween 2021.

name: Intruders: Robot Defense
summary: Must Play Games, brings you an action packed 3D mobile game that requires the best of game plan. Race against time to protect your base and keep enemies at bay. Rogue forces are on the offensive, quick thinking and strategic planning can save the day!

name: Intransigent
summary: This game welcomes every brave warrior to a deserted pirate island overrun by monsters.

name: Insect Planet TD
summary: The distant space expedition to the Earth-like planet, finally ended. We came here for the purpose of colonization, but we are faced with alien creatures. We have no choice we must conquer this planet.

name: Insider Trading
summary: Insider Trading is a roguelike deckbuilder where you bend the market to your will. Synergize perks, manipulate stock prices, and trade wisely or risk pricing yourself out.

name: Intrigue At Oakhaven Plantation
summary: A point and click adventure game that takes place at Oakhaven, a 19th century plantation in Louisiana.

name: Inheritors of the Oubliette
summary: Regain a lost legacy in this first-person dungeon crawl RPG.

name: IndieAdventure
summary: little adventure of a little adventurer

name: Incredible Machine Mega Pack
summary:
Do you remember watching with amazement when those cartoon heroes constructed machines to catch someone or start something? Those very complicated Rube Goldberg-like ones with knives, toasters, anvils etc? Or did you ever wonder how it would feel to construct a mouse-powered device to cook some eggs and launch a rocket? 
 
Well, the answer is here! Build monkey or mouse-powered machines, use lasers and fire fireworks, start fires using a bowling ball and flint, throw things with anti gravity platforms or a jack-in-the-box or crack open an aquarium with a cat, mouse, alligator, cannon, cheese and more!

name: Into Blue Valley
summary: Into Blue Valley is a first-person exploration game drawing upon themes of mystery and curiosity. It is presented as a 'found footage' game with the player's view resembling a camcorder recording showing a glipmse into the subdued environment that is being explored.

name: IndustrySim Virtual Platform
summary: IndustrySim Virtual Platform is an award-winning, industry-themed serious game about constructing, operating and managing an industrial environment. The professional-level simulation engine, along with real-life events and gamification, enables you to learn and experiment while having a lot of gameplay fun.

name: Inside Light
summary: The city of police and bandits playing hide and seek, ghost's adventure, ghost's challenge, ghost's cooperation, and ghost's competition.

name: In Search of Paradise
summary: The open-world driving adventure returns, with VR support!

name: Infinity Treasures
summary: Labirinth of Infinity Treasures is a game that can be challenging and funny with each level. Brave forests, swamps, and venture to the depths of the planet to discover forgotten treasures.

name: Infiltrate & Extract
summary: A top-down 3D stealth game where remaining undetected is of utmost priority. Take down security guards and stay in the shadows to reach the vault and extract a highly valuable relic.

name: In the Mountains
summary: A journey into an abandoned facility nestled deep within a mountain.

name: Into the Core
summary: A gravity-based puzzle game that will push your mind to always think and evolve. Hard but fair, constantly introduces new concepts for the player to overcome. For those who want to challenge themselves, and love to think.

name: Interrogation: Deceived
summary: As a police detective tasked with bringing down a dangerous terrorist group, you fight on two fronts: interrogating suspects & managing your team and its reputation. With time running out, how far will you go to stop these criminals? Manipulation, threats or even torture? Does the end justify the means?

name: Into the Depths of Despair
summary: Into the Depths of Despair is a first-person psychological horror game. You navigate through endless mine shafts, searching for a way out while trying to stay alive. You are not alone!

name: In the Raven Shadow – Ve stínu havrana
summary: In the Raven Shadow is in the best sense an old-fashioned adventure game for all sense-seeking people.

name: Injustice 2: Predator
summary: New playable character. Play as Predator, the ultimate hunter. Kombat Pack owners get early access.

name: Intersolar Overdrive
summary: Intersolar Overdrive was built on a gravity algorithm that lets you experience relative travel in deep space. Follow the story line or play in arcade mode for good old fashioned points.

name: Interwoven
summary: Welcome to Interwoven - a compact, but dynamic adventure inspired by traditional turn-based JRPGs! Follow an unlikely trio on their journey up to defeat the Obsidian Drake atop Anvite Mountain. Use the unique Augment Battle System to create all sorts of interesting strategies.

name: Indoor Rock Climbing VR
summary: Fun and simple indoor Virtual Reality rock climbing center for both casual and avid gamers. Precise hands-on movement. Music included.

name: Initial D Arcade Stage 7 AAX
summary:
7th iteration of the Initial D arcade racing game

Initial D Arcade Stage 7 AAX (also titled Initial D Arcade Stage 7 Double A's Cross) is a street racing game developed and released by Sega for arcades (using their PC-based RingEdge hardware) in Japan on November 28, 2012.

name: InfiniPicross 2.0: 100 Medium Puzzles
summary: An extra 100 medium picross puzzles for the Infinipicross 2.0 game.

name: Into the Sinkhole
summary: “Into the Sinkhole” is a descending 3D platformer. With the help of explore-bot ‘Laika’, you will uncover hidden secrets that lie deep within the Sinkhole. As you traverse deeper into the Sinkhole, you will face springboard platforms that will try to push you back up.

name: Inversion
summary: Control the main character and test your skills!

name: Infinity Toss
summary:
"Infinity Toss" is a game you can enjoy using only one finger.
It's easy and fun. It's never difficult to play.
Just shoot the ball at the basket.
Check the wind direction before the shooting.
Get more coins to purchase new balls.

name: Infiniball
summary: Infiniball is a simple yet addictive marble based game.

name: Infiniwar
summary: Infiniwar is a stylized modern military real-time tactics game inspired by classics in the genre. Command your units in epic battles, call in artillery and air strikes. Upgrade your forces with ARPG-inspired progression systems. Conquer a roguelike campaign that is unique on each playthrough.

name: Initial D: The Arcade
summary: Initial D The Arcade is the latest title in the Initial D arcade game series, which has been running in arcades across Japan since 2002. In this title, not only have the graphics and operability evolved, but for the first time in the series, "In-store 4-unit battles" have been introduced, allowing players to enjoy a variety of battles, from 1 vs 1 to 1 vs 3 multiplayer battles. Furthermore, in the Story Mode, which was created using the original manga as its motif, a unique visual expression called 'manga shader' allows players to enjoy heated battles with the original characters as if they were playing in the world of the manga.

name: InfiniPicross 2.0: Halloween
summary: More than a hundred Medium and Large Halloween picross puzzles for the Infinipicross 2.0 game! (Like, 102!)

name: Instant Indie Collection: Vol. 4
summary:
Curve Digital is proud to present the Instant Indie Collection Vol. 4 - A collection of Curve's latest and greatest indie hits: Dear Esther: Landmark Edition, Hue and The Flame in the Flood.

Our Instant Indie Collections bring you three indie hits in one neat little package.

Dear Esther - Explore a remote and desolate island and uncover its secrets in this powerful story of love, loss, guilt and redemption.

Hue - An award-winning puzzle-platformer where you shift the hue of the world, creating rifts when colours collide.

The Flame in the Flood - A brutal journey through the backwaters of a forgotten post-societal America. Forage, craft, and evade predators.

This pack includes:

Dear Esther: Landmark Edition
Hue
The Flame in the Flood

name: Indiemon VS Zombies
summary: Indiemon battle the undead.

name: Into Oblivion
summary: Into Oblivion is an immerse interactive novel where your choices shape the story. Set in the far-future, explore a galaxy on the brink of crisis with dynamic companions. So, settle your mind and pray you have what it takes to fly Into Oblivion.

name: Infected Friend
summary: Infected Friend is a 3rd person online pvp shooter. One of the players becomes infected at the beginning of the round. His goal is to infect all other players. Other players will have to hold out for 60 seconds to win the round.

name: Inferna
summary: Stay toasty.

name: Interstate Drifter 1999
summary: Drift between the states, collect bits, beat rivals and get a high score

name: Inochi Project
summary:
COMING SOON. 
 
Project Inochi is more than life. The exciting new MMO currently in development from the creative capital of the world, the West Midlands. It's time to step in to the 3rd dimension. 
 
 
Follow us on Twitter, Facebook, YouTube and Google+ for updates and your chance to be involved.

name: Insectarium Alternative March
summary: You're here to investigate the unidentified objects known as "urbanites."

name: Inkbound: Supporter Pack - The Story Begins
summary: The Story Begins Supporter Pack rewards your support with a wide variety of exclusive cosmetic items to customize your look. It includes armor sets, weapons, helmets, and plenty of fancy visual effects to spice up your dives through the books of the Inkbound world.

name: Infinite Mirror
summary: Carmen must search the Temple of the Infinite Mirror to find the solution to what ails her...

name: Initial D: Koudou Saisoku Densetsu
summary: The first racing game based on anime series Initial D to be released on a home console.

name: Intruder Alert: Ixian Operations
summary:
Intruder Alert is an science-fiction RTS having 6 totally different factions.
It contains a single-player campaign, local LAN multiplayer, simple single player games
and special challenges like Tower Defense.

name: Into the Soup
summary: A portal to another dimension. A world abandoned.Journey into the Soup and uncover the mysteries of a strange new reality in this atmospheric first-person puzzle adventure game.

name: Infinite Pinball
summary:
An addictive pinball game that could make you play forever.

Tap to hit the ball and shoot it up. The farther your ball goes, the more bonus scores you get. Be careful with the breakable glass flipper and try not to be bounced down.

name: Intelligence: Cats
summary: A puzzle game in which you want to build an image (with cats) so that the picture was like the original image. Move the tiles of the puzzle wisely to collect the correct order of the pieces of images.

name: Interlude
summary: A NEC Interchannel published visual novel released first on the Dreamcast and then later on the PlayStation 2 in Japan.

name: Into The Noid
summary: An atmospheric and enjoyable Noid-like VR brick breaker. With simple, fun mechanics it's ready to deliver both the casual and skill-based experience in addictive bites.

name: Infected: Outpost
summary: Gather resources, refuel the generator, and escape the facility before time runs out! But beware, the infected can steal the skins of their victims. Face your friends in a social deduction horror game like no other!

name: Insects in Space
summary: A side scrolling shooter.

name: Investigator and the Case of the Red Herring
summary: Investigator is a point and click whodunnit about an alligator who investigates cases.

name: Insanity VR: Last Score
summary: Insanity VR combines an immersive and intuitive locomotion system in VR, a compelling horror story and escape the room like puzzles with stealth mechanics. As the new intern at a futuristic institute for mental illnesses you get transported into the mind of a patient to reconstruct his memories.

name: Injustice 2: Hellboy
summary: As a member of the Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense, Hellboy has defended the world from fiends, witches, demons, and more than a few Lovecraftian Gods. With his trusty revolver and his “Right Hand of Doom,” Hellboy has made monster disposal his specialty.

name: Inukari: Chase of Deception - Deluxe Edition
In the Building: Cats 3
summary: is a game in which you have to find all the cute cats. Cats will hide in all houses. Search every corner of the room, move the pillows, open the nightstands, check the toilet... Cats can hide in the most unpredictable places.

name: Infernal Elements
summary: A literal bullet hell, boss rush game, where you control Luci on his journey fighting against elemental demons.

name: IndependAnt
summary: Explore the vast Living Room to find food for your struggling ant colony in this cute and casual collectathon!

name: Indiana Boy Steam Edition
summary: Immerse yourself in a fantastic adventure with Indiana Boy. Help Indiana recover all the treasures and keys, but watch out for every move you make.

name: Inheritance
summary: Short spooky escape room

name: Internet Tycoon
summary: At the dawn of the Internet Age, could the player take up the role of a dauntless entrepreneur and establish the most successful internet company? When the player becomes CEO, will they still treat their employees well or have a change of heart?

name: Injustice 2: Raiden
summary: Download and play as Raiden - The elder God of Thunder has sworn to defend the Earthrealm from any and all threats. Raiden knows that if this universe falls, his own universe will become Brainiac's next target.

name: Infinity Tank Battle
