summary: Infinity Tank Battle is a brand new tank battle game. It is following various classic essential features, and add some new interesting elements.

name: International Basketball
summary: Show you skills, moves and fakes in this fast-paced authentic Basketball game. On defence, steal ball from your opponents and on attack, score 2 or 3 points shoots or dunk.

name: Inward
summary: Discover, grow and name your own species of trees. Watch as the seed transforms from a sapling to a majestic tree. Water the tree with your mindfulness, habits and insights. Grow and discover yourself with the help of a stray dog called Samsara.

name: Interstellar Flames 2
summary: Interstellar Flames 2 is a game for the Gizmondo.

name: Intense Love Shot
summary: In a world invaded by succubus, only you can save everyone by using your unique power to make all of her nightmares (or dreams) come true!

name: Indiepocalypse #3
summary: Issue #3 of a monthly indie game anthology collecting games from 10 developers.

name: Ina Koi! Oinari-sama to Motemote no Tatari
summary: An adult visual novel.

name: Interstellar Conquest
summary: Take planets and assemble your fleet. The conquest of space is now, navigate through asteroid fields and hide in nebulas to outsmart your opponents. Experience the challenge of ion storms disrupting your ship's sensors and become the ultimate space fleet commander.

name: Internull
summary: After waking up in the facilities of a once-successful tech company, you must find your way out and uncover the mysteries of Internull with your only tool being a Virtual Reality Headset.

name: Invaders
summary: This game is a 3d Tower Defense created by a highschooler. It was developed by Unity and was accompanied by a lot of youtube tutorials.

name: Into the Spiritwell
summary: Go forth little forest spirit and make your way through River of Life. Forge a path through thick forests, dark caves, and vast seas. Fight bosses and master elemental alchemy with your friends in a beautiful Ghibli inspired scenery.

name: InkBall
summary: InkBall is a game that comes with Windows Vista and Windows XP Tablet Edition 2005.

name: Inflatality
summary: The definitive derpy physics based fighter featuring adorable inflatable wavers beating the crap out of each other!

name: Indie Gems Bundle: JRPG Edition
summary:
Get these two JRPG games in this fantastic indie bundle, at a discounted price! 
This bundle includes Dungeon Rushers and Robothorium.

name: Into the Dangerous World I Leapt
summary: Follow Idony on a journey to find her brother Edus in a strange factory where the walls between dimensions are thin.

name: Invisible Beasts
summary: Visual novel based on a legend from Venice - EN and IT

name: Insurgence: Second Assault
summary: Insurgence - Second Assault is a follow-up sequel to Insurgence - Chains of Renegade. Features new characters and stories from two different points of view.

name: Inglorious
summary:
Nihil is in danger. Only the champions of the Gods can save the realm of the dead. However, no one said they have to work together to achieve it.

Compete with your friends to see who is better at eliminating waves of enemies in Multiplayer mode! Control the champion you like most and be the first to defeat the final Boss to win!

Use your enemies' souls to improve your champion or to obstruct your opponent without having to use your weapons!

In Single Player mode, battle to conquer and defend the territories of Nihil from the terrible enemy army!

Glory is for the living and you are no longer one of them.

name: Inspektor Zebok: Das Erbe
summary:
You are playing as Inspector Zebok who has a new case to solve: the death of a notary - natural death or murder?. 
 
The gameplay consists basically of three actions: going to certain destinations and search them, questioning witnesses and giving orders to your staff. When searching a place you have to click on interesting items in the video window and watch a video of Zebok's actions. It is possible to miss clues and make the game impossible to beat.

name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of the Spheres
Insurgence: Chains of Renegade - Remastered
summary: Insurgence is a 2D Role Playing Game with Visual Novel elements, Enjoy the classic RPG experience and discover the meaning of redemption and friendship within the Insurgence movement.

name: Inkubus Sukkubus: She of a Thousand Names
summary: Play as a medieval witch collecting hidden items (CD albums) in a variety of environments. 16 of the albums to be collected are then added to your jukebox, which can then be played whilst you explore further.

name: Infinite Monkeys
summary:
This game was made for the fifth anniversary of the monthly game design contest of AGS (Adventure Game Studio). As such, the game contains elements from every earlier contest over those five years.

The title is based on the saying that if you take an infinite amount of monkeys and have them work on an infinite amount of typewriters, you'll end up with every story ever known to man. The result is an experimental adventure game containing zombies, angels, a chessboard, a moonbase, time travel and more.

name: Infinity War Land
summary: "Infinity War Land" is a roguelite dungeon shooter.

name: Insane Decay of Mind
summary: Insane Decay of Mind is a first person horror game. You play the role of Katherine, a young girl lost in the eerie hallways of a building she believes to be her school.

name: Into the Dead 2: Ghostbusters
summary:
Join the Ghostbusters in an all new action adventure battling specters, spooks, and demons to save the city!

Strap on your Proton Pack and join Egon, Winston, Peter, and Ray as a new rookie Ghostbuster recruited to investigate a paranormal disturbance. Bring Slimer along to add an extra otherworldly boost!

name: Intrana
summary: Intrana, is an action-adventure FPS game, where the player is tasked with going inside a sick man's body to save him from an alien disease. Explore vibrant environments with fascinating procedurally animated creatures, on your journey to stop this celestial virus!

name: Inexplicable Geeks: Dawn of Just Us
summary: Enter a world of ridiculously underpowered superheroes as you navigate a comic and pop culture convention celebrating their history. Gather stories, piece together history, and interact with the denizens of the super and the geek.

name: Insect Planet TD
summary: The distant space expedition to the Earth-like planet, finally ended. We came here for the purpose of colonization, but we are faced with alien creatures. We have no choice we must conquer this planet.

name: Infinite Golf
summary: An infinite Golf course! Shoot the golf ball into the hole! How far can you go?

name: Injured by space
summary:
Feel yourself a space ace. In this game you have to shoot down enemies in an endless space, asteroids, enemy ships and much more! 
Then the game becomes more difficult. You will not have time to relax!

name: Intelligent Strategy Games 10
summary: The Amiga port has the same games but with re-done graphics

name: Infinite Game Works Episode 1
summary: The second game about making games! Care for and build relationships with your teammates! Now with an in-depth game development system, more story (just like you asked for), and more...

name: Influxis
summary: A sci-fi underwater survival and exploration game

name: Infinite Pool
summary: Take your pool skill on an adventure! Aim, shoot, and sink balls before you run out of shots. Help Cupi find and sell hats, and upgrade the shop to its fullest potential.

name: Ingress
summary:
Ingress is an augmented reality massively multiplayer online role playing GPS-dependent game created by Niantic Labs, a startup within Google, originally for Android devices, and since July 14, 2014 for Apple's iOS. The game has a complex science fiction back story with a continuous open narrative.
The gameplay consists of establishing "portals" at places of public art, landmarks, monuments, etc., and linking them to create virtual triangular fields over geographic areas. Progress in the game is measured by the number of "mind units" (MUs), i.e. people nominally controlled by each faction (as illustrated on the Intel Map). The necessary links between portals may range from feet/meters to miles/kilometers or hundreds of miles/kilometers in operations of considerable logistical complexity. International links and fields are not uncommon, as Ingress has attracted an enthusiastic following in cities worldwide amongst both young and old, to the extent that the gameplay is itself a lifestyle for some, including tattoos.

name: Indiana Jones and the Crown of Solomon
Inside the Park Baseball
summary: A baseball management sim for the PC

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Year 1+2+3 Bundle
summary: The Year 1+2+3 Bundle gives you instant access to 32 cosmetic sets from the Year 1 and Year 2 Passes, and 4 additional reward items from the Year 2 Pass. Also includes the 16 already released or upcoming cosmetic sets from the Year 3 Pass. Customize your Security and Insurgent soldiers from head to toe with brand new gear and weapon skins.

name: Infinite Warrior
summary:
In the fantasy world of Infinite Warrior you fight an epic battle against an endless onslaught of bloodthirsty enemies.
Unleash Hell by performing swift, well-timed finger swipes at opponents and be rewarded with gold, loot and gritty over-the-top 3D animations recorded by Hollywood fight coordinators.
Wage War on 9 unique and visually breathtaking battlefields, in full 3d with Retina graphics.
Use collected cash to purchase fantastic new weapons and hardy armor to both customize and improve your hero.
Call in fearsome dragons to trigger "Head-Start" power-up and find ways to boost your score and best your friends on four different leaderboards while striving to become the ultimate Infinite Warrior!

name: Inanis
summary: Take a pilgrimage to slay the King and repeal the poison over the kingdom. Create a custom deck with over 100 cards and engage in grid based tactics gameplay to defeat a slew of diverse bosses. Master your deck, uncover the darkness, kill the King.

name: Into Outer Bass
summary: A rhythm-based, space-arcade

name: Infinite Crisis
summary: Infinite Crisis blends RPG and Strategy to create a competitive online game set in the multiverse of DC Comics. Two squads of DC heroes and villains compete in combative trials across multiple destructive battlefields featuring game-changing Catastrophic Events.

name: Inevitable Path
summary: Inevitable Path is a puzzle-adventure platformer game. Collect the parts of the spaceship, keep an eye on vital parameters and try to survive on a dying planet, which was once your home.

name: Intergalactic Panic!!
summary: Jump and shoot your way through forgotten oceans and into fortresses filled with powerful enemies. Decide the best order to complete the challenges and each stage will give you an amazing new power to help you on your next journey and perhaps end the tyranny of the evil Intergalactic Empire.

name: Instinct
summary:
It’s so nice to live with the person you like, to have everything necessary for a good life, to depend on yourself and have a good time.

Up till recently my wonderful life of leisure in the pet store ran its natural course, when suddenly a weird bozo appeared in the house. Why did Mistress hire him?

name: Internal Invasion
summary: Can you stop the invasion?

name: Infantry Attack: Drone Squad
summary: Equip yourself with new drones and show your opponents who's the real boss!

name: Indie Jane and the Snake Tower
summary: Explore the forgotten Snake Tower as Indie Jane, treasure raider extraordinaire! Fast-paced, snake-jumping action! Jump to reach out and collect rubies as you climb up the perilous Snake Tower, guarded by tons and tons of snakes!! Unlock magical relics with spectacular powers that lets you glide mid air and can even save your life!

name: Inziva
summary: A visual novel about you. Yes, you. "inziva" examines talking with your alter egos about your depression and traumas.

name: In the Search For: Revenge
summary: In The Search For: Revenge is a very short, intentionally unpolished, abstract and odd game with no dialogue and little to no music.

name: InstaCondo Limited
summary: Drop condo blocks to help your parkour actor get through the rooftops of the city & film InstaCondo Limited's ambitious TV ad.

name: Interitus
summary: Embark on a dangerous journey to a monastery where only death and decay remain. Explore the cursed hellscape and fight against challenging monsters in a realistic 3D-environment. Each play-session is unique from the previous one thanks to a randomized dungeon, with handcrafted rooms.

name: Into Abby's Head
summary: Immerse yourself in the traumatic atmosphere of Into Abby's Head and face the loneliness of being in an orphanage.

name: Industry Empire
summary:
Have you always dreamed of swimming in money? In “Industry Empire” you are the boss of all bosses. Carry out research, extract raw materials, process them in your factories and distribute your products! Send off trucks packed with your goods to far off cities and watch how booming trade lets your locations and the region grow and fills your coffers!
Grow your business, get rich and enjoy the fruits of your labor!

name: Incoming
summary: Incoming! Incoming! Prepare the battle stations! Defend your population against waves of ICBMs raining from the sky, Bombers, Zeppelins, and mighty bosses in this frantic VR arcade game. Between waves, customize defenses, rebuild, and research better weapons to thwart the next wave!

name: Insectoid Descent
summary: Shoot, slice and blow your way through the relentless swarm in a top-down pixel art world. At your service is a combat drone, reclaim scrap and use refinery for health & resupply. Explore and find upgrades, defeat the hive mind.

name: Infinikin
summary: Your attacks permanently run out in this monster battling randomizer! Find your favorites from a new pool of monsters for every playthrough. Battle efficiently to outpace your losses and unlock upgrades. Cultivate a team across multiple runs, and defeat corrupted Infinikin bosses.

name: Infernal Racket
summary: Smash, shatter, and destroy EVERYTHING in this addicting and frenetic platfomer! Cover the screen in satisfying shrapnel explosions made of fine china, glassware and vases, sculptures, paintings, and more!

name: Injustice: Gods Among Us Bad Girls Skins
summary: Download the Bad Girls Skin Pack featuring Wonder Woman, Catwoman, and Harley Quinn for your Injustice: Gods Among Us DLC collection.

name: Inspector
summary: Inspector is a hot-blooded cross-border game. Officer Li Xiaoxiong received a secret mission from his superior, Director Lewis, and sent him to destroy the strongholds of gangster drug lords. Along the way, there are secret bases, bushes, valleys and even rooms for human experiments.

name: In the Nick of Tie-m
summary: Join Nick in his getaway chase and escape the scene of the crime by stealthily making your way through the city back to his hideout. Traverse rooftops, sneak past searchlights, hurtle through windows into apartments, and climb up fire escapes in order to escape. Avoid making too much noise or standing in the light for too long because the police will detect you!

name: Infiltria
summary: Infiltria is rogue-lite rpg survival shooter, with procedurally generated levels and character persistent progression. Including talents, power-up, traits and unique character abilities brings you highly re-playable content.

name: Invasion of The Halloween Fiends
summary: Invasion of The Halloween Fiends is a First-Person Retro horror game that takes place on Halloween Night. Strangers keep visiting you looking for candy. Some of them may not be so friendly. Will you be able to survive Halloween Night?

name: Into the Wild
summary: Into the Wild is a tense yet tranquil survival game where nature holds nothing back. Inspired by the Norwegian hinterlands, the haunting valley of Jegersdal offers a faithful survival experience. Witness the magnificent aurora and search for answers amid the ruins of yesterday.

name: In - Sight
summary: This work combines various new ways of making art, including panoramic painting.

name: Intrusion Protocol
summary: Intrusion Protocol is a classic challenging retro 2-D platformer. Play as a computer virus tasked with infiltrating an enemy network to retrieve mission-critical data. As you find the data you will uncover a story that reveals the secrets of your mysterious purpose. Your only health bar is the clock, and the enemy defenses will quickly drain your precious time. Will you be able to overcome the defenses and access the data? Or will you find yourself out of time? Be quick. Be careful.

name: Indoor Gardening Create Your Own Home Garden
summary: Dive into a creative guide to indoor gardening and transform your space into a lush sanctuary - learn unique experiences and design your green paradise!

name: Insomnia
summary: A 3D "Survive the night" Horror Game played through the perspective of a father who wants to free his daughter from a powerful demon.

name: In the Weeds
summary: Play as a walking flower and restore life to the forest! Navigate obstacles, fend off pests, and overcome environmental hazards to create a thriving ecosystem. Join us in the weeds and help bring the beauty of nature back to life!

name: Innocent Passage
summary: Use real-world shipping data to visualise a future maritime conflict.

name: Incessant
summary: Incessant is a first-person survival horror game created to bring you hell on earth. As Dan Wallace, Explore, Run, Hide and try to survive the butcher... If you can.

name: InseAquarium: Crazy Aqurium
summary:
InseAquarium offers you all this:
- Colorful aquarium setting with fantastic fish and sea creatures.
- 4 ways to play: Adventure, Timed, Challenge and Virtual Tank.
- Enhanced sound effects and original score.
- Ruthless new extraterrestrial boss beasts!

Base Play Rules:
  Feed fishes, unlock pets, update weapons, fight aliens!

name: Incarnata: Dormant Stories
summary: Incredible depth, within an infinite world. Dive into this adventure simulation and become everything you decide to be. The game adapts and builds challenges, creates unique characters, places, and goals for you to weave your own story.

name: I Need a Name
summary: I Need a Name is a homage to classic RPG Maker horror games where your name will make an impact on the events you encounter as you travel through the abstract environment you have escaped to.

name: Infamous 2: Special Edition
summary:
Infamous 2 opens in Empire City as a massive explosion rips through the town signaling the birth of a new evil. Nearly escaping death by the dark entity known as The Beast, Cole flees the city. Upon leaving, Cole discovers that The Beast has destroyed Empire City and is heading down the coast annihilating everything in its path.

In an effort to stop The Beast from destroying mankind, Cole heads to New Marais in search of a scientist who is believed to hold the key to defeating this dark entity. As the mystery of The Beast unfolds, Cole must learn to harness his powers for the sake of mankind.

The Special Edition of Infamous 2 includes:
- A copy of the game
- Exclusive PSN Voucher for "Electrocution Grenade"
- Classic "inFAMOUS 1" Jacket skin
- In-game golden version of "Amp" Melee weapon

name: Investi-Gator: The Case of the Big Crime
summary: A short comedy adventure. Investi-Gator is here to solve the crimes! He's not really clear on what the crime is, but he'll do his best. And as long as his brother Insti-Gator is around, he'll ALWAYS have someone to trust!

name: Interstice Academy: Love is Blind
summary:
Sitting at the point between worlds, time and space lies a school for beings of all kinds. Welcome to Interstice Academy!

Team Milk Chocolate's entry for Project Blind Date, a one month production jam hosted by the Newgrounds Festivals Server.

name: Indian Rummy
summary:
Welcome to the world’s most popular Free 13 Card Indian Rummy Game.
Easy to Play Rummy online game with Indian Rummy

name: Instant Death
summary: Super hardcore first-person game.

name: Insanity Ice
summary: You are an ordinary employee of a research laboratory. One of your workdays becomes a horror. Suddenly a nightmare happens and now you have to survive and figure out what's going on here...

name: In Dreams of Addict 2
summary: "In Dreams of Addict 2" is the sequel to the re-release of the original game. Now his girlfriend Lisa will fight for Jora, who out of despair has decided to experiment in order to get into jora's mind. Help the girl to cope with hostile subconscious creatures, find jora and leave his world.

name: Invincible Little Warrior
summary: A Super Qix clone. The background artwork for level 1 is taken from One Piece, while level 2 uses Doraemon.

name: Instant Summer
summary: If you ever play with weather, please be careful!!!

name: Inexperienced Driver
summary: "Inexperienced Driver" is a top-down arcade driving game. The player has to drive from point A to point B and, if possible, collect all the banknotes on the road while avoiding obstacles.

name: Intelligence: 314th Clash
summary: Intelligence is a role-playing game with a colorful exterior to hide a more disturbing core. It's had previous installments over the past five years, this is supposedly it's finished release.

name: Indiepocalypse #2
summary: Issue #2 of a monthly indie game anthology collecting games from 10 developers.

name: Intervilles, le jeu officiel
summary: Intervilles, le jeu officiel provides the atmosphere of Intervilles in your living room. But beware, Rosa the cow is not far and her favorite pastime is to drop the candidates! Live the show as if you were there! In competition with a friend, take on the 25 challenges of your favorite show with public acclaim. Action, falls and laughs in perspective!

name: Infinity Sky
summary: In "Infinity Sky," navigate a thrilling aerial journey, dodging skyscrapers and collecting rings of fire. Conquer endless challenges, compete globally, and experience immersive gaming with Perspectacles. Are you ready for high-flying excitement?

name: Inspector Gadget: Operation Madkactus
summary: The evil Dr. Claw is about to unleash the deadly MadKactus virus on the world, and it's up to Inspector Gadget to stop him. Since Gadget always needs a little help, his niece Penny and their dog Brain are at the ready to make their contribution. You, as the enigmatic Inspector, will have to work your way through 20 levels that span five different worlds. Luckily, many of your famous devices are available to help out including the helicopter, spring arms, rocket-powered roller skates, and hammer hat. If there is something that you can't do as Gadget, you can switch characters and use Penny or Brain to get past an obstacle or solve a puzzle. Gather up your go-go gadgets and get ready to save the world from Dr. Claw in INSPECTOR GADGET.

name: Intercontinental
summary: Typing game where you type out messages sent from people who are aware of their imminent apocalypse by nuclear strike.

name: Insanis: The 2D Cube Puzzle
summary:
Insanis is a 2D cube puzzle for those who truly like a challenge! To solve the puzzle, one must be able to look at the 6 cube panels and convert them into a 3D cube in their mind.
Game is free with NO ads. A online playable version is available at gx.games

name: Infinite Flight - Flight Simulator
summary: The Ultimate Mobile Flight Simulation Experience

name: Inspector Gadget: Gadget's Crazy Maze
summary:
Inspector Gadget: Gadget's Crazy Maze isn't the type of game one would expect when taking on the role of the bumbling, multi-functional detective of the 1980's cartoon. Rather than an action title like its Game Boy Color counterpart, this incarnation of Inspector Gadget is best described as a puzzle game with limited action elements.

According to the story of Gadget's Crazy Maze, Inspector Gadget's mysterious arch-nemesis is up to no good once again. This time, the MADD ringleader Dr. Claw has been creating mind-control crystals on his secret moon base, then tossing them down to Earth. If the crystals lay dormant for a short amount of time, they will activate, taking control of the consciousness of the whole world. To make sure no one disturbs them, Dr. Claw has spread them all around four different areas and inserted his vile henchmen to protect them.

name: Infinity Coloring Pixel
summary: This is the coloring game that the player has to fill color that matches with the number.

name: In Search Of...
summary: You are trapped in a room and the only rational thing is to open a safe, in the hope of being able to escape. Surely you were looking for something...

name: Incubus
summary: Incubus is a 2D simulation game. Get help from Incubus and have sex with various women for 30 days.

name: Ink.
summary: Ink. is a semi-procedural/random RPG action shooter. You'll play in a blank book, trying to write your story as a small ink creature but with great powers. Start your adventure, fight bosses, find items and discover new incredible synergies and combos.

name: Into the Eternal
summary: Into The Eternal is a massive action RPG featuring a unique blend of a third person overworld and side scrolling battles.

name: Indie Darling Bundle Vol 2
summary: Enjoy three indie favourites from Digerati! This bundle contains Bleed 2, Slayaway Camp: Butcher’s Cut, and The Aquatic Adventure of the Last Human.

name: Intra-System: Trust Issues
summary: Intra-System: Trust Issues is a short minimalistic Audio-Adventure based on decisions.

name: Internal Light
summary:
"Internal Light VR" is a first-person puzzle solving action game designed for Oculus Rift. The game is a standing VR experience played with motion controllers. 
 
However vast the darkness, we must supply our own light.. 
Explore the environment,solve puzzles and run through challenges to find the exit

name: Infinite Way
summary: Infinite Way is a deck-building roguelike where you travel, fight and survive in post apocalyptic world.

name: In the Dead of Night: Urszula's Revenge
summary: In The Dead of Night is a story driven top down game that merges the best elements of RTS with Tower Defence. Take control of the town to gather resources and build your defences before Urszula’s zombies charge upon you at nightfall.

name: Inori's House
summary: There’s a strange house at the corner of your town, and people from your town have been disappearing. It’s time to figure out the secrets and wonders at Inori’s House.

name: Into The Mist 2: The Cult
summary: Into The Mist 2 is a horror fps set in an abandoned town covered in mist. After being captured by the cult, you must try and escape!

name: Instead: Ghost Suburb
summary: A mini-adventure game where the goal is to collect certain items in a village and bring them one at a time to the village shrine to open the largest building in the village, which is the northmost building.

name: Interplayer
summary: Pick up the tokens, write the source code, and repair the data that your doctor has deleted! Write source code that achieves the input and expected output pairs set for each stage. The code is written in tolerance, a dedicated language.

name: InFlux
summary: InFlux is a puzzle game that mixes exploration and puzzle platforming in a series of beautiful natural and abstract environments. You are a mysterious metal sphere which falls from the sky, traversing an apparently deserted island dotted with cubic structures of glass and steel. Each glasshouse is a puzzle to be solved.

name: Invaders from another dimension
summary: An action VR Game

name: Indy Racing 2000
summary: INDY RACING 2000 for the Nintendo 64 combines realistic racing simulations and far-out arcade racers to make a game that closely follows the rules, but is still a lot of fun to play. There are many modes such as Practice, Race, Competition, and Championship. Before each race, the player can choose one of 20 real-life drivers and their actual vehicle. Players also have the ability to customize the car as desired, by adjusting everything from the tire pressure to the transmission. In addition to the official Indy Racing League tracks, there are road courses to race on as well. Players will have to race their hardest, as the cartridge will save all of their racing data so that they can compare their stats to a friend, or even race one in the Multiplayer mode. INDY RACING 2000 manages to keep the franchise fresh by offering plenty of tracks and options, with great racing fun in the lead.

name: Invaders
summary: Defend humanity against alien invasion, in a roguelike world where you will have to make decisions and try to form the best deck in order to handle the difficulties. Try to get the highest score in each level, develop your skills, your deck and beat the different champions.

name: Injustice 2: Spawn
summary: Al Simmons, once the U.S. government's greatest soldier, was mercilessly executed by his own men. Resurrected from the ashes of his own grave, Simmons is reborn as a creature from the depths of Hell. Now he must fight for supremacy against all Kombatants.

name: Inno Vation! 2007
summary: Steam port of "INO VATION! 2007" by Omega

name: Invasion...: Level 1 - Contamination
summary:
This is level 1 of a 9 level storyline episode.

You thought it was all over after you finished the grand tour in hell after Episode 3 -- Inferno.

Well, Mars Base has sent in an urgent distress call and this time you are called again for one final encounter against the... INVASION!

name: Invaders 360
summary: A modern tribute to arcade legends! This shoot'em up arcade game revives the classics after 45 years with fresh graphics and innovative gameplay. Become a part of Space Ranges Inc. Join now! Get the high score!

name: Interstellar Pilot 2
summary: The hit mobile game Interstellar Pilot 2 has come to Steam. Join the TEF forces heading to the Gatopean sector to find a new home for mankind. Play how you like in this open world space-sim developed by Pixelfactor.

name: In Fair Spirits
summary: A sweet slice of life boys love / yaoi visual novel set in the English countryside about a couple of young men who bond over mutual bereavement. Also, one of the main characters is over 1000 years old.

name: Intruder
summary:
You are home alone at night, and someone had just broken into your house.

Find the intruder.

name: Instruction
summary:
Instruction is a story based clicker game where you, an employee of a power plant, are tasked with generating power for your city. The powerplant's built in intelligence mentor program, or I.M.P. for short, will help you generate the necessary amount of voltage to fulfill your quota. I.M.P may have developed a little too much of a personality for the powerplant's liking, but don't worry! It's still more than capable of keeping you on track.

In this game you'll be tasked with using different systems to generate power. Each system works differently and can be upgraded to increase your efficiency. Discover each of the power plant's mechanisms, and uncover the story behind your less than friendly companion.

name: Internet Backgammon
summary: Internet Backgammon is a game shipped with some Windows systems that features online play.

name: Internity
summary: A capitalist fever dream disguised as a corporate wellness guided meditation. Will you be stuck in the first day of your unpaid internship forever? A unique visual novel experience in virtual reality that combines absurd humor and trippy visuals to tell a story about you, an intern.

name: Internet Addicted Youth 2005
summary: Netjunker 2005 is a story-oriented role-playing game that incorporates a variety of scenario-appropriate gameplay. You will play the role of Wang Xiaoleng, and face the criticism of Internet addiction and games from teachers, classmates and parents in the early 20th century.

name: Infiltration
summary:
Infiltration is a sci-fi shooter action puzzle game.  
Your mission is to infiltrate the underground facility and stop the nuclear strike before the enemy launch.

name: Invasion 2: Doomed
summary: In the hidden object adventure "Invasion 2: Doomed" the Earthly day has suddenly become several minutes shorter and an abnormal hurricane zone has formed in the tropics. Will you be able to save the earth from destruction?

name: Inkfish
summary: Inkfish is a physics game in which you need to draw lines to protect a falling object from dangers. This object is a cute squid.

name: Injustice: Gods Among Us - Red Son Pack 2
summary: Download Red Son Skin Pack 2 featuring Batman, Green Lantern, and Deathstroke for your Injustice: Gods Among Us DLC collection.

name: Inside Her bedroom
summary: Inside Her (bedroom) is a 2D action puzzle game about monster girls' bedrooms. Move two mirrored characters to get items scattered around their rooms. Use their special skills to complete the puzzles and uncover their secrets. Every monster girl has a unique skill like moving through walls, pushing items, etc. Solve the puzzles to increase their desire.

name: I-Ninja 2
summary: Unreleased sequel to I-Ninja, which got scrapped due to the Liquidation of Argonaut Games.

name: Investigation Forces: Operation Zero
summary: Investigation Forces: Operation Zero will be an horror game with multiplayer game modes and campaign

name: Into the Dead 2: George A. Romero's Night of the Living Dead
Inner Universe 1F0000
summary: This 360° STG offers the tension of a dogfight and a turn-based strategy. As a hero with the superpower of time-stopping, you fight, talk, and maintain your aircraft in the inner universe, aiming to save everything in the world.

name: Inquisitive Dave
summary: An adventure game with slight platforming elements where you travel from place to place, meet strange new characters and pick up any items not nailed down.

name: Integrated
summary:
Roxanne is out there to find a job on what seems to be a normal office. However, sooner than later she will find herself in a place she is not supposed to be...

A game made for the Haunted PS1 Summer of Screams Jam by @PhantomaDev and @MiaRevello in 45 days.

name: In to the 029
summary: In to the 029 is a horror game based on live-action 3D graphics. Collect clues through simple puzzle solving and investigation. Face the truth through endlessly repeated investigations amid the growing tension and fear.

name: Insurrection: Cyborgs Awakening
summary: Kick some asses in this cooperative retrowave game!!! Use powerful abilities and combos to destroy the evil minions of the Driftonics mega corporation and free humanity from the cyborg threat.

name: Industriality
summary: Future, Robots have invaded the planet and terrorized cities. Artificial intelligence is out of control. Only the Hero can stop this madness.

name: Infected spaceship generator
summary: Generator of random mazes with a search for objects, ammunition and weapons. Random placement of enemies such as zombies and mutants, including minibosses. Each new game will be unique.

name: Infinity City
summary: Infinity City is a hillarious math romp with everyone's favourite educational cartoon bunch, The Gigglebone Gang.

name: Infinite Chili Sauce
summary: Casual and relaxed placement game, hang your time in your leisure time and build your own chili sauce empire.

name: Interpose
summary: In this game you are overlynx, ancient inhabitant of Earth and Atlantis. Your race is a very peaceful and very wise in all Galaxy and you know how to live in harmony with nature. But on the planet Danedola some aliens by manipulating DNA created new race - humans, whose goal was simple: exterminate the overlynxes and infest the Earth. So you have to protect your lovely planet from these creatures by shooting them from your space craft. Progressing from level to level you can upgrade your vehicle with more powerful weapons. This game is very colorful interpretation of original game idea with new background plot.

name: Insexsity
summary: A game of a girl who dreams of her own apartment.

name: Insight of L
summary:
Unneglectable is a 2D adventure game asks "What are you living for?".
You may face the agenda again in this mysterious world.
A player have a adventure with the little shadow in the mysterious world.
Open a road with a power to grab the essence of something. In this adventure, you may know what happened there in the past and who he is.

name: International Jetpack Conference
summary: Adventure game made in ZZT. Journalist interviews people by repeatedly bumping into them, then solves puzzles.

name: Infinity Trip
summary: Infinity Trip is a simple and addictive endless runner game. You control a little ship gliding through a beautiful exotic world, avoiding obstacles and collecting coins to unlock new cool spaceships.

name: Intelligence
summary: Intelligence - a puzzle game in which you want to build the image so that the picture was like the original image. Move the puzzle tiles wisely to arrange them in the correct order and recreate the image.

name: Invaded
summary: A fast-paced digital board game where the tables can be turned in anyone’s favor with the roll of a dice. Players must be cunning and strategic to secure their victory!

name: Instinct
summary:
Instinct is a story-driven first person shooter inspired by real-life events in a mountainous region of North Korea. An elite U.S. Army unit is stranded on a top-secret Korean military installation. The aftermath of the operation crossed the world news flashes on September 9, 2004. 
 
Take the role of one of three playable characters in this first person shooter that delivers horror, action, and drama as you uncover the reasons behind the massive viral infection

name: Indie Gems Bundle - Explosions Edition
summary: Get these three exploding games in this fantastic indie bundle, at a discounted price!

summary: Take part in an atmospheric sci-fi horror game and stay alive in the last stronghold, the Cathedral. Arise, develop your character, gear up, fight soulless enemies and face the mighty Baron.

name: Innovazione Vostra
summary:
Kill enemies and try to reach 100 points.

Nothing more, nothing less.

This game has quite ironical mechanics.

name: Insanity
summary:
INSANITY
For TurboGrafx-16 / PC Engine Super CD-Rom (released October 2009)

You've been imprisoned by robots and their evil master. Now, in order to survive, you must traverse their maze of a space station. Be warned - the walls are electrified and the robots are programmed to do one thing: Destroy the humanoid!

Insanity brings you classic Berzerk style arcade gameplay:
Increasing difficulty level
A choice of CD or chiptune soundtracks
Hidden gameplay modes

name: Insanity
summary: A young adult enters a mental state trying to overcome his past traumas and relationships.

name: Inway
summary: Inway - a fascinating platformer that allows you to try yourself in complex tests, and its passing can take a lot of nerves!

name: Infinite Flight
summary: Infinite Flight offers the most comprehensive flight simulation experience on mobile devices, whether you are a curious novice or a decorated pilot. Explore high definition scenery in regions from around the world with our diverse inventory of detailed aircraft, tailoring each flight by choosing your time of day, weather conditions, and aircraft weight configuration.

name: In Space
summary: In Space is a 2D top-down Arena Shooter where you are on an alien planet, and you have to survive to a horde of alien creatures that want your blood

name: Inuit Uppirijatuqangit
summary:
Inuit Uppirijatuqangit - ᐃᓄᐃᑦ ᐅᑉᐱᕆᔭᑐᖃᖏᑦ is a hidden object game in which users explore 4 unique areas in and around an Inuit community.

Click on characters and find real Inuit Myths hidden. Complete with animation and music from Kathleen Ivaluarjuk Merritt users will learn Inuit Mythology while enjoying the challenge of finding each myth.

name: Into the Timeverse
summary: Into the Timeverse is a hard non forgiving action platformer game. Into the Timeverse is a constant"runner" game that you need to match your color to the appropriate color of the enemy platforms. Expect to die a lot in this game.

name: Internet Hearts
summary: Internet Hearts is a game pre-installed on Windows ME and Windows XP systems that features online play.

name: Internet Spades
summary: A remake of Internet Spades included in Windows 7.

name: Internet Checkers
summary: A remake of Internet Checkers included in Windows 7.

name: Infected City
summary: Infected City is a first person shooter. In this game, all people have turned into zombies. You have to pick up dusty weapons and protect yourself, and most importantly, save your beloved wife from hordes of bloodthirsty zombies.

name: Intercept
summary: Intercept is a cancelled game for the Virtual Boy

name: Infernal Apocalypse: Rise of the Underworld
summary: The first online RTS game based in Hell. As a low-rank demon, you and your friends build your own kingdom, manage slaves and resources, fight hordes of demons, and rise up the ranks until you meet Satan himself. After all, our eternal damnation is certain, so why not practice beforehand?

name: Influence
summary:
Make an Influence with your every move...

In this game, the player will be given a power called "Influence" to clear all the cubes that are piled up on the stage.

name: Insurgency Runner
summary: Insurgency Runner - 3D runner with shooter elements in which you play as a soldier running along the road, jumping over different obstacles, collecting ammo and other bonuses, and killing rebels,. Don't get into their sightlines or you will be shot.

name: IndyCar Racing
summary: IndyCar Racing is a racing game by Papyrus Design Group. It was released in 1993.

name: Insect Simulator
summary: Choose an insect, develop a colony, join the fray!

name: Infectra
summary: Ifectra is a strategy game set in 2124 on the distant planet Emevera III, ruled by the Maxploit Corporation, where an epidemic of a yet unknown virus broke out. The corporation was during advanced level of colonizing a new planet, the perfect source of strategic metarials. The group of engineers, miners, technicians and their families meant to be the seed of a new civilization. And then one day a not yet classified organic gas spread out to the atmosphere, changing irrevocably genotype of people with direct contact with... let's call it virus. It sounds like something manageable. Your goal as the corporation security commander is to evacuate as many healthy people as possible and to eliminate infected individuals. - plan evacuation and build fortification - try out variety of tactics - find the best solutions - succeed or be lost When the world is on the edge of catastrophy and the future lays in your hands, the man must hold his ground and find a way of survival. You were not chosen specifically for this kind of job. No one would ever apply ... Stop the infection from spreading. Guide civilians to the rescue zones and fight hordes of mutants. The corporation is counting on you! Game main features: - challenge yourself on the strategic field in 12 missions - find your own method of building fortification, experiment and get better results - watch cutscenes with actors - enjoy 3D low poly graphics

name: Inscryption Pico-8
summary: A demake of Inscryption for PICO-8. Your goal is to defeat Leshy.

name: In Light
summary:
A platformer adventure game where you play as Yin and Yang, in their quest to find a path back to the Cosmic Egg. 
 
Travel through mystic lands enjoying and unique gaming experience, whether it be alone or with a friend. Control two characters at the same time and defeat obstacles through timing and teamwork.

name: Infocus: Extreme Bike
summary:
INFOCUS Extreme Bike is an arcade first person mountain bike downhill videogame, with challenging circuits full of speed inspired by real competitions and locations like Chile, Mexico and Bolivia.
You must descend and maneuver your bike at full speed trying to avoid obstacles using the device’s gyroscope to achieve the best time you can.

name: In Search of the Most Amazing Thing
Intercolonies
summary: Intercolonies takes place in post-apocalyptic world where colonies are isolated. Use your vehicle to transport people between them. Upgrade and customize your car to navigate treacherous terrain and overcome post-apocalyptic challenges.

name: Interstellar Prime
summary: Interstellar Prime merges RPG, RTS, and space simulation genres through seamless gameplay to explore human existence in the space age. Taking place 150 years in the future, mankind has finally acquired all the necessary technologies to contour space. The real question is, does humanity have what it takes to thrive in the unknown reaches of the solar system?

name: Interballistic Symphony
summary: A musical, fast-paced indie game all about speed and swift thinking. Navigate through tricky environments, use powerups to your advantage, push your skills to the limit and become the next interballistic master.

name: InOutPath
summary: You will play the role of a smart and agile kitten, learn and utilize various strange and interesting mechanisms to unlock 300+ puzzles that are extremely characteristic and full of challenges, to obtain an unforgettable puzzle-solving experience.

name: Inukari: Fateful Detour
summary: The standalone addon for Inkuari - Chase of Desception with two new world and local multiplayer duel mode. Its a fast and smooth action jump & run game like in the good old days.

name: Inflatable doll
summary: A beautiful woman will always catch a boy's eye. Where you look depends on your preferences. This game could be the start for you!

name: Incredible Dracula: Chasing Love - Collector's Edition
summary: Guide Dracula in his quest to escape a man-hungry princess! With enchanting gameplay, a charming world to explore, and dozens of challenging levels to complete, Incredible Dracula: Chasing Love – Collector's Edition will take a big bite out of boredom!

name: Inu: A Glimpse of Infinity
summary: INU is an atmospheric exploration adventure in an infinite 3D fractal universe. “Journey” meets “No Man’s Sky” in truly infinite, mesmerizing alien landscapes – not created more like discovered.

name: Inhibit
summary: "Inhibit" is an exhilarating and highly challenging speed run platform game that will put your reflexes to the ultimate test. Each level is more demanding than the previous one, and the slightest mistake will determine the difference between victory and defeat.

name: Inca Marbles
summary: A classic puzzle game in which you need to destroy the chain of balls before it will pass the entire route. Pick up the balls by color, and they will destroy each other.

name: Infiltrating a Cult: Additional All-Ages Story & Graphics DLC
summary: "Additional All-Ages Story & Graphics DLC" is you can play the game that graphics and story without adult contents for all-ages.

name: Into The Flames: Retro Truck Pack 1
summary: Cruise to fire scenes in style! This pack includes 2 unique fire trucks inspired by some of America's most iconic trucks.

name: Infection Rate
summary: 3rd person Co-op Zombie Survival with multiplayer

name: Injustice: Gods Among Us Batgirl
summary: Download Batgirl and add to your Injustice: Gods Among Us DLC collection.

name: In Peaceful Days
summary: Can you make the perfect teatime date?

name: Injustice: Gods Among Us Blackest Night Pack 1
summary: With Blackest Night Pack 1, play as the Superman, Doomsday, and The Flash with this new skin pack based on the Blackest Night storyline written by the incomparable Geoff Johns.

name: Injustice: Gods Among Us Zatanna
summary: Now you see your health bar, now you don't. Take down your opponents as the powerful sorceress, Zatanna.

name: Infinite Pixel
summary: Infinite Pixel is a sci-fi themed survival sandbox game by Somniare.

name: Infernal Ascent
summary: Small to medium-sized vertical mixed-texture map.

name: Infested
summary:
In INFESTED you must find your way through an infested space ship and discover a way to escape by using the resources and environment around you.

Control your character by selecting various actions at the bottom of the screen and manage items you have picked up along the way in your personal inventory on the right hand side of the screen. You are also provided with a navigation tool in the bottom left that will indicate the directions in which you can move.

Along your journey you will encounter hazards and creatures that will kill you if given the chance. If you die, it's not the end, it is all just part of discovering the hazards that this game has to offer and you will simply start from the previous screen. Learn from your mistakes and trial and error to discover the solution to the puzzles put before you.

If you become stuck, don't be afraid to use your items in various ways. Be sure to examine your surroundings to get clues to help you along the way. It's all about making your way to the end of your journey one step at a time.

INFESTED is a point and click game in the style of NES Classics Shadowgate (1987), Déjà Vu (1990), and Uninvited (1991) which were developed by ICOM Simulations Inc. and published by KEMCO Corp.

name: Invaders
summary: A short space themed level

name: Instant Indie Collection: Vol. 5
summary:
Our Instant Indie Collections bring you three indie hits in one neat package.

Human: Fall Flat - An open-ended physics-based puzzle and exploration game set in floating dreamscapes. Your goal is to escape these worlds by solving puzzles with nothing but your wits and physics.

Manual Samuel - Meet Samuel, he’s handsome, wealthy and most importantly – dead. A deal with Death gives Samuel one last chance to live again if he can survive a whole day doing everything manually.

The Little Acre - While searching for his father, Aidan travels to a strange new world. Lily, his heroic daughter, sets off after him. This lovingly crafted adventure is fully-voiced and with hand-drawn animations.

name: In Truck Driving
summary: This is a driving simulation game that allows you to drive different types of trucks in an open-world city environment.

name: International Soccer
summary:
International Soccer is a soccer game in which two teams play against each other. The match itself can be varied with many settings, e.g. difficulty level, weather, half-time length or time of day, but there are no additional playing modes like a league to be found. However, the basic tactical approach can be set before starting the match.

When not in ball possession, the active athlete can be switched by pressing a button and the opponent can be tackled. The strength of a kick depends on how long the fire button is pressed.

name: Indicted
summary: Indicted is a first-person psychological horror game exploring the fears of Arthur, a police investigator with a dark past. With immersive graphics and environments, and a touch of horror from the 80s and 90s. Thus, bringing a unique experience of horror and survival.

name: Invisible Places: Pixel Art Jigsaw Puzzle
summary: Invisible Places is a minimalist jigsaw puzzle game that mixes GIF Pixel Art and photographs instead of static images.

name: In the Groove 2
summary: An unreleased PlayStation 2 port of In the Groove 2.

name: Into The Unknown
summary: In a small city, a man was struggling to save his business from failure. Despite his best efforts, he was unable to find a solution. One day, while searching for a document in his room, he stumbled upon a dusty book that he had never seen before. The title of the book was “Into The Unknown”.

name: International Snooker 2012
summary: An updated version of Big Head's International Snooker game, now on multiple platforms.

name: Invasion
summary:
Cosmic beings must invade the planet Sunset to settle before their own world is consumed by a cesspool in space. Your mission is to clear the planet's surface in each level before the resupply ships land. In each level, you will face three enemies that you must hit multiple times to eliminate them and clear the area, allowing the ships to land safely. As you advance, the enemies will become faster and more resistant to your bombs, and the enemy fleet will also appear blocking your way to the runway.

This Atari 2600 game challenges you to fight for the survival of your species, no matter the cost.

name: Inferno Legend
summary: Inferno Legend is a MMORPG powered by Unity 3D on all Mobile iOS. You will join in the unprecedented fighting experience - Redefine the word "Justice" in Inferno Legend! You will conduct Diablo to fight against the human.

name: Inspector Kloo 7: The Phantom of the Fog
Infestation Sea
summary: Infestation is a Survival Horror MMO that immerses players in a zombie-infested, post-apocalyptic world in which a viral outbreak has decimated the human population leaving in its wake, a nightmare of epic proportion.

name: Into the Twilight
summary:
Featured in New & Noteworthy, What We're Playing, What's Hot, and Number 1 in category in 15 countries.
Run, jump & roll!
Can you escape into the Twilight? Run, jump, roll and swing to avoid drops. traps, and enemies while you collect stars in the fastest time possible. Play through increasingly difficult levels in this furiously fun platformer with beautiful graphics and music.

name: Inviyya

name: Incredible Dracula: Chasing Love
summary: Vampires have gotten a bad rap. Take Count Dracula for instance. People think all he wants to do is suck their blood, but in truth, he wants the same things everyone else does: food, shelter, and love. He won't settle for just any woman, though, so when a man-hungry princess takes a liking to him against his wishes, he does the only thing a red-blooded (or an undead) male can do: run!

name: Injustice: Gods Among Us - Arkham City Skin Pack
summary: Defeat your enemies as the sinfully twisted Joker, sly and stealthy Catwoman, or everyone’s favorite caped crusader Batman with the Batman: Arkham City Skin Pack based on the legendary series from Rocksteady Studios.

name: International Basketball Manager

name: Infra: Underground

name: In

name: Initial Prospect

Deluxe Edition contains:
•Access to 3 new fighters as they become available
•Exclusive gear shader usable on the entire roster
•Premiere skin with new look and dialogue for a specific character

DLC character Darkseid is also available as a pre-order bonus.

The physical Deluxe Edition comes in a SteelBook case.

name: Insensato
summary: A man without the face, armed only with his struggling will, must begin a long journey to regain his completeness.

name: Into the Farlands
summary: Into the Farlands is a new Survival Hack and Slash experience set in a unique Mesoamerican inspired Dark-Fantasy Adventure. Fight waves of vicious monsters and meet interesting characters as you explore dangerous jungles, fetid swamps, waterfalls, ancient dungeons, and treacherous trails.

name: Insomnia's Window
summary: You're an overworked receptionist that's been having a tough time at work. As a result, your sleeping habits have suffered a bit and you're unable to do much sleeping at all. Who better to escort you to dreamland than your boyfriend? <3

name: In the Same Boat

In this captivating cooperative sailing game, one player commands the ship, while the other is confined to the captain's cabin, solely navigating with the map. Successfully delivering goods on time will demand the crew's adept communication and skill.

name: IndyCar Series
summary: Codemasters' official game, IndyCar Series, is blisteringly fast, nerve-shatteringly intense, pure professional racing and features ultra-close pack racing with up to 33 cars racing on track. Gameplay requires total focus to handle the incredible overtaking manoeuvres at speeds well over 220 mph. IndyCar Series delivers a full racing season, which includes the Indianapolis 500-Mile Race (Indy 500), the greatest spectacle in US racing.

name: InstaDoom WAD Of The Year Edition
summary:
If you just can't get enough of taking pictures of your food and making it look more magenta, InstaDoom is for you! Play Doom with any of the 40(!) official Instagram filters! Memento Mori with Mayfair! Requiem with Rise! Icarus with Inkwell! Alien Vendetta with Aden or Valencia!

Also Includes: Selfie Doom: Buddy Adding Edition! Indulge your narcissistic urges even in the deepest corners of Hell! With the new multiplayer compatibility, take group selfies in front of famous landmarks! As seen in Le Monde!

name: Into the Maze
summary: A giant maze like structure is discovered on Mars. You are a veteran astronaut sent with his team of researchers to unravel its secrets. Traverse the giant maze and solve its puzzles using a small drone with an arsenal of upgradeable abilities.

name: Infinite Maze
summary:
Infinite Maze is a classic maze is for kids and adults with no level limits. 
Mazes & More is a classic maze/labyrinth puzzle for kids and adults.

name: International Tennis Pro
summary:
International Tennis Pro is a Sports game.

Take to the centre court and smash your way to becoming the number 1 seed on the World’s toughest Pro Tour.

Stunning international venues, a range of challenging singles and doubles tournaments and great multiplayer game modes will keep you coming back until you're crowned the world's greatest!

name: Indagator
summary: A visual novel fangame.

summary: Roast, sunny, my summer. I came to help my grandfather. Build my farm and find love.

name: Intergalactic traveler: The Omega Sector
summary: A game about solving labyrinths with puzzles and battles in order to test your skills.

name: Inabatron
summary:
janky robotron: 2084 homage made from scratch by one idiot in under 46 hours for touhou fan game jam 5 (theme: "folklore, myth, legend")

help tewi fight against wave after wave of dangerous yokai from the legend of the hare of inaba. collect all the rabbits on the screen to advance waves. shoot or avoid the yokai and their attacks -- and don't let them get to the rabbits first. there are no bombs or power-ups, but you'll get an extra life every 60,000 points.

name: Insane Town
summary: The key elements of the game will be ingenuity and teamwork in order to understand other players’ roles, implement strategies, kill opponents, disguise themselves and resist until time runs out.

name: Insertion
summary: Insertion is an eleven-level PWAD for Doom II. It was created by David Shaw, Stephen Watson, Thomas Evans and Adam Williamson. Most of the authors had previously worked on either the first or second Memento Mori, or Requiem, and the gameplay and level design found here is similar in style to those, albeit with fewer maps.

name: Internal Reaches 2
summary: Internal Reaches 2 is a single-level PWAD for Doom II that came out in 2003. It was designed by Samuel Villarreal (Kaiser) and is also known as Kaiser 1.

name: Internal Reaches 4
summary: Internal Reaches 4 is a single-level PWAD for Doom II that was released in 2004. It was designed by Samuel Villarreal (Kaiser) and is also known as Kaiser 8.

name: Insanity's Edge
summary: You are Sergeant Shaun Rumsey, a marine on a UAC base on earth that was recently attack by the forces of hell, after finding a large hell portal in the mines. Marines fought bravley, but were outnumberded and slaughtered. As far as you know, you are the only one left on this base, and it is amazing you are still alive. Maybe you have better skills than you first thought. You see a shotgun in front of you, and hope that no demons will come teleporting in once you pick it up.

name: Inferno
summary: Inferno (not to be confused with Doom's original third episode) is a nine-level episode replacement designed by Christopher Lutz and released in March 1998. The mapset is themed after Doom episode Inferno, replacing all levels with new ones designed around the Hell map visual style.

name: Invasion 2000 A.D.
summary: A shoot'em up based on Space Invaders, where the player controls a spacecraft at the bottom of the screen moving left or right, destroying a wave of aliens above descending slowly in formation.

name: Insurgence: Second Assault - Remastered
summary: Insurgence - Second Assault is a follow-up sequel to Insurgence - Chains of Renegade. Features new characters and stories from two different points of view.

name: Insert Before Flight
summary: Insert before flight is a flight simulator focused on small aircrafts. You can fly different aircrafts and choose different departure airfields. Fly in a big scale terrain and explore the different points of interests like a water park, different towns and cities. To complete your adventure land your aircraft on one of three airfields.

name: Invincible Island
summary: You have to find seven lost parchments wich contain the clues to find a legendary treasure.

name: Infinite Loop: Kojou ga Miseta Yume
Ineffable escape
summary: When in a place of infinite Darkness, do not drift apart

name: International Superstar Soccer 2000
summary: The undisputed king of football returns... Experience the new Career Mode - bring youngsters through the ranks to create individual star players. Smoother animations and gameplay. ISS 2000 is the choice of champions - nothing gets as close to the beautiful game.

name: Insomnia
summary: You wake up in a cold sweat, paranoid, and unable to move. Is it just another case of sleep paralysis or something else? Check your cameras to ensure you're not having delusions, and, most importantly, try not to panic..

name: Inside My Mind 2
summary: A psychedelic platformer, each level of which is a step into the depths of the subconscious. Avoid the traps of the mind, find answers to questions and go through the path of personality transformation.

name: Incomer
summary: First-person action game against hordes of alien intruders.

name: Infiltraliens
summary: Infiltraliens is an action adventure game in which you take on the role of Gorp. Place 52, the world's most advanced and well-guarded military base is holding your alien friends captive. Can you make your way through the obstacles and pass the guards to save them?

name: Infinite Space III: Sea of Stars
summary:
Sea of Stars continues the Infinite Space series of games that defined the genre of short-form space roguelikes in Strange Adventures in Infinite Space (2001) and Weird Worlds: Return to Infinite Space (2005). It compresses a galaxy-spanning starship adventure into the space of a single sitting, but as the game world is randomly generated each time you play, you will keep coming back for more. There is enough variety in items, aliens and special encounters that you will always discover something new - no two sessions play the same.

Sea of Stars begins in the Glory star system, in an area of space known as the Purple Void for its colorful nebular clouds. The long-isolated Terran colony of Hope has discovered the secret of faster-than-light travel, and an age of interstellar adventure has begun. Choose your starship and blast off into the Infinite Space in search of fame and fortune! Travel from star to star, explore planets and discover strange lifeforms and artifacts left behind by ancient empires. Find technology to upgrade your ship and gain allies to grow your flotilla. Encounter bizarre and delightful alien races, trade with them or blow them up - the decision is yours. And sometimes, you will face an existential threat to all life in the sector, and get to save the world.

name: Inugami: Doggy Dojo!
summary: This tale about getting some tail follows the journey of a boy on the cusp of manhood thrust into the clutches of a sexy demon dog. Stranded on an island our hero Kazuma undergoes training in the secret art of doggy style and any other sexy techniques his new sexual sensei endows him with.

name: Invade
summary: INVADE is a chaotic multiplayer party game for up to 4 players. Fight with an assortment of silly characters to capture your opponent's treasure chest, while avoiding the many explosive powerups!

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Breakaway Set Bundle
summary: Will you fight for order or carve your own path? The Breakaway Set Bundle contains all four Breakaway themed DLCs including premium gear items and weapon skins.

name: In The Dog House
summary:
Have you ever wondered what your dog gets up to while you are away?
Guide your favourite pooch through this charming and strategic puzzler.

name: Infinity Golf

name: In the Abyss

name: Intralism
summary: Intralism - fast and hard arcade. Listen to music and match all notes. Master all the maps or create your own and challenge friends in the online multiplayer. But remember: wrong button - failed try.

name: Inflatum

summary: Invizimals: Shadow Zone is a PlayStation Portable augmented reality video game developed by Novarama, and published by Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. It is the sequel to 2009's Invizimals. As such, it is a collectible creature game, and requires the PSP's camera attachment for play.

name: International Rugby

name: Ingot Rush
summary: Open unique world, that you have never seen before. Ingot Rush is new innovative puzzle game that will not let you get bored even for a second. Catch moving ingots from the conveyor and sort them in ingot storage Make Points by matching them 3 vertically, horizontally and diagonally.

Welcome to an amazing space, full of enemies and a infinte adventure  for you and your family!

With this infinite space game you must show your skills piloting Genova.
Genova is an inovation of space ships created by ALS Corp and you have the mission to destroy more enemies and reach the biggest distance ever reached by a man on the InfiniteSpace.

Space, space, enemies and space. 
Join to this adventure!

summary: New ships with special abilities await your command in a new mini-campaign. Get back into the Wrog war to save humankind and also free the space creatures known as the Bubba. Extend the challenging journey of the Freedom Strike carrier with the Broken Overlord!

name: Ink Cipher

summary: Instinct is a die & retry oriented platformer with intense combat.

summary: Action-Oriented Dungeon Crawler RPG

The player takes control of Dizzy's cousin Danny and it a prequel to the main game, ending with Dizzy teleporting to the first screen of Magicland Dizzy. This was the only time Danny appeared in the Dizzy series.

name: Intergalactic Galactic Dinosaur Banana
summary:
This game was cancelled.
On release it only supported native banana controllers. Blueberries still not supported.

name: Influenza A
summary: A very short Bitsy game about having the flu in the middle of the night.

name: Inside the Computer
summary: This is a game that takes place in computer hardware. It's about you fighting against computer viruses. I'm a 16-year-old senior high student. I love computer programming or making and playing computer games. This is a game that I made it all by myself. I hope you enjoy it.

name: Interlude

name: In the Hollow of the Valley

A Spambot In Love

name: Indiemon: Earth Nation - Villain Version
summary: Fight for the other side of the law in Indiemon: Earth Nation - Villain Version.

name: Initial D
summary: The Popular manga Initial D, appeared in the PS. Utilizing a digital comic movies and reproduce the world of the original. The pile driving, Ekusutorabatoru partners may change after ending, full of narrow elements appear to do courses such as cars and hidden hidden. Driving with the sea and became a high school student Takumi's amazing, let's break the notorious race shop.

name: Instarion
