name: Into the Winds: Zen Flowers
summary: Into the Winds: Zen Flowers aims to provide a meditative gameplay experience. Take your time to match flowers and watch as the flowers disperses their petals, carried away by the gentle breeze. A down to earth Match-2 puzzle game infused with elements of Zen.

name: Incursion: The Thing
summary: With over 50,000,000 plays over the previous parts, the Incursion series has enthralled and challenged many players over the years. Now you can save your world from darkness in new Incursion: The Thing. Bigger! Faster! Stronger!

name: Indiemon Card Adventure
summary: Indiemon Card Adventure follows an Indiemon card player named Rik as he defends Indie Island.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Desert Veteran Weapon Skin Set
summary: Show your knowledge of the battlegrounds with the Desert Veteran Weapon Skin Set. This skin can be applied to six different weapons. This skin can be applied to six different weapons.

name: Inside My Friend's Mind
summary: An abstract adventure inside my friend's head. He inspires me and motivates me to move forward.

name: Infested Grounds
summary: Use modern weapons or stealth to outrun zombies and what’s chasing them through these Infested Grounds, a first-person survival-horror game featuring frightening jump-scares and a chilling conspiracy uncovered through journal entries, scattered documents, and hidden artifacts.

name: Intergalactic Storage Clearance
summary: In this light-hearted adventure, you must outwit competitors in bidding wars to secure storage containers scattered across alien worlds. The objective is to uncover valuable objects hidden within them and turn a profit by selling them on the intergalactic market.

name: Intergalacticorp.
summary: Intergalacticorp. is a sci-fi rogue-lite tower defense game where you take on the role of an operator-bot, charged with conducting an intergalactic mining operation. Will you thrive as an efficient miner in this alien environment, or succumb to the dangers that lurk in the depths of space?

name: Inkidoki And Phoenix
summary: Enjoy beautiful pictures, bright and exciting levels, and fun music!

name: Inspire Footprints
summary: Inspire Footprints: Interactive is an application designed to help you select a destiny path and purpose geared to help you make a positive impact on our world and the people around you.

name: In Sound Mind: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary: From the creators of the cult classic Nightmare House 2 comes In Sound Mind, a witty first-person psychological horror with frenetic puzzles and unique boss fights. In Sound Mind Digital Deluxe Edition includes the digital soundtrack by The Living Tombstone.

name: Independence Day Break
summary: Independence Day Break is an arcade game that lets the user break Independence Day themed characters with a unique paddle and ball. Unique animated levels, Mini-Bosses and powerups to collect while you progress through the levels. Thirty Levels to play in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory. Single player retro-arcade fun!

name: Innsmouth Nightmare
summary: Professor Daniel Castane grapples with the terrifying mysteries of a cult-dominated island. Accompany him on a journey where he encounters strange characters and faces unsettling visions. Uncover the truth and survive the island's dark secrets, all while battling to retain sanity.

name: Into the Dark: Ultimate Trash Edition
summary:
We got boobies. 
We got hookers. 
We got Zombies. 
We got Nazis. 
We got even Nazi-Zombies!

name: Industry Transporters
summary: An economic simulation where you build up production chains as effectively as possible on a large scale terrain. You can choose from a large variety of wares and buildings to build up your production chain and use up to 4 types of transportation. Play against a complex economic with flexible prices and soon against each other or computer players.

name: Inma Nemu no Chu-chu Seieki Tanken-ki
In Flames
summary: A mystical 2D adventure with a non-linear storyline, in the best traditions of X-Files and Twin Peaks.

name: Ink
summary: Change the dim world, fill it with light. Each inky struggle improves your sight. "Sometimes words alone can't paint the whole picture." A VR game about depression.

name: Invaders from Hyperspace!
summary:
Press 1 on the alpha-numeric keyboard.

You have just arrived at your post in the Battle Control Central at the heart of the United Planets Interstellar Galactic Empire.Your TV screen is monitoring activity in the twin solar systems of Terien and Lorien forty-three billion light years away.

Two remote controlled robot battle cruisers also appear on your screen. The right hand control maneuvers the lighter colored space ship at the right hand side of the screen. The left hand control activates the darker colored space ship at the left of the screen.

Push the joy stick forward to gain altitude. Pull it toward you to lose altitude. Push left to go left. Push right to go right.

Press the action button to fire your lasers. These weapons are located in the front end of the battle cruisers and will fire in the direction the space craft are heading.

One point is scored for every invading space craft disintegrated by your lasers. No points are scored for destroying another player's battle cruiser.

The enemy space craft are programmed to attack the nearest Imperial battle cruiser.

If your space ship is destroyed, you can launch another one from a planet of your own color. Push the joy stick in the direction you want your battle cruiser to travel and press the action button to launch.

If there is more than one planet of your color, the next space craft available will signal its presence by a blinking light. If there are no planets of your color, you must wait for a planet's color to change.

A planet changes color each time it is hit by laser fire. The invasion fleet is programmed to fire on the planets when they are not attacking the Imperial battle cruisers.

If a space craft crashes into a planet of a different color, both are destroyed. An exploded planet will not return to the screen. The central planet of each solar system is invulnerable and cannot be destroyed.

The battle cruisers can evade enemy attack by landing on planets of their own color. The enemy space craft will not waste ammunition against battle cruisers protected by the sophisticated energy shields available on their home planets. They will concentrate their fire only on airborne space craft. A landed space ship will signal its presence on a home planet by a blinking light.

If no Imperial battle cruisers are on the screen, the two ships from the invasion fleet will turn on each other. They will fire their lasers at each planet and try to conquer it. A planet is conquered when it is changed to the invading space ship's color.

The first player to down ten enemy space ships wins the game and receives an electronic salute for making the Empire once again safe for humanity.

Single player version I:
See how many planets you can keep in orbit after downing ten enemy space ships.

Single player version II:
Play against the clock. Try to shorten the time it takes to down ten enemy space craft.

Spectator sport:
Leave the hand controls unmanned and watch the invasion fleet fight it out for control of the twin solar systems!

To play again:
A new game will automatically start at the end of each ten point battle.
Or - press RESET and then press 1 on the alpha-numeric keyboard.

name: Infinite Brick Breaker
summary: Launch balls and break bricks, collect more balls that you can launch and accumulate points indefinitely - this is Infinite Brick Breaker!

name: Infinite Ancient: Room Escape
summary:
Infinite Ancient Doors Escape is a combination of point and click type classical room escape games of different locations. These escape games are logically developed with tricky puzzles, adventure location, messy clues, and obscured-hidden objects to enter into the clue of Best Escape games. These games will surely test your brain logical and analytical skills. These Free rooms and doors escape games are designed in the sense of real fun, hi-fi scenes, more thrilling twists, challenging and exciting soundtracks to make you addicted and crazy for the escape game lovers.
Can you Escape 150 in 1 Infinite Ancient Doors Escape?

name: Indivisible
summary: An actual NES ROM demaking Lab Zero's Indivisible

name: InvaderSwarm
summary: InvaderSwarm is an old-school hardcore game. You are the pilot of a galactic ship and it's time to destroy hundreds of aliens!

name: Insect Worlds
summary: Immerse yourself in the world of insects. Explore fascinating forests and learn about their way of life. Complete quests and mini-games, fight or collect resources and cards. Admire the microcosm from a completely different perspective and learn new facts about plants and insects.

name: Invisible Apartment 3
summary: Third and final part of the cyberpunk visual novel series Invisible Apartment.

name: Inorikaze
summary: Inorikaze is a Touhou doujin game focus with the theme of pursuing the faith and bond. The main story is about Moriya family when they left Suwa and moved into Gensokyo, the Fantasy Village, and overcome the war between them and Tengus.

name: Infinite Dungeon Crawler: The Swampy Isles
summary: DLC adds an additional world to travel to when you go through the Gate. Prepare yourself for a lush jungle and palm-lined beaches, filled with ancient ruins, sunken ships, and fierce monsters.

name: In the Thrall of Darkness: The Gift of Dreams
summary: In the thrall of darkness is a horror game in which you must get out of this nightmare.

name: Infinite Roads
summary: Drift and jump across an infinite multitude of roads. Infinite Roads is a simple but hard to master arcade racer. Can you keep your car inside the road and beat the high-score?

name: Innocent Forest 2: The Bed in the Sky
summary: The “FullDive Novel”: Visual Novels meets Virtual Reality in this ultimate immersive reading experience. With character dialogue voiced by high-profile voice actors, and illustrated pages turning into 360-degree VR animated scenes, you will be absorbed in the story, and feel as one with the protagonist.

name: Instance Destroy
summary: Bite sized metroidvania with several unique mechanics Make weapons from the elements, juggle enemies, find furniture? fight bosses, unlock abilities, find secrets, unlock transformations!

name: Infinite Dungeon Crawler: The Infernal Dungeons
summary: The Infernal Dungeons DLC opens up another world that you can travel to when you go through the Gate. Fight ghastly creatures like gnolls, gargoyles, and the lich in a truly "dungeon" type of world. NOTE: You must unlock the base game to load this expansion pack.

name: InfiniWordSlide
summary: Inspired by the *tris family of games as well as the word search of the world, InfiniWordSlide gives you a score attack that will test your knowledge of the language, your ability to quickly react and reward good strategy. The controls are simple and the mechanics clear.

name: Intellivision Lives!
summary: Relive the 80's with Intellivision Lives! Play over 60 classic Intellivision games including Baseball, Astrosmash and Space Battle and several unreleased games. Each game comes with historical information, fun facts and interviews with the original developers. If that doesn't inspire nostalgia, you can also watch original Intellivision commercials and archival footage. All games are optimized for both the PS2 Dual Shock 2 and Xbox controllers. Finally, all your all-time favorite Intellivision games in one package.

name: Insurrection
summary: Insurrection is a dark fantasy soulslike RPG. Play as the Skeleton Monk, a powerful mage who can manipulate the elements. Create powerful martial arts combos to avenge your own death and discover the fate of your captured lover.

name: InVertia
summary: Invertia is a fast-paced sidescrolling platformer with a twist: You can't jump! You have to use your power to flip gravity to avoid obstacles and get to the doors in time.

name: Intruder
summary:
Welcome to the neighborhood! You started working from home and bought a new house, far from the city.

But something seems off about it. Just be cautious, and don't believe in fairytales.

name: Inkbound: Supporter Pack - Rise of the Unbound
summary: The Rise of the Unbound Supporter Pack rewards your support with eight exclusive cosmetic sets to customize your look. It includes one set for each character class to enhance your journey through the world of Inkbound.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Praetorian Set Bundle
summary: A warrior must learn and adapt to rise above all others. Purchase the Praetorian Set Bundle to receive Warlord-themed premium gear items and weapon skins.

name: Infinity Disk
summary:
Infinity Disk is a Virtual Reality frisbee game in an abstract science fiction environment. 
The goal is to defeat the obstacles and bounce the frisbee to infinity!

name: Intrusion
summary: Venture through 5 levels of snowy mountains, industrial complexes and moving trains as you battle your way through waves of soldiers, helicopters, and robots.

name: Internet Cafe Mini Games 10 in 1
summary: Imagine an internet cafe that contains 10 fun little games. You can play any game you want in this internet cafe. Try to get the highest score in simple games by managing your character with a single button.

name: Invisible Love
summary: In the "Invisible Love" word game to complete their own life journey! This time we will protect the life of the game character, move forward with him, and look for this invisible heart together. The whole game is hand-painted in 2D style.

name: Indiemon: Earth Nation
summary: A Pokemon-esque game developed by RicolaVG. Play as a Indiemon tamer named Landon and capture and train Indiemon to fight intruders!

name: Into the Belly of the Beast

name: Infected zone

Find more fellow players to complete tasks with you to unlock more areas. Finally escape the infected city if you are lucky!

name: In Memory of the Eternity
summary: Discovering darkness

name: Inugamike no Ichizoku
summary: A mystery visual novel by FromSoftware, starring the famous Japanese detective Kindaichi Kousuke. In 1940s Japan, the wealthy head of the Inugami Clan dies, setting off a chain of bizarre, gruesome murders. Detective Kindaichi must unravel the clan’s terrible secrets of forbidden liaisons, monstrous cruelty, and disguised identities to find the murderer.

name: Indianapolis 500 Evolution
summary:
Indianapolis 500 Evolution lets you relive racing at indy in the 60's.

Game features much more then the Indy 500, build and race your car the way you want.

name: Infinite Children
summary: Infinite Children is a science fiction audiobook video game about life extension. Every time anyone gets a Steam achievement, the game gets longer...for everyone, ever.

name: International Super Karts
summary: Racing across the tarmac only inches above the road, International Super Karts gives an adrenaline rush like nothing else. Using every ounce of your driving skill is a must in these high-speed, lightweight vehicles. Take part in a variety of championships, exhibition races and time trials to earn extra vehicles and claim the Karting crown.

name: Invisible Apartment
summary: Cyberpunk Visual Novel about a girl hacker struggling in a modern World. The story revolves around surveillance, hacking, artificial intelligence, cybernetic implants and those who want to lead a normal life in a high-tech society.

name: Indie Nights
summary: Characters from other games fight to survive while the monsters attempt to stop their task! Which will you survive as? Or will you be the one who will stop them...

name: Infinity Imperium
summary: Choose your civ, expand your empire, fight for the supremacy, travel through time to change the course of history, discover what’s happened to the Infinitians before the end in this new space RTS!

name: Inferno’s Embrace

As dark forces rise, team up with dragons Niko, Vidar, and Dravon to navigate a world torn between peaceful coexistence and looming dominance. Embrace your unique power, balance loyalty and duty, and rewrite your destiny!

name: Invokers Tournament
summary:
Fight your way through frenetic online battles in this new Action MOBA! Collect and learn to use the different invocations and rise to the title of Tournament Champion!

- Acquire all the invocation rings and equip your character with different combinations in fun and exciting online matches.
- Discover all the skills of your invocations and learn to control them on the battlefield.
- Create a team with friends and compete in different seasons against other teams.

name: Internet Spades
summary: Internet Spades is a game shipped with some Windows systems that features online play.

name: Inure Coffee

name: Incoherence

name: Inside the Clockwork Pussy
summary: Now, Anais is a formidable boss of a criminal organization that trades and produces an exotic hallucinogenic mushroom. Such a mushroom sexually stimulates its users, making them avid and active pornographic performers.

name: Invert: The Climb

name: Incel Syndrome
summary: The abstract male is the image of God, the absolute some-thing.

summary: Insurgency: Sandstorm Deluxe Edition includes the base game and the Year 1 Pass. Feel every bullet and fear every impact in fierce close-quarters combat as your team fights toward victory in intense co-op and PvP multiplayer modes.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Cold Blood Set Bundle

name: Invaders
summary: A Space Invaders clone.

name: Inside Outing
summary: A isometric 3D arcade adventure game released under three different titles for several 8-bit and 16-bit platforms.

name: I Need A Hero

The player can choose from eight teams; Australia, England, India, New Zealand, Pakistan, South Africa, Sri Lanka, and West Indies. Additionally there is a hidden team called The Beam Team, where each of the developers' portraits is represented by Sonic the Hedgehog. From the menu there are different types of play modes the player can choose from.

name: Incursion: Halls of the Goblin King
summary: Incursion: Halls of the Goblin King is a freeware roguelike game based on the Wizards of the Coast d20 system.

name: Infected Prison
summary: This is a realistic first person VR game, players in the zombie apocalypse of human survival. Search for supplies and ammunition in a prison full of zombies to rescue other survivors.

name: Inca
summary: You try to find your friend Dr. Paul Jamison, who disappeared mysteriously in the deep jungles of Peru while he tried to unearth the last secrets of the Inca. A note and a golden brooch are all the hints he left to you.

name: Infected Backrooms
summary: Enter the surreal world of Backrooms in our multiplayer 2-8 players Co-Op & PvP game. Become monsters or survivors, where players must infect others or use their guns to stay alive. With fast-paced gameplay and a creepy atmosphere, it's perfect for Backrooms fans for having fun with friends

name: Invention 4
summary: Save the world from an impending threat in a dynamic 3D shooter with quest and puzzle elements.

name: Internet Checkers
summary: Internet Checkers is a game shipped with some Windows systems that features online play.

name: Inkesis
summary: Help Ink, our hero, fight the evil that consumes the forgotten Library of Arga. Collect Knowledge and control your environment to explore this grandiose building, uncover secrets, and forge your own path in this adventure and puzzle game! But beware, your greed could lead you astray...

name: Intercept 2
summary: Explore and survive fully simulated procedural space stations with or against friends, Intercept 2 seats you as the alien or the crew in an attempt to escape a doomed station.

name: Into the Gorian's Den
summary:
Free DLC for the PS4 version featuring 2 new pos-game stages with a high difficult ins a "as if" scenario.

Only available after finishing the game and loading the "clear save".

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Year 1 Pass + Year 2 Pass
Into the Ice: Nazis of Neuschwabenland
summary: 4 years in the making, finally coming to your PC: Into the Ice - Nazis of Neuschwabenland - the official sequel to the multiple GOTY and award winner "Into the Dark". Adventure, Shooter, Trash, Comedy, Politics and Nudity. You. Have. Been. Warned!

name: Infinite Gateway
summary: We offer to your attention a new galactic action. Infinite Gateway is a dynamic, addictive game. Play for an android robot that tries to get out of the spaceship. You must instantly make decisions and react quickly to continue your journey.

name: Innkeeper VR
summary:
Your Medieval Tavern Awaits!

Step into the shoes of a medieval tavern keeper in a bustling fantasy world! In Innkeeper VR, you control every detail of your tavern, from cooking to cleaning, serving to managing unruly guests.

name: Into the Shadows
summary: A short puzzle/story mash up

name: Inuyasha
summary: The purpose is to defeat "Naraku" and collect the scattered "Soul of the Four Souls", but you can continue to collect "Four Soul Fragments" after clearing. There are also original movies only for games produced by Sunrise. A special "Inuyasha notebook" was added as a first-time benefit. Inuyasha becomes a human and weakens on the day of the new day (new moon) due to the age setting. After clearing the Maitreya, the air holes cannot be used.

name: Infinitrap: Rehamstered
summary: Infinitrap is a hardcore top-down platformer, where you play as the 2nd best adventurer in the world, exploring a epic dungeon of deadly traps. Can you persevere and master death to reach the Cup of Infinity and learn its secret?

name: Innocent Grape
summary: Humour and hentai - what could go better together than these!? Become a promiscuous Ann in this 2D visual novel. Help her realize all her crazy sexual fantasies and fulfill her dream! What could go wrong...?

name: In Your Realm
summary:
In Your Realm gives an old-school, challenging, RPG roguelike experience with randomized
encounters and a unique combat system.
To beat the game the player needs to plow through every weakness of their personality -
represented in the game as bosses in their respective worlds.

name: Indie Heroes Collection 3
summary:
Indie Heroes Collection 3 will feature all 9 indie Game of the Month releases for 2023 along with some extra titles to be revealed ahead of its release in February 2024.

Game of the Month adds a free game through monthly system updates that are removed with the next release. The monthly games starting in April as part of this bundle were Donut Dodo, Thunder Paws, Big2Small, Magic & Legend: Time Knights and currently Doodle World: Redrawn.

name: Interstate Drifter 2000
summary: Drift through the interstates and sideroads of this open game world, win street races and try to avoid traffic and police.

name: International Cricket Captain 2001: Ashes Edition
summary:
Captain any side in the two division county championship and play in all domestic tournaments including the National League and the Super Cup. Historical scenarios featuring great players from the past. Why not replay the '99 World Cup?

Pick your team, choose your bowlers, make declarations, set the field, prepare the pitch, sign new players. The decisions are yours.

name: Infinite Patience
summary: Infinite Patience is a single player shareware collection of solitaire card games.

name: Intoxicated Driver
summary: Drink and drive the safe way, behind a computer with your friends. Compete against your friends in various drinking and driving related game modes!

name: Infinite Galaxy
summary: Infinite Galaxy. Infinite possibilities. This is a next generation immersive, space game. With top 3D graphics and deep strategic choices to choose from, the secrets of the entire Galaxy are waiting for you to discover.

name: Insector Hecti in the Interchange
summary: C64 Puzzle Game

name: Incubation: Hidden Worlds
summary: Incubation: Hidden Worlds is a special edition compilation that includes the full game Incubation: Time is Running Out along with additional content. The package features ten Instant Action maps offering tactical combat scenarios, with three maps exclusive to this edition. Players receive an audio CD containing the game's soundtrack alongside music from Extreme Assault and Archimedean Dynasty. The compilation also includes a 4x4 concentration memory game, a playable demo of Incubation, and patches to update the game to version 1.03.

name: Intrusion
summary: Doomguy invades a techbase full of demons. This is my first map that uses custom textures, and used Essel's amazing pack.

name: Inbound
summary: Inbound is a multiplayer Third person cover based tactical shooter that aims to bring a authentic experience to players in various environments. It brings players into a familiar 5v5 based environment where players will be able to take part in a range of gamemodes in different maps.

name: Invincible Medusa
summary: "Invincible Medusa" is a 2D arcade slasher, playing Medusa you need to clear all the levels from enemies. Be careful - enemies are very dangerous, and you have nothing but a trident. Develop a smart strategy, collect apples from the dead to replenishing health.

name: In Pursuit
summary: In the dark night, a murder occurred in a remote town. Eight suspects were wandering on the streets. Only 8 hours left, the innocents must prove their innocence and cooperate with the inspector to solve the case; but the real murderer must remain hidden in the crowd or escape from the town.

name: Inn Need
summary:
There was once a marvelous hotel in the town of Queen's Horizon. Each room had a different theme, every stay was an adventure. But as the Silver Willow Inn passed from owner to owner, it fell into disrepair more and more.

The new owner, Hestia Kindlee, is determined to rejuvenate the inn that she remembers from her childhood! And no leaky pipes, cobwebby cellars, or haunted hotel rooms are going to stop her! Explore the old inn, fix what you can, find help for what you can't, and restore the inn to its former glory.

name: In Search of a Home
summary: In Search of a Home (ISH) is a strategy rogue-like space exploration game where you lead a small fleet of ships and people out into unknown galaxies to find a new home. Not everyone will make it to your new home, and not everything is essential.

name: Inline
summary: Inline is an atmospheric, relaxing and minimalist experience reminiscent of classic puzzle games. Arrange the shapes you are given on a grid to form and clear as many lines as possible in this simple yet challenging game.

name: In Case of Emergency, Release Raptor
summary: When the machines rule with an iron fist, it's time to unleash the raptors!

name: Innkeep
summary: Innkeep is an immersive job sim with an RPG core and a dark twist. Run your own fantasy world inn. Serve ale. Share rumors. Tell jokes. Rob your guests…?? Well, maybe just a little.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Digital Splatter Skin Set
summary: Take the perfect cover with the Digital Splatter Weapon Skin Set for Security and paint the battlegrounds with your personal touch. This skin can be applied to six different weapons.

name: Interstellar Pioneering
summary: Interstellar Pioneering is a casual game where players collect energy gems in the starry sky, expand their territory, and gather resources. Recruit fairy helpers to assist in collecting and managing resources, balancing expansion and consumption to create a vast starry world.

name: Infested Lands
summary: Infested Lands is an addictive game that takes players to a dangerous world where monsters rule. The player takes on the role of a military man who has been sent to a territory known as the "Infested Lands"

name: Infinite Labyrinth
summary: A rouge-lite video game created for the TSA 2021 State Competition in which you explore a randomly generated dungeon.

name: Infinite Gravity
summary:
This is a build sandbox game
We have hundreds of elements for your choice
We offer a variety of materials in building their ideal architectural works for you
We will also open survival mode in the future

name: Incubation: Alien Apocalypse
summary: After the killing of the alien queen in "The Birth" Duke rents an apartment in LA so that he can get some rest before he falls apart. However he didn't kill all the aliens in the first campaign and now those remaining have started to regroup. Find the remaining stronghold of the aliens and kick their asses off the planet; for good.

name: Inventory Master
summary: This is a game that focuses on item combination and inventory management. Engage in repeated combinations to aim for the production of top-tier items.

name: Infernales: Circles of Hell
summary: Just shoot ....

name: Incantation
summary: The player controls a young wizard who has to complete several levels. Enemies are defeated by using different ranged spells that can be found throughout the levels, with different firing patterns and power. Some levels require players to pick up a certain amount of items while other have a boss battle.

name: Indy 500
summary: A racing game for the Game.com.

name: Invincible Big Cat
summary: The last kitten born on the Rat Planet lives in humiliation in a zoo. But the vicious cosmic pirate Dr.Nyan helped you. Now the time for revenge has come! This is a Survivor-like game. You will play as a big cat monster to dismantle the resistance of the rats and destroy their cities.

name: In-Fisherman: Freshwater Trophies
summary: In-Fisherman Freshwater Trophies is a fishing simulator on the PC.

name: Infinite White: Hyperbolic Time Chamber Simulator
summary: A walking simulator game where you walk in a completely void and empty space, similar to a Hyperbolic Time Chamber.

name: Into The Storm
summary: Why not cool the Sigil heat with a little gothic thunderstorm? Into The Storm is a limit-removing episode made by various members of Doomer Boards. Project lead @SuperCupcakeTactics promises it'll leave you black and blue... in a good way!

name: Infinite Rave
summary: Explosions, Gore, and Death by Fire and other messy things to go around in this simple looking but complex game. Play in a series of maps to see how long you can survive and how much money you’ll get. Upgrade your guns, switch costume mid game, and burn all the mobs you can.

name: Indigo Loop
summary: Indigo Loop is a quick-count, time management puzzle game with a splash of strategy and luck. It shares the classic puzzle game spirit of being easy to pick up and challenging to master.

name: Initial Drift Online: Car Pack
summary: This DLC allows you to unlock 3 new unique cars!

name: Indiepocalypse #5
summary: Issue #5 of a monthly indie game anthology collecting games from 10 developers.

name: Intergalactic Battle Roosters
summary: It’s time to cluck around and find out. Gear up and pull on the helmets of the Battle Roosters, a hotshot space brigade of poultry with panache. In this quirky, roguelike, bullet hell adventure you’ll combine weapons, upgrades and killer strategies to recover space’s best taco ingredients. Bwark!

name: Invasion of Alien X: Earth in Crisis
summary: Aliens are on a terrifying Earth Invasion Tour!

name: Intelligence: Underwater Kingdom
summary: Is a puzzle game in which you want to build an image (with the animals of the underwater Kingdom) so that the picture was like the original image. Move the tiles of the puzzle wisely to collect the correct order of the pieces of images.

name: Into the Depths Below

name: Infernal Runner

name: Indian Vice City: Heroes

name: Indigo Child
summary: Play as the mystical Indigo Child and save some souls while wandering through the forest. The game is designed to work with both keyboard and 360 controller. It is a gamejam style experience.

name: Inside the Forest
summary: Odye is a survivor. He was on his way to his promotion when a crash crashes his plane. Now he needs to stay alive as long as possible until someone misses him.

name: Interblocked
summary:
A recreation of the original "Tokyo Parking" board game for the Game Boy.

10,000 Levels to beat with 5 different tiers of difficulty, all in the palm of your hands. Do you have what it takes to beat every level?

name: Innocent
summary: Judgement day comes. Due to severe damage caused by humans, natural disaster, unknown viruses, and mutated creatures have filled every corner of the world. In the face of catastrophe, you alone bear the responsibility of saving mankind.

name: In Search of the Lost Words
summary:
In Search of the Lost Words (1996) is an enchanting educational game geared toward building reading and comprehension skills in older children. The graphics are charming, and the gameplay quickly becomes immersive, drawing the player into a simple but interesting storyline. 
 
Gameplay 
 
The interface is intuitive and easy to use; a simple point and click selects and names objects, some of which are highlighted for later use in a sidebar. Each object when clicked will reward you with a cute animation, and some are gateways to minigames, mostly memory and match-up challenges, all the way through the main action that give you extra adverbs and adjectives that come in useful later. At the end of each stage, there is a section of the story of the egg, and by extension the creature, that has gaps in it that you must fill with the “lost words” of the title. 
 
Once you’ve found every word (and some of them are not obvious at all, like clicking on a large vase only to have it called a parrot because that’s what was hiding in it) you can proceed to the next phase of your journey.

name: Infinicrypt
summary: Take control of one of 3 mighty heroes to vanquish an evil as old as time. Dodge attacks, slay monsters, and collect items in this bullet-hell dungeon-delving roguelike! Are you ready for the infinite depths?

name: Indy 500
summary: Indy 500 is a 1995 arcade racing game by SEGA Japan. It follows the format of previous driving games such as Daytona USA. It includes the famous Indianapolis 500. Players can race one of three courses.

name: Inertia 2
summary: Inertia 2 is a first-person action platformer with free-run and old school FPS inspired movement mechanics.

name: Intrusion 2
summary: Intrusion 2 is an action platformer set in a sci-fi environment on a reserve planet occupied by a hostile military corporation conducting forbidden weapon research. Intrusion 2 is inspired by classic 16bit era sidescrollers and focuses on classic fast-paced action combined with modern physics and animation.

name: Infestation World
summary: Infestation World is an open-world sandbox survival game with a focus on competitive multiplayer modes.

name: Infinos Exa
summary: An ehanced version of Infinos Gaiden with several new features for the EXA Mode such as new ships, new enemy designs, some boss swap.

name: Influence
summary: Influence is an abstract real time strategy game in which you attempt to spread a meme.

name: Infinity Blocks
summary: A jigsaw type puzzle game.

name: Introducing An Apprentice Incubus
summary: A role-playing game from TashiKani.

name: International Track & Field
summary: No true sportsman can resist a challenge. Assembled here are 11 muscle cramping events guaranteed to bring out the athlete, and the sweat, in you. International Track & Field offers all the thrills of the original arcade smash coupled with the latest 32 bit sound and graphics. Nothing else comes close.

name: Internet Cafe Manager 2025
summary: From a dusty café to a digital empire—build the ultimate gaming hotspot!

name: Inevitability
summary: "It is inevitable that man will one day live among the stars" Inevitability is a game where you can build a space empire! Collect materials to craft parts and build your very own fleet of starships and stations block by block. Manage relations with eight factions spanning four alien races.

name: Invasion Machine
summary: Invasion Machine is a modern warfare, counter-insurgency blend of a sandbox and RTS. Your goal is to command troops in an occupied province, in an effort of bringing back peace and order. Kill your enemies, help the civilian population, preserve the resources and the lives of your own soldiers.

name: Indecent Details: Find the Difference
summary: Indecent Details is a barebones free adult “find the differences” game.

name: Inu's Adventure
summary: Inu's adventure is a fun platformer where you play a dog against robots, lasers, missiles, platforms, squeaky toys, and a mad robot professor to get out of a secret laboratory.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Protective Gear Set
summary: Gear up for chemical warfare and gain the upper hand over your opponents with the Protective Gear Set for Insurgents. This set includes five different cosmetic gear pieces.

name: Internet: legko i prosto!
summary: The Internet is really easy and fun! It's full of fun adventures, and you'll learn how to navigate the global network with familiar characters like Globi and his companions. You'll explore the magical world of the Internet, learn how to use browsers and email, and understand the basics of online security.

name: Invasion!!
summary: Defend Earth from an onslaught of alien invaders! Use the crank to shoot down incoming saucers, collect power-ups, and destroy power-downs! If you let all six cities fall, then it's game over for Earth...

name: Interworlds Academy
summary: What will you do if you get into another world? I mean into this kind of "Interworlds". Into this mysterious academy in the middle of nowhere...on the border between life and death. Can you get out of there and save the rest?.. Only time will tell us.

name: I No Longer Fear The Ranger Guarding My Heel
summary: A large prototype-textured map with non-linear progression, slaughter fights, and trick jumping. Runs on the Copper mod, which is included. Originally intended as an entry for SM224.

name: Insanity
summary:
Insanity is a freeware horror-style adventure game by Uri made in WOLF RPG Editor.

A group of high-school friends is talked into exploring an abandoned mansion.
Before long, they discover a dead body. They hurry to call the police, but find the front door's stuck.
As they search for another way out, they learn the truth about what happened in this house...

name: Inkognito for iPad
summary:
An elegant deduction game set in Venice, in a romantic age of spies.
As a secret agent you will have to collect clues, use your deduction skills to recognize your friends and confound your foes, and discover the secret mission that will give victory to your team.

name: Install Wizard
summary: Play as the Install Wizard in an exciting retro twin-stick shooter/dungeon crawler in which you use your digital sorcery to zip around and fight within corrupted programs to take back your computer from the hands of an evil virus!

name: Intrigue Inc.: Raven's Flight
summary: A legendary secret agent has gone rogue and Intrigue, Inc. needs you to track him down. Uncover Raven's diabolical plan and foil his grasp for power and glory in this exciting Hidden Object Puzzle adventure game. Take on Raven's incredible intellect and think two steps ahead to capture him before he takes over the entire planet in Intrigue Inc.: Raven's Flight

name: Incarnage
summary:
Incarnage is an arcade-style top-down shooter that increases your speed the more you kill.
You play as Nilus, one of the lead soldiers in the rebellion against Kro-Tech and it's tyrannous rule over Krome. Fight through their forces of soldiers, mechanisms, and horrifying experiments as you move through Krome's various locales and destroy the source of the madness.

name: Inoue Takehiko: Buzzer Beater - Zenpen
summary: Inoue Takehiko: Buzzer Beater is an interactive comic book in which the player can only see the next scene or the previous one, the game allows to use an autoplay mode and allow save anytime. The game features some interesting moving effects during the different scenes.

name: International Gran Prix
summary: Early 1st person driving game

name: In Your Face TD
summary: In Your Face TD is a Tower Defense, which utilises room scale VR to give a new dimension to a classic genre. Fight the invading monsters face-to-face using a laser minigun, or even an exploding sawblade frisbee and build towers to stand your ground.

name: In the Ember
summary: Angelina was originally an ordinary adventurer.But since she met a weird man and robbed her of her job,everything has changed.

name: International Snooker
summary: Quite possibly the most realistic Snooker game to come to any gaming platform, working closely with Michaela Tabb the world’s most famous Snooker and Pool referee Big Head Games have crafted the ultimate cue sports simulation, with easy to pickup and play controls and months of gameplay as you fight through a pro player’s career.

name: Inside Depth 6
summary: There are 6 depths to descend; the further you go, the more terror you will experience. Uncover mysteries, solve puzzles, and immerse yourself in a dark storyline that Depth 6 has to offer. Journey through all 6 depths to uncover the secrets buried within.

name: Ink Shapes: Book One
summary: Rotate stamps to create beautiful watercolor paintings in this relaxing hand-drawn puzzle.

name: Invinco
summary: Space Invaders clone

name: Internet Cafe Simulator
summary: Internet Cafe Simulator is an internet cafe business simulation game. Build the best internet café in the world!

name: Inescaped
summary: Inescaped is a cooperative horror game designed for four players. What starts as a seemingly innocent game show quickly turns into a fight for survival as you find yourselves trapped within a labyrinthine structure pursued by monsters.

name: In My Brain
summary: In My Brain is a science fiction action video game about Nano, a nanoparticle that enters people's minds to combat their illnesses. Based on real events.

name: Intellivision Lives!
summary:
A hefty emulation and multimedia package.

Intellivision Lives! contains nearly every Intellivision game originally published by Mattel Electronics and INTV Corp. (minus, of course, licensed games.) There are several unpublished prototype games included, as well. The hyper-text multimedia presentation includes detailed histories, instructions, and trivia for virtually every game - screen shots, box covers, marketing data - interviews, videos, commercials, etc.

name: Inertia
summary: Inertia is a first-person platformer with free-running aspects, inspired partially by other parkour movement based games, as well as game-modes seen throughout various Source titles, such as surf, bhop and kreedz.

name: InfinitasDM: Teeth of the Bloodwolf
summary: The Teeth of The Bloodwolf is a short, story driven mini-campaign that should last for one to two sessions of play set in a game-generic fantasy setting.

name: InfiniPicross 3
summary: InfiniPicross 3: The Conclusion of the InfiniPicross series! Faster and more complex procedural puzzles (as well as better looking), even more puzzles (IP 2.0 puzzles packed in), a smooth interface built on previous improvements, easy to tweak themes and a very easy built-in puzzle editor.

name: Inter Solar 83
summary: Don your space helmet and fire up your star drive as you blaze a trail across the stars in this 1980s inspired VR space exploration game.

name: Instead; Ghost Suburb
summary: A mini-adventure game where the goal is to collect certain items in a village and bring them one at a time to the village shrine to open the largest building in the village, which is the northmost building.

name: Indie Nights: Nightmare in Yellow Pine
summary: The horrors that have risen out of the small town of Yellow Pine, Idaho have come to Indie Nights!

name: Intimate Abode
summary: "Discover a unique experience of self-discovery and pleasure in the game 'Intimate Abode'. Explore your apartment and enjoy intimate moments in different locations, trying out different dildos and dildos. Release your sensuality and immerse yourself in a journey of personal pleasure."

name: Inflorescences
summary: A visual novel strategy game where your floral fragrances determine the fate of your mysterious shop and its patrons. Make choices, talk to customers, and shape the story. Get ready for a journey of heartfelt connections and strategic decision-making.

name: Interception
summary:
Interception is a vanilla-compatible megawad for DOOM II.
In the far distant future, you are part of a team of marines who are sent a distress signal from an archaeology site. Once you arrive, the rest of your team is killed by some nasty hell spawns. Now it's your job to stop the invasion, or die trying. Along the way, you explore ancient military bases, an underground necropolis, and Hell itself.

name: Infection
summary: This set of 7 maps should take around 45 to 60 minutes to complete on Ultra-Violence, provided you don't die too often. It is designed to be played in order, but pistol starts are possible with some added difficulty.

name: Infinite Waves TD
summary: How many waves of enemies can you repel? Build and upgrade towers, sharpen your swords and arrows, prepare spells and fight off all the enemies, by yourself in single-player or with friends in co-op mode!

name: In Retrospect
summary: Are you prepared to travel back into your memories and tell me about your life, in retrospect? Craft your own story and gameplay based on which collectibles you focus on! Health, wealth, love, education, creativity, or spirituality? What direction will your life take?

name: Inflation Bay
summary: nflation Bay is a PWAD for Doom II, originally containing one level and first released on November 20, 2008. It was created by Shadowman, with an updated release following on July 22, 2010, containing a second map built in collaboration with Lainos. The levelset features themes similar to the Hellfire series, with the first map being set on a city street and the second one in and around an asylum. The WAD comes with cosmetic replacements for the Wolfenstein SS, which is turned into the cultist from Blood.

name: Infinite Magicraid
summary: A Smashing 3D Magical Turn_Based RPG with Idle Gameplay.

name: IndestructoTank!
summary: A Game Boy port of the first Indestructotank game including features from the game Indestruc2tank!.

name: Incredible Dracula: Dark Carnival
summary: It’s for a magical conundrum like no other! Elizabeth, Dracula’s beloved wife, has been cursed by the mischievous magician, Bestby. Her head was transformed into a pumpkin, and Dracula must embark on a quest to break the curse before it's too late.

name: Invert
summary: Use the mechanic of changing the color of the base to make all bases the same. You have a limited amount of moves, adding a little more challenge to the gameplay. 45 Phases with difficulty levels from easy to the most difficult phases. Calm and relaxing soundtrack.

name: Inherit the Earth
summary: Inherit the Earth is an earlier add-on by Dustin "Bloatoid" Twilley, later creator of Hostile Takeover (2001, 2013) and much later of Death Wish (2011, 2017-2020), from 1999 that comprises of three episodes, plus a short secret fourth. The batch file was last modified on November 23, 1999.

name: Invasion Waves
summary: Invasion Waves is 2D Pixelated Top-Down Shooter Game

name: Indiana Jones and the Lost Puzzles
summary: A match three puzzle game with a Indiana Jones theme

name: Incident Survival
summary: Role-playing board game. Your fate is in your own hands. Join together with others who want to test their abilities in a challenging situation and use the right arguments to convince others of your worth.

name: Infra Arcana
summary: Infra Arcana is a Roguelike set in the early 20th century. The goal is to explore the lair of a dreaded cult called The Church of Starry Wisdom. Buried deep beneath their hallowed grounds lies an artifact called The Shining Trapezohedron - a window to all secrets of the universe. Your ultimate goal is to unearth this artifact.

name: International Space Station Tour VR
summary: Experience the International Space Station in VR with high-quality images and learn about the inner-workings of the Space Station from the European Space Agency's Samantha Cristoforetti, holder of the record for the longest uninterrupted spaceflight by a European astronaut.

name: In the Groove
summary: In the Groove (abbreviated ITG) is the first game in the In the Groove franchise, published by RedOctane and developed by Roxor Games, and first released in video arcades around August 30, 2004.

name: Infestation
summary: Drive (and fly) your upgradeable transformable ACAM buggy to save other humans and defeat the alien menace.

name: Infested Nation
summary: Infested Nation is a fast paced and brutal top down shooter. Outnumbered and outgunned, you will need to rely on your wits and reflexes to make it through each situation alive.

name: INTER08JECT
summary:
INTER08JECT is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame made with RPG Maker 2003.

Explore the dreams of Tomatsuki, a teenager who really likes tomatoes and cannot get out of their apartment building.

name: Invertio
summary:
Originally inspired by Touhou Project's Seija Kijin, who has a screen-flipping attack in a shoot-em-up which I'm sure has never caused anyone to rage-quit Touhou 14. Unfortunately, screen flipping isn't all she's going to do to you here...

The base gameplay is fairly standard tile matching, but your actual objectives may change from level to level and complications will quickly begin compounding. Hopefully you can clear everything before Reimu has some kind of stress aneurysm.

name: In My Mind.
summary: In My Mind. is a shooting game with metaphors about mind and feelings. Face 18 different negative emotions. Your goal is to overcome them without being defeated.

name: Internship Detective
summary: "Internship Detective" is a text adventure game of detective story from the perspective of double female masters. The two heroines Doudou (Intership detective) and Bobo (“big” detective) .

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Worn Veteran Weapon Skin Set
summary: Flaunt your experience with the Worn Veteran Weapon Skin Set for Security. These skins can be applied to six different weapons.

name: Inkighter
summary: A 2.5D side-scrolling fighting game based on Chinese mythology. With core mechanics of classic fighting games, the player needs to have good mechanics to perform combos and fight the evil. It has clean cut actions, multiple playable characters and even a battle chess mini-game.

name: Inagawa de Ikou!!
summary: Inagawa de Ikou!! is the third entry in the Leaf Amusement Soft series.

name: Inu : Loas'Fate
summary: Play as Inu and explore the bayou and voodoo culture. Strengthen the bond between Vilokan and our world by guiding creatures through trials. Be strategic, manage mana, summon creatures, cast spells and upgrade creatures in this strategy/tower offense game.

name: Insult Order: Cocky Cat Girls’ Pleasure Corruption is on the Menu
summary:
There is a luxury nightclub with demi-human hostesses known as "Demi-Stage Cafe".
In the guise of a restaurant, the hostesses provide customers with sexual service.
Let's train the hostesses in your favorite ways with lewd orders in your hands.

name: Infinite Construction
summary: This is an infinite sandbox construction game with no boundaries. The game is simulating the reconstruction of a post-war town; there are 18 kinds of resources in the game, and the construction strategy is to increase the resources and maintain the dynamic balance of different resources.

name: Into The Matrix
summary: "Into The Matrix" is a multiplayer horror game where you and your friends must explore, survive, and outsmart dangers. Beware the Matrix Overseer, who watches and twists reality itself. Many entities are after you, but the Overseer is the true threat. Can you escape its grasp?

name: Intertwined
summary: A visual Novel about love, friends and ancient magical secrets.

name: In Service of the Queen
summary: Embark in this paced time and resource management where you coordinate the workers, build and collect resources to perform the task, In Service of the Queen!

name: Incompatible Species
summary: LGBTQ+ positive visual novel about seizing your happiness. And squashing mutating monsters.

name: Indian Mutiny: Little Sepoy
summary: Take part in the Sepoy Mutiny – the uprising in India between 1857-58 against the rule of the British East India Company.

name: Infinity
summary: The origin of the Infinity series of visual novels.

name: Into the Abyss
summary: A 1st-person survival horror game. Explore and find your way through horrific environments. Find clues and solve puzzles to advance. Running might be the best way to stay alive.

name: Infect Them All: Vampires
summary:
Infect Them All is back with Vampires!
Infect people to take control over them!
Each vampire's unique skills including special attack will help you.
Infected victims becomes your minion. They'll fight for you.
But people are not defenseless.
They'll resist you with their last ounce of strength!
The war begins between vampires and people!

name: In the Drink
summary: Set on Christmas Eve, players take control of a deep-sea researcher and her trusty submarine to scour the depths and save aquatic creatures in need.

name: Innocent Critters
summary: An online party game where 2-12 players venture into a procedurally generated forest in search of food. With supplies limited, you will have to decide who will make it out alive and who will not!

name: Internship Adventure
summary: Comedy game about being an intern in a video game

name: Indecent Desires
summary: “Indecent Desires” is a very adult +18 intrigue/drama interactive game in the mould of something like the TV-series “Dallas” or “Dynasty”, with a bit of “Beverly Hills 902010” thrown into the mix (“Indecent Desires” really does feel and look like the naughty +18 lewd version of those TV-series).

name: Infinite Shooter
summary: Infinite Shooter is a top down arcade shooting game, also known as a "Shmup", with the emphasis squarely on the action. With no story in the way of your fun, simply choose an opponent and take them down to earn powerful weapons, upgrades, ships, and power-ups! With an infinite number of stages to play and a continually scaling difficulty the action never ends!

name: Infraworld: The Hatehammer
summary:
The basic ideas of this map are infernalism in design and the general non-linearity in gameplay. I have never tried to widely disclose them in my maps and wanted to practice. In some places everything turned out as I had planned, in some places very average. Nevertheless, I am pleased with the final result. As an experiment, I added coop-starts, but cooperative was not tested at all. The difficulty is above medium, but you can choose from HMP and UV.

The map is very long (about one and a half hours), so it will be tiring to go through in single try. The player is faced with the task of finding 6 yellow keys scattered across map locations. The keys must be placed on pedestals in a separate huge room, which can be reached via a teleport in the center of the map (where the hammer is). I think this should help you not to despair if you get lost.

name: Incoherence
summary: The game follows Kate, a resilient protagonist grappling with the loss of her beloved sister.

name: Insecticide Part 1
summary: Enter the fast shooting world of Insecticide as hot shot rookie Detective Chrys Liszt and help solve a crime of epic proportions. Lead your team on a bug hunt, collecting clues and solving puzzles. Use old-fashioned street smarts, unique insect abilities and an arsenal of ingenious bug weapons to confront your suspects. Explore a futuristic world of mutant insects and uncover the truth in a city infested with corruption.

name: Incremental Adventures
summary: A minimalistic Idle game where combat is fully automated.

name: Inter Milan Club Football
summary:
Club Football is a soccer series designed to re-create the individual team experience. A total of 17 games released in the Club Football series are tailored to the specific European teams on which they are based, including character facial mapping from each of the 22 position players on the roster.

Each game features bespoke content - including media archive clips of great goals and famous victories - and allows fans to add themselves to the 2003/04 starting line-up of their favourite side.

name: Inventioneers
summary: In Inventioneers you can create your own crazy, fun inventions! With the help of the Inventioneers, our tiny helpers with unique characteristics, you can invent fun, creative and often quite weird inventions. A lot of inventions are included in the game, the more you solve the more parts you receive for your own inventions!

name: Infested Inside Multiplayer Online
summary: This game is a "the thing" like where one of the guys is infected and has to kill others. The others have to find who is infected and to kill him together.

name: Inn Hand
summary: Inn Hand is an atmospheric god game and casual management sim that places you in the role of a magical deity operating a cozy isometric inn. Replace your mouse cursor with a spectral hand to tend to your patrons' needs in exchange for gold and reviews, ensuring your inn thrives!

name: Infinity Saga
summary: You play as Tetra, a teenage boy living his days out as an college student. Tetra meets Autumn; a girl he first met on a social networking site and has grown fond of. Tetra is invited over to Autumn's house for the first time for a date night. However, the two find out that they are out of Autumn's favorite chips. Things escalate quickly after, as the two decided to go to the store only to find zombies lurking outside Autumn's house.

name: Insider Threat
summary: Insider Threat is a first-person survival horror game that focuses on creating fear and tension for the player.

name: Initial D: Street Stage
summary: Initial D: Street Stage is a 2006 game for the PlayStation Portable based on the Initial D series. It is a console port of Initial D Arcade Stage 3.

name: In Requiem
summary: Explore the remnants of an ancient civilisation based on the poem Ozymandias by Percy B. Shelley.

name: Infinity Wings - Scout & Grunt
summary: Infinity Wings - Scout & Grunt Take control of your chosen fighter (either Scout or Grunt) in this side scrolling shooter.

name: In Cold Blood
summary:
In Cold Blood requires players to use more brains than brawn in solving a case of international intrigue, puzzle-solving, clue gathering, and the unwinding of a tangled web of espionage, double-crosses and a sinister plot that might threaten the free world. The story unwinds in an unusual manner: At the start of the game, your character, Agent John Cord, has been captured by the enemy and is in the midst of a grueling interrogation. The scenes from the game come from his memories as he is undergoing this ordeal, with players taking on his previous adventures that lead him up to this point. It is a spy-thriller in the vein of James Bond, and as Cord remembers more, the overall story begins to make more sense.

Throughout In Cold Blood, players will have to search for hidden objects and talk to a whole host of characters, attempting at every turn to solve the puzzles that pop up in their way. But tricky conundrums aren't the only thing blocking their paths -- they'll also have to take control of Agent Cord in high-octane gun battles against enemy agents. Occasionally, the player can outwit the enemies, but they'll often they'll have to fight it out in a duel to the death.

name: Infinity Girl
summary: Infinity Girl is a high-speed rhythm/racer/roguelite where everything — every action, every enemy and every spectacular world you encounter — is driven by the beat of the music. Each run is unique, with procedural levels that test your skills as you grind, drift, boost and leap to the rhythm.

name: Interstate Cowboys
summary: Interstate Cowboys is a role-playing game set in Neo Vista City, a mix of 80s aesthetics and near-future technology. It features dual protagonists with AI-generated NPC dialogues, dynamic relationships, immersive synthwave aesthetics, a blend of RPG elements with arcade driving, and heist planning.

name: Incandescent
summary: Incandescent is a fast paced action arcade game that scales the difficulty to your skill level. The goal is simple, pilot your ship and defend yourself against waves of unique enemies and bosses. Different powerups will drop to help you with upgrades to your weapons and health.

name: Intruder Alert
summary: Intruder Alert is an action-stealth 2D adventure combined with multiple other genres packed into a single game. Stealthily avoid other shapes, defeat them when necessary, and complete various tasks along your journey.

name: Inumeda
summary: Inumeda is the most nostalgic yet refreshing form of Turn Based RPG. For many, this experience will become an "intriguing mystery." Gather animal companions, Defeat enemies with skills triggered by their combinations, And explore this peculiar world.

name: Infamous 2: Hero Edition
summary:
A special edition dubbed the Hero Edition was announced on February 18 of 2011, and was made available for pre-order. The Hero Edition included:
- A miniature statuette of Cole MacGrath in his neutral state
- A wearable replica of Cole's sling bag
- The first issue of the Infamous DC Comics
- A voucher to download the game's soundtrack
- A voucher for in-game bonus content, including:
-- The Kessler and Reaper skin
-- The Sly Cane, Samurai Sword, Caveman Club, and 24 Karat Gold Amp skins
-- Two exclusive powers: the Lightning Hook and the Electrocution Grenade powers.

name: In Hazy Clouds
summary:
In Hazy Clouds is an English Yume Nikki fangame developed for Dream Diary Jam 6.

This is a game of exploring the imagined world of Fairu(tsuki), an apprehensive room-dweller who is constantly grasping at a world from their past ..... what will you find?

name: Inertia: Redux
summary: Inertia: Redux is a first-person action platformer with free-run inspired movement mechanics. Through use of the fluid movement set within the game and the dynamic level elements, players have the simple aim of getting from point A to point B.

name: Infinity Ball
summary:
Why continue flapping birds when you can have Infinity?

Infinity Ball is an incredibly addicting and fast paced game which won't give your finger a rest!!

Just move the ball left and right and don't let those pesky lines touch you!! And Infinity will be at your reach!!

Get the highest score you can, but be careful, there is always someone better than you!!!

Your amazing gameplays are automatically recorded at a silky smooth 60fps. You can even share them with other people and make everyone jealous on your score!!

name: Injustice 2: Ultimate Edition
summary:
Upgrade to the Injustice 2 Ultimate Edition and unlock the following additional content:

• Fighter Pack 1
• Fighter Pack 2
• Fighter Pack 3

Plus:
• Demons Shader Pack
• Black Lightning Premiere Skin

name: Initial D Extreme Stage
summary:
This game is a console port of Initial D Arcade Stage 4.
Extreme Stage has 2 versions: Asian and Japanese.

The Asian version's manual is in english, and lacks online mode (which allows you to race against other people online and unlock auras for your car).

The Japanese version's manual is in japanese, unlike the other version, this one has online mode.

The game also had DLCs:
- Manga scans that can be seen in-game
- Extra cars (this DLC has been removed from PS Store)

name: Interuniverse teleport
summary: Defend portals by teleporting soldiers onto the battlefield. Use magic: lightning, fire, mines. Beware of diverse enemies and strategically position soldiers for victory!

name: In the Long Run: The Game
summary: Build and manage your space base - Survive against extreme environments - Explore open world scenarios based on real topographic data - Gather Resources, Craft your items - Drive futuristic rovers and more...

name: Inamorata
summary:
Ever wanted a hot vampire girlfriend, but you’re too asexual for your own good?

Play as Ronnie, the swoon-worthy, buff heroine of this comfy, cozy visual novel, and see if you can win over the stylish and beautiful Cece.

name: Instant Sports Paradise
summary: Instant Sports Paradise makes the sun shine bright on your family workouts! Travel to the other side of the planet and enjoy an experience up to to 4 local players, all on your cosy couch.

name: Intravenous 2: Mercenarism
summary: Playing as Gideon, a cold-hearted mercenary willing to kill for money without any moral principles, you'll have tactical freedom with a wide variety of weapons and special gadgets to complete your mission in the prologue of Intravenous 2.

name: Into
summary: Into is an action puzzle game where players need to explore and decipher to find ways to escape this unfamiliar world. The game is full of unknown creatures and puzzles. The game has multiple endings, and the player's choices and investigations will determine the final outcome.

name: Insect Swarm
summary: The swarm is a swarm of thousands of alien zerg, and you, as the only survivor of this wasteland, you need to face them and fight with blood, good luck!

name: Indy 800
summary: The game is housed in a large custom rectangular cabinet. Each side of the cabinet has two steering wheels and four pedals. The monitor is set in to the top face of the cabinet and looked down upon. The game uses a 25 inch full color RGB display and does not use color overlays, representing the first full color video game.

name: Indian Train Simulator
summary: Indian Train Simulator features “Track Changing” and a fully functional “Signalling System”. The game boasts a self-sufficient railroad environment where all trains coexist and operate just like in the real world. Dynamic track-changing and sophisticated path selection systems enable all the AI trains to function smartly without stepping on each other’s paths. Since players will now rely entirely on signalling and track changing switches, the paths they take will be one among an exponential set of possibilities. This means they will find themselves stopping their trains on any of the platforms available at each station.

name: Infinite Voyager
summary: Far from Earth, mankind hasn't changed in the centuries since we've reached the stars. Across this wide-open galaxy, you'll find merchants, builders, and explorers. The more adventurous are colonizers, conquerors, and even space pirates. And you, Voyager? What will you be?

name: Inks.
summary: A puzzle game through the lens of pinball.

name: Infinity Cure
summary: A standalone fandisc to Infinity with two new routes (Yuuka Cure and Izumi Cure scenarios).

name: Infinite Stratos: Versus Colors
summary: Infinite Stratos: Versus Colors is a high-speed 3D battle action based on the Infinite Stratos light novel franchise where players fight in flight-powered mecha suits. The game will also allow for players to duel each other online.

name: Invasion of the Alien Blobs!
summary: Invasion of the Alien Blobs! is the American title of “Shunkan Tsubutsubu Tsubushi”, a Japanese DSiWare game released by G-Style in Japan.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Digital Splatter Weapon Skin Set
summary: Take the perfect cover with the Digital Splatter Weapon Skin Set for Security and paint the battlegrounds with your personal touch. This skin can be applied to six different weapons.

name: Infinite Mario 64
summary: What if you could play Super Mario 64... forever? A random level generator for Super Mario 64, using libsm64 and Godot Engine as a base.

name: Ink Reverie
summary: Ink Reverie is a casual city-building game set in a fictional historical era with art inspired by the Tang and Song dynasties. As a diligent manager, you'll guide hardworking villagers to transform a remote village into a prosperous home through exploration, construction, production, and trade.

name: Invasion Vill
summary: A traveler ends up in an accident, after which he is forced to find a way to escape the creature that is chasing him. Will you be able to find your way to survival?

name: Inagawa Junji: Mayonaka no Taxi
summary:
The player takes on the role of a taxi driver in Osore Cho (literally Fear Town), listening to the various horror stories of their clients. You have the option to pick up or ignore clients, and the story changes depending on these decisions. Occasionally you will be attacked by paranormal phenomena, so it is still possible to get a game over.

There are 36 stories in total, including 4 hidden stories. Each of the stories are between ten and twenty minutes long. Ten of the stories are narrated by Mr Inagawa, while fourteen are narrated by other voice actors. The remaining eight stories have no narration and are only text based. There are certainly some famous ghost stories included in this collection, in particular 犬鳴峠 - Howling Dog Pass.

name: In The Disorderly Courtyard
summary: This is a platform puzzle game, The game mainly tells the story of playing the female lead and repairing the virtual world. The game takes 2-3 hours and features unique cartoon rendering technology, global dynamic lighting, and a blend of sunrise and sunset colors and light sources.

name: Initial D: Another Stage
summary: Initial D: Another Stage is a driving/racing game for Game Boy Advance, based on the anime and manga Initial D.

name: Injustice 2 Mobile
summary: The mobile companion game to the sequel to Netherrealm Studios' DC fighting game.

name: & in the War I Find You
summary: When the world has gone crazy - please hold on to love.

name: Infinity
summary: This is a role-playing sci-fi game.Use the A and D keys to move your character.Manipulate the character to complete the interaction to achieve the ending, including state control, and the mode of input content.

name: Ink Studio: Tattoo Artist Simulator
summary: Ink Studio: Tattoo Artist Simulator is a simulation management game, where you step into the challenge of opening your own tattoo studio. Design. Tattoo. Upgrade.

name: Insects
summary: Insects is a learning and training memory game. A game for the child with the reproduction of the selected Insects. Different levels of difficulty.

name: Initial D Arcade Stage Zero
summary: Initial D Arcade Stage Zero is the ninth and final instalment in the Initial D Arcade Stage series. It is the first Initial D game to introduce the H style gear stick and 270 degree wheel.

name: Infected Battlegrounds
summary: Infected Battlegrounds is a battle royale shooter with a twist. Players fight to scavenge weapons and supplies while avoiding becoming infected. Dead players come back as the infected. Shoot everything that moves or team up with other players to fight off the horde of infected.

name: Insert Item Apocalypse
summary: Insert Item Apocalypse - interactive 3D puzzle in genre "find and click". Explore a world full of many details, conveying the spirit of the aftermath of a major man-made disaster.

name: Ino
summary: Ino is an Adventure/Horror story driven game that tells the story of Kaede and Hitaki, two classmates that get involved with a mysterious girl called Ino. Follow the story as they try to figure out who she is while they try to escape from being murdered.

name: In Pursuit of Greed
summary: A science fiction themed first-person shooter set in the year 15432.

name: Inferno
summary: Arcade game where you must destroy orbs without being caught by the the devil.

name: Innsmouth
summary: A ZX Spectrum text adventure game inspired by the novel "The Shadow over Innsmouth" written by H.P Lovecraft.

name: Into the Haze
summary: Rescue a young girl from the clutches of an ancient demon in Into the Haze. Guide your character through a supernatural adventure, where she’ll encounter an ancient fog demon summoned by her sister-in-law in a magic ritual gone wrong. Race to rescue the heroine’s daughter, Emily, before the demon claims her prize.

name: Innocent Forest: The Bird of Light
summary: The “FullDive Novel”: Visual Novels meets Virtual Reality in this ultimate immersive reading experience.

name: Insectonator
summary:
Insectonator is a 2D casual Shooter created using Flash and made by BGamesSite. The basic premise is that a backyard is filled with bugs (well, mostly) of various kinds, and the job is to exterminate them... at all costs. There’s only one person who can handle this high-caliber job - you.

Unlock and choose from an assortment of up to 26 different weapons (from the humble beginnings of a rock to the bazooka to the nuke) to exterminate 20 types of insects. Earn up to 28 achievements from accomplishing various tasks such as using certain classes of weaponry to kill the bugs, kill enough, miss enough, etc. Build up your arsenal of weaponry by completing these various achievements.

name: Infernal Hunt
summary: Forge your path through the fiery realms of Infernal Hunt, a captivating roguelike action game. Prepare for an epic adventure where you'll confront hordes of otherworldly creatures and navigate treacherous landscapes. Are you ready to become a true hunter of the damned?

name: Insectonator: Zombie Mode
summary:
The Insectonator series continues with Insectonator: Zombie Mode, where instead of killing bugs, you kill zombies that are only the size of bugs. There is a new mode called 'Don't Touch My Gem,' where you defend your gem from being taken by zombies within the time limit, along with a new variety of weapons such as the sword and basketball, along with many other old weapons.

All in all, shoot and blast your way to victory!

name: Informe Zenteno
summary: Travel through Chile on the early 90s, while trying to discover who is the mysterious bomber!

name: Insiders
summary: Welcome to the dangerous micro world hidden inside the human body. Pilot a ship through the bloodstream. Mine resources, fight microbes, craft items and weapons. Build bases. Follow quests and find a cure for cancer. Don’t get eaten!

name: Intruder on the Bridge
summary: Intruder on the bridge tells the story of Captain Dyce, a skilled galactic union officer in command of the Ventura, the largest spaceship ever built. Dyce will have to investigate the death of his brother, killed by a mysterious plot that seems to come from the highest ranks of the union.

name: Incremental Factory
summary: Craft and automate an industrial empire from scratch! Experience a strategic game teeming with challenges as you manage resources, overcome hurdles, and optimize production chains. Are you ready to conquer the challenges of Incremental Factory? Your journey starts here... The Factory Must Grow!

name: Infantry Attack: Strike from Above
summary: Equip yourself with a new secondary weapon and show your opponents who's the real boss!

name: Interstellar Airgap
summary: Backed by interstellar weaponry, the nation of Panwestia has annexed half the globe. Resistance appears futile--but the hegemon has a very unique weakness...

name: Index: Purger
summary: Step into the world of Index-0, and experience a thrill-fueled mercenary life like no other! With fast-paced, chaotic scenarios, you'll need to keep your wits about you to stay in the game. Make use of the equipment and perks at your disposal, and create your own unique style to control the chaos.

name: Infinite Coaster
summary: What speed would make the roller coaster go off the track? Experience a realistic yet crazy riding of Roller Coaster now! Can you reach the end safely in limited time? Accelerate the roller coaster boldly but cautiously, feeling your heartbeat and excitement now! Try now!

name: Inconceivable Rat Endeavour
summary: Embark on a wacky rat's endeavour in this genre-bending hexagonal puzzler. Rotate hexes to make your way out of miserable sewers, collect inconceivable amounts of cheese, avoid deadly traps and prepare for silly surprises.

name: InController
summary: InController is a 4-player couch co-op within a couch co-op. Work with your teammate to control your onscreen controller by running and jumping over the buttons on your teams controllers (you can even mess with the other teams controls!) to control your teams character in the selected game.

name: Insanity's Requiem
summary: Insanity's Requiem is a Doom gameplay mod based around magazine-based weapon reloading and an expanded enemy roster.

name: Industring
summary: A minimalistic urban planning puzzle. Manage resources and building locations. Accumulate knowledge points and discover the secrets of the destroyed planet

name: Insector X
summary: The player controls an insect-sized warrior named "Kai" who takes on a vast army of cyborg insects to free the insect world from the dark ruler queen. The game uses two buttons: one for an upgradable main shot, and another for a seemingly random selection of secondary weapons.

name: Indiana Jones and the Gold of Genghis Khan
Inuyasha: Kagome no Yume Nikki
summary: Inuyasha: Kagome no Yume Nikki is a Role-Playing game, developed by Tomcat System and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: Interea
summary: A companion visual novel to Adastra that takes place during a time skip in the original story.

name: Infernax: Deux or Die
summary:
The update will bring a new playable character into the fray: Cervul the Squire, a well-rounded lad who sports deadly talents in both axe throwing and tool-assisted combat.

It also incorporates co-op play in Infernax‘s fan-favorite gun mode, perfect for players keen on wielding maximum firepower against the game’s monstrous beasts.

name: International Superstar Soccer
summary: International Superstar Soccer for the Game Boy brings the popular console soccer series to the handheld systems. In the game you can play any of 36 national teams in an International Cup.

name: In the Name of Freedom: Black Apocalypse
summary: Action platformer post apocalyptic game

name: Initial D: Special Stage
summary: Initial D Special Stage is a Driving game, developed by Sega Rosso and published by Sega, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: Innocence Or Money Season 1: The Complete Season
summary: Unlock the Complete First Season! Venture through every thrilling episode where you, as the master of fate, hold the power to shape Jennifer's journey. The stakes have risen, and the decisions she faces are fraught with consequences...

name: Instant Indie Collection: Vol. 3
summary:
Curve Digital is proud to present the Instant Indie Collection Vol. 3 - A collection of Curve's latest and greatest indie hits: Action Henk, Stikbold! A Dodgeball Adventure and 10 Second Ninja X.

Our Instant Indie Collections bring you three indie hits in one neat little package.

Run, jump and butt-slide through the glorious toy-filled world of Action Henk. Embark on an epic dodgeball journey with Stikbold! A Dodgeball Adventure. Fight to beat Captain Greatbeard and the rest of the world in the blisteringly fast platformer 10 Second Ninja X.

This pack includes:

Action Henk
Stikbold! A Dodgeball Adventure
10 Second Ninja X

name: Infernae
summary: Fear is not a shield. Only those who face it will survive this adrenaline-pumping bullet hell boss rush.

name: Invader
summary: Invader is a vertical scrolling shoot-em-up for the Nintendo Game Boy Advance. There are 8 levels to shoot through each ending with a end-boss. The player can select from 2 different ships each with specific features. Enemies leave coins that can be spent in the Shop, where upgrades such as weapons, extra lives, and credits are available for purchase.

name: International Soccer Excite Stage 2000
